since 2005. Our volunteers assisted the Garifuna community in building the
first-ever out-patient facility in the region, the Ciriboya Medical Center.
The community-based center empowers the
community, particularly women, in addition to providing
previously non-existent health services for the poor. 
In 2013, Dr. Luther Harry began
construction of two more buildings at the center; a Birthing Center and a
Surgery Center. The Surgery Center construction is furthest along.  It
is in urgent need of a roof, before the rainy season in October.
That’s
where you come in!  With your help we can raise the roof and
protect what’s been built so far.
With a roof, progress on the building can continue.
What We Need & What You Get
We must raise $12,500  in the next 40 days for supplies and
labor to put the roof on the Surgery Center. That
could be 500 people contributing $25 each.
Your contribution of $25 or whatever you
can afford, will make a world of difference to tens of thousands of people
in the region.
Your donation is an essential part the
continuing transformative changes in the Garifuna community's physical and
emotional strength as a result of the center's work. 
If we do not reach our goal, we will
prioritize protecting the structure from the heavy rains of fall and winter.We will keep you updated through e-mail on further developments
of the center and its services through CHIMES. 
Because CHIMES is a 501 (c) (3) non-profit organization, your gift is
tax deductible.Impact
Your contribution to the raising of the
roof on the new Surgery Center is the indispensable next step in continuing the
improvement of access to essential medical care for the Garifuna people and
their neighbors in the Iriona region of the state of Colon.
Not long ago poor families didn’t name their children until they were two years old
because so many died before that age.  Most
were anemic and all had intestinal worms.
With over 800,000 medical visits since
the center’s inception, women
are not dying in child birth and infant mortality has been reduced.
Your contribution now, will literally,
be a life or death matter for some people with traumatic illness or injury,
simply because of time. 
Currently, it is a two-hour drive over
rough roads and rivers with a cement ford, assuming a vehicle is available, to the nearest hospital.
These roads become impassable during the long winter rainy season.
Building community-based health care is
making a lasting world of difference. The center is training people as medical
professionals. 
With local residents trained and
employed in the center, communication is optimized and services most
effectively focused.
Over half the students training as
Medical Doctors are women who will return to their home town to serve its citizens.
Community classes in practical health
and hygiene provided free of charge, further empower the people. These
community roots will only be strengthened with time.
The success of this community-based
medical center and program are results of the foresight and tenacity of the
Garifuna people and the generosity of people like you.
Risks and Challenges
Our immediate challenge is to raise
$12,500 within the next 40 days, so that roofing materials can be purchased and
delivered in time to construct the roof prior to the rainy season beginning in
October.
Our most immediate risk is that we don’t raise all the $12,500.In
that case, funds will be prioritized to protect what has been built through the
rainy season. Any funds in excess of $12,500 will be
used to purchase windows and doors and finish the interior of the building.
Broader challenges for the medical
center and the services provided are political. In Honduras, as in the U.S.A.,
funding for public services and infrastructure are in danger of being reduced
or eliminated. At the same time, privatization of both is advancing.
Finally, outright corruption within the
government can lead to lack of support for vital services to the people. While
these serious challenges are beyond the scope of CHIMES and may affect the rate
of progress, none of them will stop this community-based and internationally
supported project.
Other Ways You Can Help
Visit our Facebook page - CHIMES of Ca
and "like" us.
www.facebook.com/CHIMESofCA
Use the Share Tools located
in the toolbar next to our video:

• 
Copy our URL (http://igg.me/at/rtrhonduras)
and paste it into an email or social media update
• 
Click on the Facebook icon to share
through your social media networks
• 
Add a widget to your blog or personal
website. Click Embed and then copy and paste the widget code.
• 
Send a direct email from Indiegogo
Let everyone you know about our campaign
to Raise the Roof in Honduras!

story:
AC and Heating Help Inc. is an organization that consists of active leaders in the community.  We came together to help people in our community overcome the crisis of losing an air conditioning unit in the middle of the summer in Arizona.

According to the Arizona Department of Health Services, “nearly 2,000 people visit Arizona emergency rooms because of heat-related illnesses.”  In a report posted by the Maricopa County Department of public health, in 2012, “there were 108 heat-associated deaths.” A single unit costs $5,000. For a family living pay check to pay check, the lost of an ac unit could be a hit they can't handle.

The board of directors consists of Scottsdale City Council member, Guy Phillips who’s the CEO with 30+ years A/C experience, and owner of Budget Mechanical LLC, which is a full service HVAC company.  Sydney Ford the Treasurer who is a CPA,MBA, and CEO of Professional Accounting Group. Linda Brown, is the Secretary and is a serving partner in the charitable humanitarian organization, Worldwide Impact Now. Nancy Cantor is the Charity Director with a Bachelor’s degree in Political Science. Todd Smith is the Director of Operations with 10 years of A/C experience. We want to help the people of our community. This is an issue we regularly see, and an issue we can positively impact quickly.

We believe everyone has the right to be cool. Air conditioning is a part of surviving in the summer just as heating is a part of surviving for winter conditions.  A/C units are expensive, however you can’t put a price on a life.

We’re looking to raise $25,000 to help five families in the valley who need a new air conditioning unit. With your contribution, you could be saving a life! Of course, the more money, the more lives we can potentially save. The money is going to go towards whole units, and/or parts to repair old units  to complete the job for as many families as we can help.

Please help us help people in our community and we'll thank you by helping out your A/C unit at home! Check out our awesome perks for details!

story:
On April 25th, a powerful earthquake devastated the country of Nepal, killing more than 2,500 people and affecting thousands more. The earthquake had a devastating effect on the entire country, including the already inadequate clean water supply. Earthquakes often cause damage to wells and water systems, which are a major source of fresh water for the people of Nepal.

Who Are We

Droppure is one of the largest manufacturers of water filtration bottles in India. It is our belief that drinking water is a key component to health and that everyone should have access to clean water.

Apart from selling our filtration bottles commercially, Over the past One and Half years we have worked on almost every major disaster Earthquake/Tsunami's and Floods in India and around Indian subcontinent.

These strikes entail us providing access to clean water by distributing Portable Water Filtration Bottles to community centers, refugee camps, and individual families in these areas

Our initial goal with any project like this is to help mitigate the immediate suffering by providing victims with access to safe water.

The Plan

Through our Water charity program, Droppure is looking to donate several drinking water filtration systems to quake victims.

Our initial goal with any project like this is to help mitigate the immediate suffering by providing victims with access to safe water. Once we have boots on the ground, and the framework of our program there is built, we will start to develop/implement long term programs that can be managed and built upon, locally. It is really no different than the work we have done (and continue to do) in different locations around the world.

·  The first phase is urgent in nature and made up of multiple strategic strikes into the hardest hit areas of the disaster zone. These strikes entail us providing access to clean water by distributing portable water filtration systems to community centers, refugee camps, and individual families in these areas.

·   The second phase, though still providing relief, consists of expanding the program by implementing more long term solutions ­ such as rain-water harvesting systems on schools and medical clinics, restoring dead wells/pumps, and actively seeking out new regions of need beyond ground zero.

Our team will be on the ground by mid of next week with at least 5000 clean-­water filtration bottles (Out of which 2500 will be donated by Droppure) which can provide quake victims with access to clean water, almost immediately.

However, our goal is to get as many of Droppure filtration bottles to ground zero as possible. This will all depend on the support that follows our initial launch this coming week.

About Droppure Filtration Bottles

No more digging wells if there is a water source, no constructing sand filters, and no more purification chemicals. No one has to boil their water to make it safe ever again. 

Families are able to get absolute clean drinking water just by squeezing the water bottle. All they have to do is to open the bottle lid, fill the water bottle with any water available and then squeeze out the water from the bottle after closing the lid on the bottle. The fast flow rate mean anyone, anywhere can have clean water in a matter of seconds. 

The DROPPURE WATER FILTRATION BOTTLE is a POINT-OF-USE SYSTEM. Since there is such a high flow rate, it eliminates the need to store water which reduces the chances of water being contaminated after it's filtered. The only external force required for the system to function is by squeezing the bottle.

The water from the bottle can not only be used for drinking water but also for cooking. Though this bottle is for self consumption, but can be used to provide clean water to others in urgent need by squeezing water out of the bottle

Droppure filters deliver absolute micron biological filtration, removing 99.9% of all bacteria like Salmonella, E. coli, Vibrio cholerae and Salmonella typhi (which cause Cholera and Typhoid); and 99.9 %of all protozoa such as Giardia and Cryptosporidium.

Alternative Option:

You can contribute by making a donation online on this page or offline into our bank account to reduce the commission page fees.

A) Our bank account details for International Donors:
Name: Portclean Technologies Private Limited
Account number: 50200004549116

Swift Code: HDFCINBB

B) Our bank account details for Indian Donors:
Name: Portclean Technologies Private Limited
Account number: 50200004549116

IFSC Code: HDFC0000139

For direct bank transfers ,please use EARTHQUAKEFUND as your reference.

story:
Engage ~ Energize ~ Empower


Let's Start Focusing on Whole Health!


Many people are affected by life’s challenges. 

When you think about your own life and those you love, can you relate to how destructive and damaging emotions and stress, resulting from the following, affect dally living? 

  • the devastating results of depression, 
  • the inability to cope with grief, 
  • anxiety interfering with daily functioning
  • feelings of worthlessness due to low self esteem, 
  • the trauma of dealing with cancer, 
  • managing chronic pain, 
  • the impact of financial burdens, 
  • life and business devastation, 
  • communication and interpersonal relationship issues, 
  • conveying hope to what seems like hopeless situations.

Would you like to  be a part of changing the way we focus on health? 

Your contribution will support the LIVE WELL TODAY online consumer engagement network that offers the tools and guidance positively impacting your life and the lives of those you love. 


Dear Friends,

Today’s health care system remains mostly divided into various health spheres: one for your body, one for your brain, another for your emotions. Nowhere is this outmoded reality more evident than in the area known as mental health. As a result of these arbitrary divisions, far too many people face emotional challenges that continue to go unchecked. We are being conditioned to believe that having emotional challenges means you have a mental illness. With your help, together we can change this. By changing the way we think about and approach health. Let’s start focusing on whole health!

PROBLEM - MENTAL HEALTH COST TO SOCIETY 

PROBLEM - CONVENTIONAL MEDICINE NOT ALWAY THE BEST REMEDY

PROBLEM - CAM (Complementary and Alternative Medicine) IS FRAGMENTED AND TRAINING VARIES

PROBLEM - FINANCIAL, OCCUPATIONAL, SOCIAL, AND SPIRITUAL HEALTH IS OVERLOOKED

PROBLEM - NO COLLABORATION IN HEALTH CARE


SOLUTION - “LIVE WELL TODAY” . . . a web portal to support Whole Health.


LIVE WELL TODAY (a division of Holistic Health Services Inc.) is a web portal where accredited professionals can interact with those seeking their help and support. The aim is to develop a truly comprehensive online network that links online collaborative care with consumer engagement.

Emotional-intellectual problems often result from many factors: unhealthy relationships, poor diet, lack of physical activity, financial stress, work issues, social isolation and lack of spiritual connection or a sense of life’s purpose. When left unchecked, we can become unhealthy and the various components of the whole self begin to suffer. Keeping the mind, body and spirit in balance is what helps to keep us healthy and whole. 

By developing an all-inclusive membership platform that links and serves both accredited professionals who work in emotional-intellectual health—as well as physical, financial, complementary, occupational, social, and spiritual health—with a growing population seeking their help and support, we will help millions of people to live well today, in mind, body and spirit. 

Every member, professional and consumers alike will benefit from the services offered through LIVE WELL TODAY.


What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $52,000. Every dollar goes into program development to make LIVE WELL TODAY interactive, exciting and unique. 

All funds raised will be used to develop a user-friendly comprehensive web portal with a variety of support mechanisms for members to ENGAGE, ENERGIZE and EMPOWER. Our focus is whole health!

We need YOU - We need you to make this a reality. Studies show that we need to address whole health in order to create and sustain balance and LIVE WELL TODAY.

Details

LIVE WELL TODAY will offer members secure audio and video conferencing that supports HIPPA AND PIPEDA compliancy. 

Live Well Today can offer members access to the following:

  • Accredited professionals to assist in whatever area of life is needed 
  • Virtual “time out” meditation room 
  • A guided imagery room to bring calmness, peace and clarity 
  • Holistic insights to help you achieve a higher appreciation of all that is 
  • A learning centre with inspiring stories, informative articles, book recommendations, webinars, seminars, workshops and more
  • Weekly affirmation word searches for personal growth
  • Puzzle Palace and creative activities to keep the mind active 
  • The Talk & Grow Social Hub connecting you with people of like interests and providing you with the opportunity to form new friendships
  • Travel opportunities that help to enhance one to LIVE WELL TODAY

Public access to LIVE WELL TODAY is free. Also, anyone can register to receive daily words of wisdom via email. Fees may apply for workshops and other types of programs offered by the professionals within the network.

Accredited professionals pay a fee to join the network. Credentials and competencies are first verified.

There is a fee for all members to participate in the Talk & Grow Social Hub (TAG). Hosts of the network pay a hosting fee, while participants pay a nominal per minute attendance fee. This small fee pays for site upkeep. Three bulk time packages entitled Occasion, Active and Committed are offered for this program.

Help LIVE WELL TODAY to offer an online experience like no other. Help millions to LIVE WELL TODAY in mind, body and spirit. 


Risks & Challenges

We are a group of people dedicated to promoting meaningful living and healthy relationships. 

We ourselves have experienced emotional-intellectual challenges, personal health impediments, financial woes, occupational setbacks and social and spiritual dilemmas. And we have changed the way we think about and approach health. We realize that we can LIVE WELL TODAY by addressing whole health. 

We will work hard to build our network and reach as many people in North America as possible. We will offer as much support as we can by providing helpful information and interesting content in order to engage, energize and empower our members. With any project, there are challenges. We can try to plan for them but sometimes there are unavoidable delays. We will use all funds received toward developing and launching the LIVE WELL TODAY web platform. In the event we do not reach our fundraising goal, we will develop the platform in segments. In the event we surpass it, we will add programs to expand into other countries.

We promise to provide regular updates to our members and all contributors about the progress of LIVE WELL TODAY. 

Only with your help, we can achieve the first step. We can get LIVE WELL TODAY launched. 




We recognize each and every contribution to the LIVE WELL TODAY seed campaign. Our special perks offer you a chance to utilize the network. Check them out!

                                                   

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people just can't contribute financially, but we can sure use your help. It's always a challenge to get the word out so please share the LIVE WELL TODAY video or link with all your social networks and invited them to share it with everyone they know. Forward the link and information by email to friends, family, coworkers, and acquaintances, and ask them all to do the same. You can even tell the stranger you run into about our campaign. Inform us about blogs and other media channels that could be interested in writing or talking about LIVE WELL TODAY. Please make some noise, and get the word out! Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools too!

story:
Riosbo Ayahuasca Research Center

Ayahuasca is the most common name for a medicinal plant beverage used by indigenous tribes throughout the western Amazon rainforest.  This unique medicine is consumed in healing ceremonies led by trained shaman, called curanderos.  Ayahuasca ceremonies form the foundation of an ancient medical tradition, one that is still currently employed and developed in the Amazon region, most especially in Peru.  

In these ceremonies, curanderos sing particular songs, called icaros, to communicate with the spirits of plants and animals, and through their work with ayahuasca, it is possible to have out of body experiences, to see inside the physical body to diagnose conditions, to relive past events and release emotional traumas, to find solutions or cures for afflictions using various plant treatments, and to better understand one’s life, path, and existence.  Beyond the ceremonies, the healing tradition is a vast science of holistic medicine, rooted in a different paradigm than modern science, that treats the body, mind, and spirit using an array of natural plant remedies and traditional practices.  

While some research on the botanical, chemical, and pharmacological aspects of ayahuasca has been conducted and published in peer-reviewed scientific journals, little to no research has been done on the healing tradition, called curanderismo, within which ayahuasca is only a part.  Therefore, the goal of the Riosbo Ayahuasca Research Center will be to better understand the ideology and methodology of the indigenous healing tradition so that new models can be developed that integrate ancient traditional principles into modern medical practices to enhance the healing benefit of any and all treatment.


We Need Your Help

Thanks to the generosity of some wonderful people in the US, we have managed to secure the funding for the majority of the construction, which is nearing completion.  However, we still need help with furnishing the facility.  Here's what your donation will help to provide:

  • Solar panel system for electricity and hot water
  • LED lighting fixtures throughout the center 
  • Furniture - beds, nightstands, desks, tables, chairs, couches, etc.
  • High efficiency toilets and sinks for the 14 bathrooms in the facility
  • Kitchen appliances - refrigerator, stove, blender, juicer, etc.
  • Basic medical and laboratory equipment


Our Plan For The Future

The Research Center will be owned and operated by the Ayahuasca Foundation, a Peruvian non-profit organization that has worked hand in hand with indigenous curanderos and jungle communities to offer healing retreats and educational courses for the last eight years.  The Riosbo Ayahuasca Research Center will offer exclusive healing retreats to earn the funding for various research projects:

  • Classic botanical research on several rare yet powerful medicinal plants 
  • Investigations into the effect of various aspects of the Healing Tradition
  • Consciousness studies focused on optimizing mental habits related to healing
  • Increasing understanding of the relationship between mind, body, and spirit 
  • Creating a system for integrating a health based lifestyle into modern culture
The Research Center will comfortably accommodate up to 20 participants for result oriented research and will feature full electricity, hot and cold running water, phone and internet service, all in a remote location in the center of a 55,000 hectare national reserve.  Nearly every employee of the center will come from a neighboring jungle community who has worked closely with the Ayahuasca Foundation and the national reserve for the last six years to develop a Model Community project based on modern sustainability practices and ancestral knowledge and traditions.


Who We Are

The Ayahuasca Foundation was born from a desire to spread the science of plant medicine back into the world.  The Foundation supports the preservation of indigenous wisdom and culture, offering healing retreats and educational courses, and in the near future by conducting research focused on the ayahuasca healing tradition used for millennia by indigenous healers of the Peruvian Amazon.  The Ayahuasca Foundation also supports the preservation of the Amazon rainforest, and promotes educational efforts to raise awareness about sustainability, permaculture, and harmonious environmental relationships.  The Foundation participates in community outreach programs and cultural reeducation projects.

It is our strong desire to educate as many people as possible to the wonders of medicinal plant traditions, the potential of the human spirit, and the inter-connectedness of all beings. Humankind has many challenges ahead, with global warming drastically altering our environments, war and violence destroying our communities, power and greed decaying our life philosophies and endangering our children's future. Many people feel overwhelmed with despair, but by again finding our spirits and reconnecting with nature, we will remember that love truly does conquer all. With our spirits guiding us, peace will prevail over the earth, and the ancestral traditions of ayahuasca and plant medicine will show us the way back to our own spiritual traditions, back to health and happiness, and back to harmony with all beings.

Visit the Ayahuasca Foundation website: www.ayahuascafoundation.org

We have already begun the important process of building relationships with experts in plant research but we have a lot of work to do.  Conducting our research properly and getting it published will certainly be challenging, at first, but we hope to team up with other like minded organizations interested in studying the cultural traditions of natural medicine.  We have tremendous faith in the forces of nature bringing the right people together at the right time.  That is how this project was born, and how it has progressed every step of the way thus far.



Other Ways You Can Help

Even a donation of $10 can be a welcome statement of your desire to contribute to the reintegration of ancestral wisdom into modern culture.  If you can't contribute much financially, there are other ways you can help this endeavor:

  • Post this campaign on facebook, your blog, or anywhere people might see it. (On the left side of the page there are quick links to share this campaign)
  • Contact us via the Ayahuasca Foundation website with research ideas or possible contacts in related fields.
  • Learn about the plants in your backyard, nearby park, or local area.  No matter where you live, there is powerful medicine all around you.
  • Smile!  We are all cells in the body of a truly magical and divine being. We are part of a mysterious and amazing global community.

photo taken at the end of November, 2015
story_txt:
Riosbo Ayahuasca Research Center 
Ayahuasca is the most common name for a medicinal plant beverage used by indigenous tribes throughout the western Amazon
rainforest.  This unique medicine is consumed in healing ceremonies led by trained shaman, called curanderos.  Ayahuasca ceremonies
form the foundation of an ancient medical tradition, one that is still
currently employed and developed in the Amazon region, most especially in Peru.  
In these ceremonies, curanderos sing particular songs, called icaros, to communicate with the spirits of plants and animals, and through their work with ayahuasca, it is possible to
have out of body experiences, to see inside the physical body to diagnose
conditions, to relive past events and release emotional traumas, to find
solutions or cures for afflictions using various plant treatments, and to
better understand one’s life, path, and existence.  Beyond the ceremonies, the healing tradition is a vast science of holistic medicine, rooted in a different paradigm than modern science, that treats the body, mind, and spirit using an array of natural plant remedies and traditional practices.  
While
some research on the botanical, chemical, and pharmacological aspects of
ayahuasca has been conducted and published in peer-reviewed scientific
journals, little to no research has been done on the healing tradition, called curanderismo, within which ayahuasca is only a part.  Therefore, the goal of the Riosbo Ayahuasca
Research Center will be to better understand the ideology and methodology of the indigenous healing tradition so

story:
We are digitally revolutionizing the traditional healthcare system to reduce the cost of healthcare, improve health outcomes and find cures to disease along the way. Our system can save lives, minimise suffering and leave a legacy for generations to come. 

The myhealthjourney system comprises of a website, app,"in clinic" loyalty program and healthcare coaching/coordination service. We license technology from the University of New South Wales, a premier University in Sydney, Australia and we have some of the world’s leading Healthcare professionals and entrepreneurs on our team. Testing with Diabetic patients has shown control of Diabetes within 6 months and a reduction in Healthcare costs by 50%!

Our vision is to create a global, low cost, effective healthcare system. Our goal is to help one billion users within 10 years. 

The many problems facing our healthcare system  

Worldwide over 100 million people per year fall into poverty because of healthcare costs. In America 62% of all bankruptcies are due to medical bills! 

The world’s healthcare system is sick and needs an overhaul! So why is it so slow to change? Well healthcare is complex with multiple stakeholders each with different, often conflicting demands.

Long wait queues with increasing costs in hospitals and clinics typify the current healthcare system around the world. Payers be they individuals, governments or Insurance companies have limited and reducing funds to pay for healthcare, while healthcare professionals require to be adequately compensated for their years of study and dedicated work. The patient often becomes the “meat in the sandwich” being provided sub optimal care even with the best intentions of both the payer and healthcare professional. This leads to unnecessary suffering, prolonging disease and many preventable deaths.

How myhealthjourney.com addresses the problem

Our early testing shows myhealthjourney can save the average member up to 50% in Healthcare costs while improving health outcomes.

There are enough healthcare professionals in the world, combined with our improved communications and travel to provide healthcare for the entire world within a week! We have the resources, the solution involves a better, faster reallocation of resources, including funding. 

Let’s face it you and your love ones will someday have a medical emergency. Achieving the best care depends on how well you are connected to Healthcare professionals and how much you can afford. Myhealthjourney aims to help provide both these elements.

myhealthjourney connects patients to healthcare professionals to form health teams, provides  health coaching services (for the chronically ill)   and alternate funding channels for patients. Funding channels include a loyalty program for patients (myhealthbanc.com), crowdfunding,  charity type events and other ways to pay for healthcare costs. Our system pays for any health related expenses including preventative healthcare costs such as gyms fees, insurance costs and any co-payment fees. Myhealthjourney also improves the efficiency and effectiveness in healthcare by providing the ability for “on demand” video consultations as well as in clinic bookings.  This makes contacting your healthcare practitioner faster and cheaper. 

Our early tests show the myhealthjourney system can greatly improve patients with type 2 Diabetes within 6 months while reducing the out of pocket costs by 50-100%. 

Finding the best ways to Treat and Cure disease

Have you ever heard of the person who was cured from a disease in an unconventional way? Yes this happens, but there is often not enough scientific evidence to prove it. Our platform will allow a patients “health journey” to be analysed to scientifically discover cures or to find the best ways to treat a disease. The key is to analyse a large number of patients creating large data sets. With myhealthjourney and your help this can be a reality. We will be targeting chronic disease states and can help when a pandemic situation occurs to quickly find the solution connecting patients with researchers and Healthcare Professionals.

So what do we need to make myhealthjourney.com a reality?

We have been testing now for almost 3 years and we are at a stage where we either give up or find more funding. Our aim is to launch in America this year after extensive testing in Australia. Our dedicated team have put their own money and time into the project and we now need more help. Specifically we need more funding and more awareness of what we are doing.

Your Impact …leave your legacy

Your sponsorship will save lives, stop suffering and finds cures to disease

Through your sponsorship together, we will help more people around the world have faster and more effective access to healthcare, saving lives and reduce unnecessary suffering.  We will find cures to disease that are right now unknown and help those with diseases get better treatment.

With your help we will create a world where our patients can live their lives to their fullest potential. This results in happier families, more productive economies and better societies.  

Your investment is important in our goal of helping a billion people in 10 years. Any sponsorships above $500 will result in your name immortalised on our founding contributor’s wall which will be on our site forever.

Other ways you can help …..

The first 300 people  to refer us to 2 friends (and pledge a modest $1) will receive a $50 credit towards their healthcare costs.

The challenges to reach our vision are significant but not impossible. With funding we can continue to do the research and assemble the best team possible to execute on our plan. If you can’t help with funding then please like our Facebook page and post our campaign out to your friends and families. And if you make calls to 2 friends asking them to view and back our campaign (minimum $1 sponsorship) you will be immortalized on our founders wall and receive a $50 credit towards your healthcare 3.

 

Another way to help is to talk to your healthcare professionals about us or get them to contact us. We wish to talk to Dentists, Physiotherapists and Chiropractors, Optometrists, Medical Specialists, Primary Care physicians and Pharmacists (in the USA only at this stage). Who do you currently use and recommend?

Contact us at myhealthjourneyindiegogo@gmail.com

ALL CONTRIBUTORS NOW WILL GO ON OUR WEBSITE AS FOUNDERS!

story:
As a wellness-based — rather than disease-based — approach to healthy bodies and minds, nutritional balancing is something we are really passionate about! For many people, health issues and health costs are a huge concern. The mainstream approach of "managing disease" is simply not working. Ready for a paradigm shift?

What is Nutritional Balancing?

Nutritional Balancing is a newer method of healing that is a synthesis of many modern and ancient healing sciences. In many cases, it is able to cause healing at very deep levels by delicately balancing the body chemistry and increasing the body’s adaptive energy level.

Nutritional balancing integrates nutrition (a specific diet for your metabolic type), the proper type and amount of drinking water, natural detoxification, light exercise, healthy lifestyle, meditation and personal growth into a whole system healing path based on your own personal mineral profile. Using a simple Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis your profile reveals the mineral imbalances in your body that can reduce your longevity and vitality. In addition, mineral imbalances can lead to all kinds of emotional, mental and physical health conditions.

Our healing program brings your body and mind back into a state of balance by helping to restore the body's enzyme systems. Nutrient minerals return toward ideal levels while toxic metals are reduced, thus increasing your vitality. Higher vitality means higher resistance to disease and can even help extend your life.


Many people have made dramatic improvements on a Nutritional Balancing program:
  • Acid Reflux: “When I began a nutritional balancing program I followed the diet very carefully. However, I could not take any supplements for the first 3 months due to stomach problems.  Despite that, my thyroid function changed tremendously. I can now take supplements without stomach upset. My acid reflux has stopped, and I was able to stop taking Nexium." - K.B., USA

Allergy & Environmental Sensitivities: "When I did all my allergy testing last month, my MD doctor was so impressed with the nutritional balancing program because my results were absolutely amazing compared to years past.  We talked for over an hour about the program.  He was very impressed." - A.H., California

  • Feeling Much Better: "This morning, as I was going through my daily healing ritual — coffee enema, making chicken bone broth for the week, chopping veggies for the day and juicing — I became overwhelmed with this amazing feeling! I have taken my health into my own hands! I have empowered myself on such a deep level. I know what it is to heal and how amazing our bodies are. Yes, we can heal!" - S.K., California

Healthy Pregnancy: "We had our baby! My delivery went really well — he's nursing like a champ and growing so fast! We had a healthy little boy, I am so glad I found out about nutritional balancing while pregnant; I am sure my baby is much the better for me eating meat and tons of cooked vegetables and taking those supplements. You know, since starting the program, I haven't been sick once! My pregnancy was so easy. I had lots of energy and a great mood all the way through. I had no baby blues afterwards and was back down to my pre-pregnancy weight three days after delivery!" - E.C., Canada

  • Morgellons, Brain Fog, Bipolor: "During the first month, I began to notice my fingernails dramatically improve along with my energy level. My concentration improved and my brain fog began to dissipate.  I noticed my "menopause pot belly" began to go away along with my cellulite after a couple of months to my fascination and delight!! My head was shaved due to the sores on my head from the Morgellons. The sores began to go away and within 4 months were completely gone!! My hair started growing back extremely lustrous and shiny and thicker than it had EVER BEEN with no gray!! I was both amazed and ecstatic!! This program definitely works for me!!” – K.P., USA

Pregnancy, Brain Fog: "I discovered Nutritional Balancing when I was four months pregnant. I’m 23, but struggled with spaciness, feeling ‘zoned-out’, and brain fog. On the program, these problems disappeared almost instantly. Once I added in the supplements, my energy really improved.  I had such an easy pregnancy with no problems at all. When I weighed myself a week after his birth, I was back down to my pre-pregnancy weight and my energy was great again. Before starting the Nutritional Balancing program, I had always struggled with chronic dry skin, cravings for carbohydrates and sugar, excessive fatigue, constipation, and feeling constantly cold. After only several months on the program, these problems have almost completely disappeared. I also have not gotten sick once since starting the program!" - E.C., British Columbia, Canada

  • Prostate Cancer gone: "I began a nutritional balancing program 18 years ago when I was diagnosed with prostate cancer and had been to Europe and elsewhere with little success. Now, at age 80, the cancer is gone, my teeth are healing and actually filling in, and I feel like a man of about 40.  I take care of a large home, inside and out, and have energy to spare.  I stay on the nutritional balancing program because it appears as though I am getting younger, not older." - E.F., Arizona

Why Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis?

It seems every day there is another diet plan or a "must-have" supplement or some new system for counting calories. It can quickly become overwhelming! Worse, how do you even know if it's helping? That's why a Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis (HTMA) is so important. Vitality metrics, such as your oxidation type and hair tissue level for calcium, magnesium, potassium, sodium and many more give us a powerful indication of how resilient your body is right now. True preventative medicine starts before you are diagnosed with a disease. Using selected mineral levels and ratios from the HTMA, we are able to create a picture of your vitality level and a strong predictive indicator of your health status. Through periodic re-testing you are able to track your progress over time to see real results!

New to Nutritional Balancing? Then the place to start is with a Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis.

Everyone will learn something about their health status and vitality level from a correctly performed Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis. Knowing your mineral imbalances is the first step to knowing how to start moving into balance, higher vitality, better health and increasing your health-span.

If you are ready to choose a path towards increasing your natural balance and vitality, then you can benefit from nutritional balancing science. Unlike other approaches, nutritional balancing does not treat health symptoms. Instead, our focus is on the underlying causes — low vitality, mineral imbalances and toxic loads. By bringing these back into natural balance, many common health symptoms tend to simply resolve.

Take a look: how common disorders show up as imbalances:
  • Digestive disorders are often related to zinc and copper imbalances
  • Thyroid gland issues related to a low calcium/potassium ratio and low available manganese, iodine and selenium
  • Adrenal gland issues often related to sodium level, and sodium/potassium and the sodium/magnesium ratios and other patterns

Hair tissue analysis and a nutritional balancing program can be ideal for people with:

· Cardiovascular and respiratory issues · High stress that can eventually lead to burnout, low vitality and illness
· Arthritis · Skin issues
· Young families and parents-to-be that want healthy babies · Brain fog? Bipolar? Improve your thinking; improve your life
· Thyroid function · Adrenal function
· Hormonal imbalances · Emotional problems
· Chronic illness or fatigue · Digestive issues
· Headaches · Allergies
· Diabetes and hypoglycemia · Auto-immune issues
And healthy people wanting to stay healthy!


Help us get the word out about real health and share this page with others! Do you know someone still eating the standard American diet (SAD) diet? Someone with chronic illness? Or perhaps a young couple simply wanting to have a healthy baby? Send them a link! Spread the word and help us help others move towards a healthier life.

Thank you so much!
~ Robert

Disclaimer:

Nutritional balancing is not a substitute for regular medical care. It is not a means of diagnosis, treatment, prescription or cure for any disease or condition, mental or physical. Instead, it is a means of reducing stress and balancing, strengthening and restoring body chemistry. When this is done, many health conditions improve by themselves.

"menopause pot belly" began to go away along with my cellulite after
a couple of months to my fascination and delight!! My head was shaved due to the sores on
my head from the Morgellons. The sores began to go
away and within 4 months were completely gone!! My hair started growing
back extremely lustrous and shiny and thicker than it had EVER BEEN with no
gray!! I was both amazed and ecstatic!! This program definitely works for
me!!” – K.P., USA

Pregnancy, Brain Fog: "I discovered Nutritional Balancing when I was
four months pregnant. I’m 23, but struggled with spaciness,
feeling ‘zoned-out’, and brain fog. On the program, these problems disappeared
almost instantly. Once I added in
the supplements, my energy really improved.  I had such an easy pregnancy with no problems at all. When I weighed myself a week after his birth, I was back down to my pre-pregnancy weight and my energy was great again. Before starting the Nutritional
Balancing program, I had always struggled with chronic dry skin, cravings for
carbohydrates and sugar, excessive fatigue, constipation, and feeling
constantly cold. After only
several months on the program, these problems have almost completely
disappeared. I also have not gotten sick once since starting the program!" - E.C., British Columbia, Canada
Prostate Cancer gone: "I began a
nutritional balancing program 18 years ago when I was diagnosed with prostate
cancer and had been to Europe and elsewhere with little success. Now,
at age 80, the cancer is gone, my teeth are healing and actually filling in,
and I feel like a man of about 40. 
I take care of a large home, inside and out, and have energy to spare.  I stay on the nutritional balancing
program because it appears as though I am getting younger, not older." - E.F., Arizona


Why Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis?


It seems every day there is another diet plan or a "must-have" supplement or some new system for counting calories. It can quickly become overwhelming! Worse, how do you even know if it's helping? That's why a Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis (HTMA) is so important. Vitality metrics, such as your oxidation type and hair tissue level for calcium, magnesium, potassium, sodium and many more give us a powerful indication of how resilient your body is right now. True preventative medicine starts before you are diagnosed with a disease. Using selected mineral levels and ratios from the HTMA, we are able to create a picture of your vitality level and a strong predictive indicator of your health status. Through periodic re-testing you are able to track your progress over time to see real results!

New to Nutritional Balancing? Then the place to start is with a Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis.

Everyone will learn something about their health status and vitality level from a correctly performed Hair Tissue Mineral Analysis. Knowing your mineral imbalances is the first step to knowing how to start moving into balance, higher vitality, better health and increasing your health-span.





If you are ready to choose a path towards increasing your natural balance and vitality, then you can benefit from nutritional balancing science. Unlike other approaches, nutritional balancing does not treat health symptoms. Instead, our focus is on the underlying causes — low vitality, mineral imbalances and toxic loads. By bringing these back into natural balance, many common health symptoms tend to simply resolve.
Take a look: how common disorders show up as imbalances:
Digestive disorders are often related to zinc and copper imbalances

Thyroid gland issues related to a low calcium/potassium ratio and low available manganese, iodine and selenium

Adrenal gland issues often related to sodium level, and sodium/potassium and the sodium/magnesium ratios and other patterns

Hair tissue analysis and a nutritional balancing program can be ideal for people with:




· Cardiovascular and respiratory issues
· High stress that can eventually lead to burnout, low vitality and illness


· Arthritis
· Skin issues



· Young families and parents-to-be that want healthy babies
· Brain fog? Bipolar? Improve your thinking; improve your life


· Thyroid function
· Adrenal function


· Hormonal imbalances
· Emotional problems


· Chronic illness or fatigue
· Digestive issues


· Headaches
· Allergies


· Diabetes and hypoglycemia
· Auto-immune issues






And healthy people wanting to stay healthy!






 

  


Help us get the word out about real health and share this page with others! Do you know someone still eating the standard American diet (SAD) diet? Someone with chronic illness? Or perhaps a young couple simply wanting to have a healthy baby? Send them a link! Spread the word and help us help others move towards a healthier life.Thank you so much!~ Robert
Disclaimer:Nutritional balancing is not a substitute for regular medical care. It is not a means of diagnosis, treatment, prescription or cure for any disease or condition, mental or physical. Instead, it is a means of reducing stress and balancing, strengthening and restoring body chemistry. When this is done, many health conditions improve by themselves.

story:
Para informacion en Español, oprima aquí.

The FLOW is the Fast, Lightweight, On-the-go Washer for menstrual cups. The FLOW is the first product capable of both cleaning and sanitizing menstrual cups; clean meaning rid the cup’s surface of blood, tissue, and physical remnants of the period cycle, and sanitize meaning rid the cup of any pathogens.

Menstrual cups are the future of period care. Despite having been in existence since the early 20th century, the menstrual cup has recently surged in popularity due to its longevity of use: one menstrual cup, cared for properly, can last up to 10 years. Currently, the average menstruator throws away between 8,000 to 17,000 tampons over their 40 menstruating years.1 That is an equivalent of almost 300 pounds of waste per menstruator, waste that takes up space in our landfills and pollutes our oceans. By making the switch to menstrual cups, menstruators will only use about 4 menstrual cups and eliminate $6,260 spent on single-use period products in their lifetime. 

Just one person could eliminate at least 2,000 tampons over 10 years by switching to a menstrual cup!

So, what's holding menstruators back from these savings, for themselves and for the environment? 

The current  menstrual cup experience can be a messy daunting process, especially when done in public bathrooms. Once you’ve removed your menstrual cup in a stall, you have to find a way to clean it before reinsertion. The first thought is to use what's right in the stall: toilet paper. The problem is toilet paper can break down when brought into contact with moisture on your cup and carry bacteria from fecal matter that can transfer from your cup into your body, potentially causing harmful conditions such as toxic shock syndrome and bacterial vaginosis.

Getting up from the stall is no better. If you choose to clean your menstrual cup at the sink, you risk staining your clothes, having to get back in a long line for a stall, or experiencing undue stigma from others at the sink. Even once clean, a slippery cup can end up on the dirty bathroom floor. Are you sure it’s safe to reinsert with just a scrub at the sink?

The FLOW is the revolutionary device designed to address these needs and to build more environmentally and financially sustainable habits without sacrificing hygiene. The first of its kind, the FLOW combines rotational energy and UV light to both clean and sanitize any menstrual cup. Simply attach your cup to the inside clip, fill with water, give it a spin, and empty out before turning on the UV light. 

Having one housing that cleans, dries, and sanitizes eliminates unnecessary steps associated with handling the menstrual cup, lessening the chance of dropping it! Even if it’s dropped, the 60 second UV cycle is at the user’s disposal right away.

The small size and water bottle-esque design is meant to make your period care portable and discreet. The USB rechargeable battery guarantees multiple uses between charges. Use in a bathroom stall, the great outdoors, or at home; no matter where you travel with the FLOW, it's guaranteed to make your period care routine better for your wallet and for the environment.

The roots of this project began at Columbia University as part of our senior design capstone, and we have already invested a full year of active ideation, consumer research, computer animated prototyping, and functional embodiment testing with frequent feedback from industry experts in machining and design.

Our story, like most people in the world today, has been impacted by COVID-19. As members of the class of 2020, our time and access to on-campus resources was cut short without warning, losing over two months of access to tools, machinery, and materials as well as access to course funding. This interruption prevented us from being able to finish proofing a full prototype, but despite newfound challenges with remote work and lack of machine shop access, the work on FLOW has never stopped. Since leaving campus, we have pressed forward with design software ideation, rendering a variety of embodiments for the physical mechanisms of FLOW such as cleaning, sanitizing, and power solutions. These embodiments have been used to populate our provisional patent, which has given us a year of time to finalize our design and raise money to support a full patent application. The following timeline displays the work that is still needed to bring the FLOW to market.

Other period care products seek to keep users captive with monthly recurring costs, but the FLOW empowers users to use their long lasting menstrual cup wherever they go. For this reason, FLOW has the ability to help reduce period poverty across the globe. Period poverty is the inadequate access to menstrual hygiene tools and education, including but not limited to sanitary products, washing facilities, and waste management.2 Current efforts to address period poverty are met with significant costs, given that stocks of single-use products are quickly depleted, and are often of poor quality, sometimes even necessitating the use of multiple products at once for adequate care. The longevity of menstrual cups makes them an ideal product to meet the needs of individuals facing period poverty, and the FLOW could be adapted to address the current barriers to its usage in low and middle income settings. Our prototyping efforts will also include explorations of embodiments that could be included in the FLOW such as water filtration systems and alternative power supplies such as solar power and oscillatory power that would functionalize it for these settings.

We feel that menstruators everywhere deserve a design process that starts and ends with them: we design with users' needs at the center and build our technology from there. Consumer feedback is the key to our success: with your input, we are empowered to find meaningful solutions.

FLOW Period LLC is a majority women team of Ivy League trained mechanical engineers/entrepreneurs with a new vision of period care. Our team is excited to bring forth this revolutionary menstruation product into the world, and we hope you'll join us!

To bring this product to life, we need your help. Prototyping materials and machinery will be the first focus of funding. This will consist of items such as a 3D printer, printable plastic, machine shop access, and machinist time. The next focus of funding will be obtaining design software licenses to actively adapt our computer-aided designs as we perform testing. Any remaining funds will go towards the legal and filing fees associated with the creation of FLOW Period LLC and our patent interests. 

We are excited to be in this together with you, and as such we want to thank you for being a contributor with some cool perks listed at the top of the page!

Can’t donate right now? That's okay! Share with us your period experience through this Google Form- What do you like? What could be better? What should our product include? Even if you don't use a menstrual cup we'd love to hear your feedback to inform our design.

Share us on Facebook and Twitter to be a part of the period care revolution! Go with the FLOW!

Check out our website and follow us on Instagram for updates and upcoming features about FLOW and the FLOW team!

All illustrations and animations by Esmeralda Durón.

story:
Short Summary

“ Infectious Disease the Greatest Enemy of all"

“False negative test results come from inadequate nasal sample collection, the NACD product is a home run solution for collection of patients’ samples” 

R. Jeff Lanzolatta CEO  Pacific Toxicology Laboratories

Core Diagnostics Solution:

For anyone that's been tested for the COVID19 virus, they understand how uncomfortable the swab collection method can be.


The world is in desperate need of an easy-to-use, less invasive method to collect nasal samples for respiratory testing.Core Diagnostic (CoreDx) Patented Nasopharyngeal Aspirate Collection Device "NACD" will address the collection issues.  The amount of live virus in a small volume nasal swab specimen may be critically less than that in a sample obtained by nasal aspiration. For this reason, Nasopharyngeal aspirates or nasal wash specimens are generally considered the specimens of choice for the detection of respiratory viruses.

Unfortunately, obtaining an aspirate using conventional nasal aspirators can be cumbersome, and it requires a specialized device such as an electric suction/vacuum device.  These features make it unfeasible for widespread use in clinical practice, not to mention unpleasant for the patient.  For anyone that has been tested for the COVID19 virus, often say it how uncomfortable the swab collection method can be.  The world is in desperate need of an easy-to-use, less invasivemethod to collect nasal samples for respiratory testing.

Deep swabbing method 

CoreDxSolution 

CoreDx NACD Collection method. 

CoreDx Product development team has designed a single-use and easy to use nasal wash aspirator. In this design, a fixed amount of sterile fluid is gently sprayed, through an innovative dispensing nozzle, into a patient’s nasal passage and then aspirated back into the vial. The vial with sterile fluid and nozzle is fully integrated into one unit, so the wash and aspiration can be done in one single step. No separate vacuum device is necessary making it feasible to use by clinicians and patients. The number one reason for false negative test, "not enough sample size to evaluate" the NACD will provide the lab tech with enough of the patient’s sample to help eliminate a false negative result. Our NACD is a nasal sample collection device design for patient comfort and convenience. Our design is flexible so it can be kitted with various diagnostic test from multiple market segments.

CoreDx's NACD

 -Accurate - eliminates false positives and negatives due to larger sample size

-Less evasive method of collecting nasal samples for respiratory testing. 

- Affordable - all the advantages over the swab at the same price!


We are seeking funds to complete the Sterilization Protocol Validation & FDA/EUA certification. 
                - Free aspirator device for $25 contribution
                - Convertible Note investment available - $10K minimum investment
With your support, we can launch the NACD and make the respiratory sample collection used in testing easier for all.    

Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ

story:
Even if you’re totally new to the world of meditation, you’ll able to grasp the techniques of meditation and experience notable changes within minutes. You’ll be pleasantly surprised how Mindnap helps you enhance yourself and your well-being! 

 

Mindnap will guide your breathing through vibration intensity. 

 

 

Inhale when the vibrations become stronger and exhale when they become softer. This guided intuition provides you with a clear navigation point. Your mind will find its way like a boat finding the shore amidst the roaring sea.

 

Mindnap’s vibrating frequency can be adjusted or switched off manually. From there, you will be able to set up and follow a simple and easy to follow guide that keeps you on track without losing your breath or rhythm.

 

While meditating, the biosignal sensor embedded inside Mindnap will continuously monitor your meditation stage and physical status accurately. All data will then be transferred to your phone via Bluetooth, analyzed by our unique algorithm, and converted to visual feedback.

 

 

 

It's For Everyone:  Mindnap is suitable for anyone who is interested in meditation. It is ideal for beginners who are eager to learn. To those who are no strangers to meditation, Mindnap provides guidance based on your data, enabling you to reach higher and deeper levels of focus and relaxation.

Our app features a clean, minimalistic yet stylish interface. Anyone interested in meditation can embark on a wonderful journey toward the peak of the health and wellness summit with Mindnap.

 

The app includes meditation and breathing exercises, as well as audio lessons. Whichever you go with, Mindnap will help you better navigate your physical and mental state!

 

 

Breathing Training：Breathing training is a simple way to practice meditation. After choosing a mode, Mindnap will guide your breathing through its unique vibration patterns. Your brain and mental state will be improved within 3-5 minutes.

 

 

Meditation Lessons：Apart from vibration patterns, our guided meditation audios experiences information for you to learn more about meditation. Appealing to both hearing and touch, Mindnap brings you one of the most immersive meditation experiences ever. 

 

All content is free to access.

 

Tracks Your Progress：Mindnap allows you to track your own meditation progress so you can easily set up future training plans.

 

There is only one button on the Mindnap device, which is the On/Off switch. 

 

When life gets stressful or hectic, you can use the dedicated solo mode to engage in breathing exercises even when the device and app are not connected. Simply place a finger on the Mindnap device to get started.

 

 

 

 

 

When traveling, it is advised to store Mindnap in our protective leather case.

story:
MediQ is a revolutionary new household sterilizing and air purifying device that creates a powerful non-toxic disinfectant out of just table salt and tap water.

Portable, affordable, environmentally friendly and baby-safe, the reusable device brings the latest cleaning technology to your home and office.

 

Designed to meet any household needs, MediQ cleans your kitchen, bathroom, living room, car, workplace or anywhere else you need spotless, and want fresh and clean air.

MediQ challenges the common belief that you need toxic and dangerous chemicals to clean.

  • Non-Toxic Sterilizing Solution

Spray MediQ on any surface around your household, any hard-to-reach-place and enjoy a chemical-free sterilizing experience.

  • Portable Air-Purifier

Turn on the MediQ Air Purifier and remove dust, mould, fungus and other particles from the air in your home.












Make your own eco-friendly solution at almost no cost. Say goodbye to buying chemical cleaning solutions and solvents (bleach, cleansers, etc.).

You just need table salt and tap water to clean anything with MediQ. This makes any harmful chemical disinfectants obsolete and defines a new eco-friendly sterilizing standard.





Safely sanitize any baby product, as MediQ’s electrolyzed water solution is made of natural ingredients (salt and water), and does not have added fragrances.

Remove and kill pathogens from your pet’s favorite toys, without using any chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Produce your own MediQ solution as many times as you want. In 5-10 minutes, MediQ turns regular salt and water into non-toxic electrolyzed water without the need of refillers or additional devices.















 


 

MediQ Air Purifier freshens up your air to a higher level. It does not just remove bad smells from your surroundings, it can also clean your space from harmful airborne particles, including allergens, germs, car exhaust and industrial pollution (PM2.5).


Remove pollutants that are released by furniture, stoves and plastics, and lower your home’s TVOC (Total Volatile Organic Compounds) levels. You can even use it wirelessly, making it portable and easy to use anywhere – even in your car.


MediQ’s Mist Head allows electrolyzed water to vaporize more effectively, spreading further and wider to occupy the entire space. Place one on your desk or inside your car and it will get rid of all these harmful particles, from floor to ceiling. 
 

 Switching to Air Purifier Mode is simple. Easy to install. Easy to use.All it takes is switching the included head. MediQ takes care of the rest!

 



MediQ has two interchangeable heads for cleaning and purifying.

Spray Head
A few sprays is all it takes to sanitize hands, smartphones and other gadgets, clothing and shoes, door handles and steering wheels, baby toys and pet accessories. The concentrated mist effectively gets to those hard-to-reach places.

Mist Head
The vaporizing technology within the Mist Head spreads nanometer particles of electrolyzed water that are lighter than air. These tiny droplets are 50,000 times smaller than the width of a human hair, and essentially float around the room and capture harmful particles.






 

MediQ can clean and sterilize anytime and anyplace, inside and outside of your home!

Use it in your car, on the plane, in mass transit and more. Wash fresh fruits and vegetables to remove pesticides, clean baby’s and pet’s toys, and purify the air around you.

Home & Office
Clean your floors, furniture and door handles. Wipe fabric or leather surfaces. Rinse with water if needed. The MediQ Air Purifier can also deodorize the air around it. By placing it near new furniture and paint, it will decrease TVOC level.


Kitchen
Spray cooking utensils, stove tops, tables and ovens to clean grease and stains. MediQ reduces odors inside your fridge, and effectively remove pesticide residues and pollutants from the surface of fruit and food products.

 

Bathroom
Keep your bathroom clean and sterilized with MediQ. Use it just like bleach and detergent – pour it down the toilet bowl and sink, and soak washcloths to clean floor and wall tiles. It will also stop the growth of fungi and mold.

Baby Products & Pet Accessories
Make sensitive items safe by spraying them with non-toxic MediQ and rinsing with tap water. As MediQ’s solution does not react with fabric, plastic and paint, you don’t have to worry about damaging the items.


Car Interior
Clean your car’s dashboard, steering wheel, seats, and carpets, and remove unwanted scents from the air. Freshen up the air by turning on the Air Purifier – it removes all smells from tobacco smoke to stale food.










 

The above video shows MediQ contains sterilization function. The amount of microorganism has decreased significantly after spraying EO water on the items. 

 








Our everyday household cleaning products are a threat to nature and the environment for a number of reasons:

The chemicals in many cleaners contribute to smog and are toxic to animals.

The plastic packages do not decompose and their re-use may cause unexpected and unwanted chemical reactions, which can be dangerous to people and the natural environment. 

Replacing new cleaners consumes lots of plastic bottles. More than 80 billion bottles per year are cast adrift into our oceans and landfills with each bottle taking over 400 years to decompose.

At MediQ we are committed to developing products and solutions that are 100%  environmentally sound. Our CleanTech solution, composed of table salt and tap water, is 100% natural and evaporates after spaying. It doesn’t cause any harm to the ozone layer, doesn’t leave any harmful residue remains and doesn’t add harmful chemicals to the water cycle.

Switch your cleaning products to MediQ now to reduce toxic waste and pollutants. It's everyone's responsibility to save the planet!

It's everyone's responsibility to save the planet. MediQ solution is 100% natural. As it is generated with merely salt and water, the solution will naturally evaporate after spaying. No harmful residue remains.  Switch your cleaning products to MediQ now to reduce toxic waste and pollutants.


MediQ shares in the responsibility to preserve the Earth too. When you support MediQ, we donate 1% of all proceeds to our charity partner Project AWARE.

Project AWARE is at the forefront of emerging ocean issues and pressing global challenges. We engage in global movements for ocean protection and marine conservation. Our actions push local and global changes to improve the situation of our oceans and the communities that depend on them.
 



























MediQ generates Hypochlorous Acid and OH Radicals by electrolyzing table salt and tap water.

Hypochlorous Acid is produced naturally in your white blood cells. It eradicates all sorts of fungus and micro-bacteria. Outside of human organisms, this substance works like a non-toxic, non-alcoholic, kid- and pet-friendly bleach. It is suitable for sterilizing food, vegetables, baby pacifiers and pet toys.

Commonly found in cleaning agents, the OH Radical is a powerful natural cleanser that removes all pollutants. MediQ generates OH radicals less concentrated than other conventional cleaning agents, and they perform the same task even better. You can enjoy a safer way to clean, while still disinfecting your surroundings effectively.















 





Refer some of above pictures from our production line .We have completed the pilot production already. Our first batch will start shipping on October and we will fulfill the orders of express delivery on time. We can't wait to get yours to your home.

 




MediQ was established by a group of innovative and energetic young designers and engineers with a passion for CleanTech. We have been focused for years on the industrial and agricultural application of Electrolysis Water (EO Water).

This multipurpose cleaning solution is cost-efficient, effective and does not induce harm or allergies. After years of studying and applying this technology, our team has further improved it such that it is suitable for family use.

As the MediQ team, we will continue to utilize the latest technology to create a positive and sustainable future. We will always look for the best way to bring a safe, comfortable, clean and sustainable environment for the people and generations beyond.
story_txt:
MediQ is a revolutionary new household sterilizing and air purifying device that creates a powerful non-toxic disinfectant out of just table salt and tap water.Portable, affordable, environmentally friendly and baby-safe, the reusable device brings the latest cleaning technology to your home and office. Designed to meet any household needs, MediQ cleans your kitchen, bathroom, living room, car, workplace or anywhere else you need spotless, and want fresh and clean air.MediQ challenges the common belief that you need toxic and dangerous chemicals to clean.Non-Toxic Sterilizing SolutionSpray MediQ on any surface around your household, any hard-to-reach-place and enjoy a chemical-free sterilizing experience.Portable Air-PurifierTurn on the MediQ Air Purifier and remove dust, mould, fungus and other particles from the air in your home.Make your own eco-friendly solution at almost no cost. Say goodbye to buying chemical cleaning solutions and solvents (bleach, cleansers, etc.).You just need table salt and tap water to clean anything with MediQ. This makes any harmful chemical disinfectants obsolete and defines a new eco-friendly sterilizing standard.Safely sanitize any baby product, as MediQ’s electrolyzed water solution is made of natural ingredients (salt and water), and does not have added fragrances.Remove and kill pathogens from your pet’s favorite toys, without using any chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.Produce your own MediQ solution as many times as you want. In 5-10 minutes, MediQ turns regular salt and water into non-toxic electrolyzed water without the need of refillers or additional devices.  MediQ Air Purifier freshens up your air to a higher level. It does not just remove bad smells from your surroundings, it can also clean your space from harmful airborne particles, including allergens, germs, car exhaust and industrial pollution (PM2.5).Remove pollutants that are released by furniture, stoves and plastics, and lower your home’s TVOC (Total Volatile Organic Compounds) levels. You can even use it wirelessly, making it portable and easy to use anywhere – even in your car.MediQ’s Mist Head allows electrolyzed water to vaporize more effectively, spreading further and wider to occupy the entire space. Place one on your desk or inside your car and it will get rid of all these harmful particles, from floor to ceiling.   Switching to Air Purifier Mode is simple. Easy to install. Easy to use.All it takes is switching the included head. MediQ takes care of the rest! MediQ has two interchangeable heads for cleaning and purifying.Spray HeadA few sprays is all it takes to sanitize hands, smartphones and other gadgets, clothing and shoes, door handles and steering wheels, baby toys and pet accessories. The concentrated mist effectively gets to those hard-to-reach places.Mist HeadThe vaporizing technology within the Mist Head spreads nanometer particles of electrolyzed water that are lighter than air. These tiny droplets are 50,000 times smaller than the width of a human hair, and essentially float around the room and capture harmful particles. MediQ can clean and sterilize anytime and anyplace, inside and outside of your home!Use it in your car, on the plane, in mass transit and more. Wash fresh fruits and vegetables to remove pesticides, clean baby’s and pet’s toys, and purify the air around you.Home & OfficeClean your floors, furniture and door handles. Wipe fabric or leather surfaces. Rinse with water if needed. The MediQ Air Purifier can also deodorize the air around it. By placing it near new furniture and paint, it will decrease TVOC level.KitchenSpray cooking utensils, stove tops, tables and ovens to clean grease and stains. MediQ reduces odors inside your fridge, and effectively remove pesticide residues and pollutants from the surface of fruit and food products. BathroomKeep your bathroom clean and sterilized with MediQ. Use it just like bleach and detergent – pour it down the toilet bowl and sink, and soak washcloths to clean floor and wall tiles. It will also stop the growth of fungi and mold.Baby Products & Pet AccessoriesMake sensitive items safe by spraying them with non-toxic MediQ and rinsing with tap water. As MediQ’s solution does not react with fabric, plastic and paint, you don’t have to worry about damaging the items.Car InteriorClean your car’s dashboard, steering wheel, seats, and carpets, and remove unwanted scents from the air. Freshen up the air by turning on the Air Purifier – it removes all smells from tobacco smoke to stale food. The above video shows MediQ contains sterilization function. The amount of microorganism has decreased significantly after spraying EO water on the items.

story:
I developed The Good Buggies initially with no other goal in mind other than to help my own daughter.  When she was 3 years old, I had discovered that her gut health was the root cause behind the tantrums, rashes,  and chronic inflammation she had developed. 

I thought we ate pretty healthy, but little did I know at the time that her gut health was likely compromised  since birth, when I was put on broad spectrum antibiotics - as so many are! Researchers estimate that over 40% of women are given an antibiotic immediately before delivery.  By the time my daughter was 3 years old, she had been on a course of antibiotics, and her palate started getting pickier.  


Once we finally put the pieces together, we did lab testing for her which found significant gut imbalance. including candida (yeast overgrowth) and  low levels of good bacteria... I was ready to make some serious changes! And once I explained it to my daughter, she was on board too... she wanted to help her "good buggies" win. 

 

But we still had some major problems when it came time to giving her probiotics... aka "good buggies":


 

So, we had to go back to square one. In order to find the best probiotic, I thought about how to get probiotics naturally, WITHOUT a supplement.

And I found the answer...

FERMENTED FOODS!

Historians have traced fermented foods back THOUSANDS of years, and up until a couple of generations ago, our ancestors used to eat fermented foods daily - so they were "taking their probiotics" naturally every single day!

 

When we eat those raw, fermented foods, we are taking in TONS of good bacteria that are live and active - they are STRONG, and get to work right away!   

But what about the probiotic supplements? Aren't they "live" too?  Those powders, gummies, and chewables might "technically" be live, but they are certainly not active - most probiotic supplements are completely dormant because they've been so highly processed. 

This means the good bacteria in them are very weak, and need to slowly "wake up" and come alive again once they make it through to the gut (many of those won't even survive that far... which is why those probiotics need to be loaded up with billions of CFU!).

 

But most children these days don't want to eat raw sauerkraut and kimchi every day...

 

That was my problem! And I worked hard to solve it, and my goal is to help even more kids in the process...

A fermented food-based probiotic... that is KID-APPROVED!


 

I couldn’t find a product anything like what I was looking for, so I decided to partner with a lab and create it myself!

A fermented probiotic with
live and active cultures,
that actually tastes delicious, 
doesn’t need to be hidden in your child’s food or drink (because we’re not hiding health, right?!),
and is made with organic and natural ingredients!

And it starts working right away, because it’s made with live and active cultures that have excellent survivability, are strong and ready to get to work as soon as they enter the body, just like a true fermented food.

I’ve developed this with an amazing lab that also “gets it.” They use the highest standards of 3rd party independent lab testing to ensure product safety, and use only high quality
ingredients. These probiotics are made fresh in small batches as opposed to other probiotics that sit on shelves or in warehouses and lose their potency over time.

We have scrutinized over every single detail for you to make sure we are making the best product.

We Are Proud of Our Ingredients:

Organic Kombucha SCOBY (Symbiotic Cultures of Bacteria and Yeast), Organic Freeze Dried Strawberries, Organic Cane Sugar (Used For Fermentation), Water, Agar Agar

Each serving of GoodBuggies Probiotics contains 18 Million CFUs that are live and active!

*This product has not been evaluated by the FDA and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

With your help, we can make this product a reality, and help a whole generation of kids in the process!

What We Need & What You Get

In order to be able to start production of this revolutionary product, we need to commit 500 orders a month to the lab, for at least one year.  But whether your're shouting from the rooftops & ready to subscribe, or you can't wait to just try it out, we have amazing perks available for you!

To thank you for your generosity in contributing to this amazing product, we are excited to offer you these HUGE discounts... plus, we are SO confident that your kids will LOVE GoodBuggies Probiotics that we are offering a 100% Money Back Guarantee.

  • 30 Day Supply: Your $27 Contribution gets you a 30-Day Supply of GoodBuggies Probiotics  (Retail: $32) 
    • 15% OFF 
  • FAMILY PACK:  Your $75 Contribution gets you a 3 pack of our 30-Day Supply of GoodBuggies Probiotics (Total Retail: $96)
    • 21% OFF
  • 6 MO SUBSCRIPTION: Your $137 Contribution gets you a 6 Month Supply of GoodBuggies Probiotics - We ship you a pack EVERY month for 6 MONTHS at just $22.83/mo.!) (Total Retail: $192)
    • 28% OFF
  • 1 YR SUBSCRIPTION DELUXE PACKAGE: Your $274 Contribution gets you a:
    •  a 1 Year Supply of GoodBuggies Probiotics - We ship you a pack EVERY month for 12 MONTHS at just $22.83/mo.! PLUS...
    • 1 FREE copy of my children's book, The Buggies in Bella's Belly +
    • 1 FREE copy of my parent's guide book, Let Kids Be Kids: The Parent's Guide to Gut Health
    • (TOTAL Retail: $436.90)
      • 37% OFF

Let's Do This Together!

I need YOUR help to spread the word! Join my mission to help kids & families everywhere. 

  • Share share share! Get the word out and let's make some noise about this revolutionary probiotic! 

Here's to Happy, Healthy, Kids!
