story:
Do you find products on the ground difficult?

 

 

Problems with products on the ground:

  • Difficult to maneuver
  • Can't control pressure
  • Painful 
  • Let's face it- most people deal with pain and injuries at home and most products in this space are designed to be mobile which has significant challenges.   Knot Therapy Systems was specifically designed for effectiveness and ease of use in mind

 

 

Frustration using these products led to the creation of Knot Therapy Systems (KTS).  So what is special about KTS?

  • Wall-Mounted: gets the user off the ground and allows user to control pressure 
  • Fully Adjustable: allowing the user to quickly adjust the unit to desired need
  • Multiple Attachments: allowing user to target specific areas or massage a general area
  • Simply put, KTS is the fastest and most effective way to get rid of Knots or Trigger Points through Self-Massage Period.

 

 

 

 

 

Why KTS?  

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

Do you struggle with Neck pain?  

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

Do you struggle with upper back pain between the shoulder blades?

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 Managing Multiple Sclerosis using KTS

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

The Truth About Back Pain

The number of Americans experiencing lower back pain and problems is on the rise. Typically, 54% of Americans who experience low back pain spend the majority of their workday sitting. Here's the lowdown on back pain in America and the reasons why KTS offers relief for so many.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Upright Advantage

The "Upright Advantage" is a term we use to describe the benefits of the wall-mounted KTS. KTS and the Upright Advantage fully avoids problems with ground-based movements and tools, such as foam rollers, balls of all sorts of shapes, sizes and hardness. Using tennis and lacrosse balls on the ground and on the wall is very difficult and not very effective. The ground is hard to maneuver, you cannot control pressure, the floor is dirty and makes it difficult to target specific areas, especially if you are dealing with pain.

The Upright Advantage gets users off the ground and allows them to control the pressure onto the targeted muscles with ease and adjust massage units to desired position, all while muscles are in a more relaxed state to increase results. A system with the ease of use and adjustability of KTS encourages and promotes more frequent use and allows the user to enjoy the same benefits as a massage multiple times a day. The ease of use KTS offers allows all markets to enjoy the benefits it can bring, including chronic pain sufferers, patients with neurological conditions, patients with degenerative disk disease, obese, athletes, office employees and the list goes on.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Using KTS for Back Pain

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What is Self Myofascial Release (SMR)?

Fascia is a tough connective tissue that is found throughout the body that surrounds and attaches to all structures from head to toe. When healthy, it can stretch and move without restriction. Trauma such as poor posture, sports, car accidents, working in front of a computer daily etc cause the Fascia to become stressed, cause inflammation, and adhesions form (commonly referred to as Trigger Points). The formation of adhesions can cause pain, muscle imbalances, reduced blood flow to surrounding muscles and tissue and prevent recovery. The Fascia becomes tight and restricted and enables tension to grow in the rest of the body.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How Exercise Physiologist & Fitness Expert Chuck Wolf uses KTS

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Benefits of KTS

  • User controls pressure which allows the user to find difficult to get to knots
  • Easily adjusts and can get to knots from head to toe
  • Stationary ball away from the wall allows the user to dig into the tissue and pin down knots
  • Multiple attachments allow the user to use the system as a massage tool or if you have a specific area of pain you can target that, as well
  • Wall mounted allows the user to to easily find knots and use movement to breakdown those knots.  Ease of use promotes daily use.
  • Therapy band Ring-Attachment allows the user to use bands to increase desired pressure and get deep into the tissue.
  • KTS system can double as a piece of exercise equipment.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

KTS helps someone recover from 3 Level C-Spine Disk Replacement

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Made in the USA

KTS is proudly manufactured in Colorado.

 

Preparing for the Indiegogo Campaign

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

The goal for our campaign is to raise $2,500 which will go towards lowering manufacturing costs. If we fail to meet our goal, we will still fill every order and delivery for all products will be within 2-4 months. 

As well, our first 50 backers will receive early delivery (March 2020) and at atleast a 50% discounted price for the KTS. But, most importantly, you will begin enjoying the life-changing benefits KTS can bring.

Your support of KTS and this campaign will have a huge impact on the success of our product and you can enjoy the many benefits KTS can bring to your life.

  • Experience the ease of use KTS offers in the comfort of your own home
  • Treat and prevent back pain, injuries and muscular pain and imbalances to feel  better, sleep better and do more in your life
  • Shift your own focus from injury treatment to long-term injury prevention by using KTS daily

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Knot Therapy Systems Story

I'm Scott Steven the inventor of Knot Therapy Systems (KTS). My motivation for creating KTS came from suffering back pain for over 20 years and spending countless hours on every imaginable therapy to relieve my back pain. When the therapies worked, and I got to the point where I was pain free, I wanted a method to prevent these annoying and painful injuries from reoccurring.

Being a golf professional made it challenging to address my back pain as the golf swing movement in itself is not exactly good for the spine. I saw numerous therapists who all stressed the importance of massage, stretching, foam rollers, therapy balls, and more to keep my muscles loose and to address any sore spots right away. I started rolling my back out on tennis and lacrosse balls on the ground and against a wall, and would get very frustrated. I wanted to come up with a way to keep the ball stationary so that I could better and more easily target specific sore spots on my back. This was the beginning of KTS.

I quickly went to work on a prototype at my family's machine shop, and within a few hours I had a working product as shown (pic). As soon as I mounted it and used it for the first time, I knew immediately that it exceeded my expectations, and it had an immediate impact on my golf game, as well. I was able to completely control pressure and angles, and I had the ability to target very specific areas on my back, arms, neck, and shoulders. My weakness has always been lower back (specifically L4 and L5) and with KTS, I was finally able to really target my piriformis muscle (a contributor to lower back tightness) like never before.  It is something that is part of my daily routine as I use it every morning, after work, and before I go to bed, usually for about a minute each time.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Importance of Prevention

This campaign is especially important to me as I believe so many injuries and muscular related problems could be prevented if more time was spent taking care of your healthy body as opposed to taking care of it when it breaks down. KTS does exactly that:

  • KTS allows you to quickly and comfortably treat pain and injuries, prevent injuries, increase range of motion, and correct muscle imbalances.
  • KTS not only addresses problems as they come up, but used on a daily basis KTS can help prevent future problems. Using KTS even 2-3 minutes a day can significantly reduce recurring injuries and revent new problems from occurring. 

By supporting this campaign you will be contributing to the injury prevention movement which, in the real world, is an area that most people do not focus enough of their time and energy on. At KTS, we believe you will be so satisfied with the results and ease of use of this product that you will be buying it for others, as well.

 

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? That's okay. You can help us in other ways that will also make a meaningful impact on our success. Help us get the word out about KTS! Tell your friends, like and share our videos on social media, help us make some noise about Knot Therapy Systems.

The Upright Advantage
The "Upright Advantage" is a term we use to describe the benefits of the wall-mounted KTS. KTS and the Upright Advantage fully avoids problems with ground-based movements and tools, such as foam rollers, balls of all sorts of shapes, sizes and hardness. Using tennis and lacrosse balls on the ground and on the wall is very difficult and not very effective. The ground is hard to maneuver, you cannot control pressure, the floor is dirty and makes it difficult to target specific areas, especially if you are dealing with pain.
The Upright Advantage gets users off the ground and allows them to control the pressure onto the targeted muscles with ease and adjust massage units to desired position, all while muscles are in a more relaxed state to increase results. A system with the ease of use and adjustability of KTS encourages and promotes more frequent use and allows the user to enjoy the same benefits as a massage multiple times a day. The ease of use KTS offers allows all markets to enjoy the benefits it can bring, including chronic pain sufferers, patients with neurological conditions, patients with degenerative disk disease, obese, athletes, office employees and the list goes on.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Using KTS for Back Pain


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What is Self Myofascial Release (SMR)?
Fascia is a tough connective tissue that is found throughout the body that surrounds and attaches to all structures from head to toe. When healthy, it can stretch and move without restriction. Trauma such as poor posture, sports, car accidents, working in front of a computer daily etc cause the Fascia to become stressed, cause inflammation, and adhesions form (commonly referred to as Trigger Points). The formation of adhesions can cause pain, muscle imbalances, reduced blood flow to surrounding muscles and tissue and prevent recovery. The Fascia becomes tight and restricted and enables tension to grow in the rest of the body.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

How Exercise Physiologist & Fitness Expert Chuck Wolf uses KTS


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The Benefits of KTS

User controls pressure which allows the user to find difficult to get to knots
Easily adjusts and can get to knots from head to toe
Stationary ball away from the wall allows the user to dig into the tissue and pin down knots
Multiple attachments allow the user to use the system as a massage tool or if you have a specific area of pain you can target that, as well
Wall mounted allows the user to to easily find knots and use movement to breakdown those knots.  Ease of use promotes daily use.
Therapy band Ring-Attachment allows the user to use bands to increase desired pressure and get deep into the tissue.
KTS system can double as a piece of exercise equipment.


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
KTS helps someone recover from 3 Level C-Spine Disk Replacement

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Made in the USA
KTS is proudly manufactured in Colorado.

 
Preparing for the Indiegogo Campaign

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What We Need & What You Get

The goal for our campaign is to raise $2,500 which will go towards lowering manufacturing costs. If we fail to meet our goal, we will still fill every order and delivery for all products will be within 2-4 months. 
As well, our first 50 backers will receive early delivery (March 2020) and at atleast a 50% discounted price for the KTS. But, most importantly, you will begin enjoying the life-changing benefits KTS can bring.
Your support of KTS and this campaign will have a huge impact on the success of our product and you can enjoy the many benefits KTS can bring to your life.

Experience the ease of use KTS offers in the comfort of your own home
Treat and prevent back pain, injuries and muscular pain and imbalances to feel  better, sleep better and do more in your life
Shift your own focus from injury treatment to long-term injury prevention by using KTS daily

 
 
 
 
 
 

The Knot Therapy Systems Story

I'm Scott Steven the inventor of Knot Therapy Systems (KTS). My motivation for creating KTS came from suffering back pain for over 20 years and spending countless hours on every imaginable therapy to relieve my back pain. When the therapies worked, and I got to the point where I was pain free, I wanted a method to prevent these annoying and painful injuries from reoccurring.
Being a golf professional made it challenging to address my back pain as the golf swing movement in itself is not exactly good for the spine. I saw numerous therapists who all stressed the importance of massage, stretching, foam rollers, therapy balls, and more to keep my muscles loose and to address any sore spots right away. I started rolling my back out on tennis and lacrosse balls on the ground and against a wall, and would get very frustrated. I wanted to come up with a way to keep the ball stationary so that I could better and more easily target specific sore spots on my back. This was the beginning of KTS.
I quickly went to work on a prototype at my family's machine shop, and within a few hours I had a working product as shown (pic). As soon as I mounted it and used it for the first time, I knew immediately that it exceeded my expectations, and it had an immediate impact on my golf game, as well. I was able to completely control pressure and angles, and I had the ability to target very specific areas on my back, arms, neck, and shoulders. My weakness has always been lower back (specifically L4 and L5) and with KTS, I was finally able to really target my piriformis muscle (a contributor to lower back tightness) like never before.  It is something that is part of my daily routine as I use it every morning, after work, and before I go to bed, usually for about a minute each time.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
The Importance of Prevention

This campaign is especially important to me as I believe so many injuries and muscular related problems could be prevented if more time was spent taking care of your healthy body as opposed to taking care of it when it breaks down. KTS does exactly that:

KTS allows you to quickly and comfortably treat pain and injuries, prevent injuries, increase range of motion, and correct muscle imbalances.
KTS not only addresses problems as they come up, but used on a daily basis KTS can help prevent future problems. Using KTS even 2-3 minutes a day can significantly reduce recurring injuries and revent new problems from occurring. 

By supporting this campaign you will be contributing to the injury prevention movement which, in the real world, is an area that most people do not focus enough of their time and energy on. At KTS, we believe you will be so satisfied with the results and ease of use of this product that you will be buying it for others, as well.
 
 
 
 
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Can't contribute? That's okay. You can help us in other ways that will also make a meaningful impact on our success. Help us get the word out about KTS! Tell your friends, like and share our videos on social media, help us make some noise about Knot Therapy Systems.

story:
Let's be real - brushing your teeth is boring.

It's TEDIOUS.

It's so mundane that you go on auto-pilot, so that you can focus on more important stuff (like the delicious bowl of Weet-Bix you're about to demolish...)

It was on one of these mornings that I was standing in the shower, mindlessly brushing, when I randomly started thinking about the impact of my 2-minute routine...

"Why does toothpaste come in a plastic tube?"

"What's actually inside this stuff?"

"What's with the bright blue colour?"

Hmm.

As I asked myself these questions, I wondered why nobody had given toothpaste the 'glow up' that so many other products were given.

Products like shampoos and face washes were all over my Instagram feed, yet my toothpaste was an ~ancient relic~ from the 1800s that nobody had bothered to improve.

In fact...

I hated everything about my toothpaste.

It tasted awful, like the kind of burning sensation you get when you drink tequila straight from the bottle (we've all been there).

It was ugly - I always had to hide it in my bathroom drawer when guests came over and somehow it would find a way to leech sticky paste all over my makeup and hair ties.

I couldn't travel with it, out of fear that it would explode in my luggage** and ruin all my belongings.

**Has happened before

I couldn't pronounce half of the ingredients, and some of the ingredients were literally just numbers - surely that couldn't be a good sign...

And don't even get me started on the single-use plastic tube.

So.

I had a decision to make.

a) Would I just have to suck it up and accept that toothpaste is just a bit... crap?

b) Would I vow to never brush my teeth again in the name of sustainability, risk having no teeth left and being nicknamed 'gummy' by the time I was thirty?

Or...

c) Could I do something about it?

On that day, I set out on a crazy mission... to revolutionise the oral care industry, and build the world's most sustainable personal care company.

Welcome to the future of oral care.

 

 

 

 

Our Closed-Loop System

We've designed our tooth tabs with people and the planet in mind - which is why we've created a closed-loop system for your oral care! For your first order, you'll receive 90 tabs in a reusable glass jar - and when you run out, you can simply order one of our compostable refill packs, so that you can reuse your original jar over and over again.

You can opt-in to a subscription to put your tooth tab refills on auto-pilot, and they'll be delivered straight to your door every 6 weeks (carbon-neutral, of course).

 

The Eco-Nightmare of Toothpaste

Regular toothpaste just isn't good for the environment - there's no doubt about it. Not only is it packaged in single-use plastic (that's extremely difficult to recycle), but it's also pumped with toxic chemicals that wash into our waterways and affect our marine life.

Over a billion toothpaste tubes end up in our landfills and oceans every year.

This number doesn't even include plastic toothbrushes, dental floss (which is made of plastic), floss containers, mouthwash bottles, or plastic dental picks... scary!!

 

 

Rewards Breakdown

 

 

How do you get to work?


Do you catch a bus?

Maybe you drive?

Maybe ride your bike?

It’s something you do every day - you might not even think about it.

But what if…

One day, you woke up to find your opal card gone…

Somebody’s taken the car for a spin.

Or maybe your bike’s even gone for a ride of its own?

Disaster, right?

Not to worry though!

You’ve got your great, great pop’s horse and buggy in the backyard.

Great!

After all, it’s more or less the same thing…

Isn’t it?

It might be a ride that’s twice as uncomfortable, take you three times as long and quadruple the weird looks you get on a daily basis?

But it gets you to the same destination…

Right????

…..

We both know that’s wrong.

And for one simple reason...

It’s outdated technology.

Your toothpaste is sort of like that.

Today we have electric cars, biodegradable toothbrushes and eco-friendly bathroom products…

But we’re still using dirty, grimey, soft plastic toothpaste tubes…

Doesn’t make much sense, does it?

You see, all of the above products keep growing in the market…

Flying off the shelves…

And helping the Earth heal each and every day.

But do you know how many toothpaste tubes ended up in landfills last year?

Over a billion.

And with the majority of those trapped in non-biodegradable packaging…

That’s a whole lot of ancient technology being added to the floating junk island in the pacific!

But there’s a better way....

Our tooth tabs were designed specifically to kick your horse-and-buggy riding toothpaste tube back to where the sun don’t shine…

(which is its chimney sweeping job in the 1800s)....

And take its rightful place on the futuristic bathroom throne!

story:
Launched on International Women's Day 2019, our Period Dignity Project aims to establish a women-run rural factory that manufactures clean, affordable sanitary pads for distribution via woman-to-woman networks of small self-help groups, social centers, and nongovernmental organizations. These networks will link women in rural communities where access to menstrual hygiene products manufactured by well-known companies is rare.

Our project will provide employment and independent income opportunities for 6 to 10 women who will be trained to make and distribute the pads as well as provide menstrual health and hygiene education through science-based community outreach programs. These pads and education will be provided to school-age girls in order to help them manage their period and avoid compromising their class attendance and academic possibilities.

Our project will provide employment and independent income opportunities for 6 to 10 women who will be trained to make and distribute the pads as well as provide menstrual health and hygiene education through science-based community outreach programs. story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Jannah Hancock. I want to inspire you to live your best life! I am a Health and Wellness Coach, Podcaster and the author of “Feel GOOD and GET Tough with Your HEALTH”. I am passionate about Health and Wellness. Feel GOOD and GET Tough is about feeling good about the choices you make by using self-discipline to accomplish your goals. This concept can be applied to all areas of your life and can help you accomplish goals you thought were impossible. What this campaign is about is helping me build a community that can support each other on their journey to become happier, healthier and how to enjoy living a life you love to the fullest every single day. This is about coming together with common goals to help each other in discovering your passion and what drives you and help support you in accomplishing what's most important in your life. 

Over the last 15 years I dedicated my life to resolving my own health issues. I wasn't getting satisfactory results with medications. I started keeping a journal of what I was eating and I discovered the secret to feeling good is about the foods you eat. I have found the key to making good decisions is self-discipline.

My book is a new approach to how you look at food and how to enjoy a good quality of life by eating foods you like and discover what foods make you feel good. This is about asking yourself the right questions that help you to make decisions you feel good about, not just right now, but in the future. Mindset also plays a role in how successful we are in accomplishing goals. The community I want to build isn't just about food. It's about taking control of your life and empowering others to do the same.

In this community I want to build; 

  • Educational Seminars - Scheduled roll out October 2020. For everyone that wants to make positive change in their lives. Especially for those that don't have the resources to hire a proffessional coach. I believe everyone has the right to live their best life regardless of race, gender or economic status. These seminars will be built on the premise of teaching you how to fish so you can adequately provide for yourself. Here are some topics;
    • Financial Health
    • Health and Wellness
    • Mental Mindset
    • Relationships
  • A Community Platform - Scheduled roll out January 2021. On my website I want to build a community where members can join the Feel GOOD and GET Tough community and get support from other members, get free information and find a place to get the encourgement they need to succeed. To become a member I want it open FREE to everyone. 

What We Need & What You Get

Feel GOOD and GET Tough has a website built.  We want to bring education and healthy living to more people. Including those that can't afford to purchase these resources. The funding will go towards design of building a secure group community platform on the website,  proffessional video production of seminar programs.

  • $5,000 Contribution Goal - The funds raised will help cover the cost of proffessional video production and editing of 1 Seminar, and some partial design of the group community members area.
    • Each person who contributes will get a free invitation to attend a live group webinar.
  • $10,000 Contribution Goal - The funds raised will help cover the cost of proffessional video production and editing of 2 Seminars, and the cost of design, publishing of community platform for members.
    • Each person will receive a digital download of a Food Journal and a free an invitation to attend 1 live group webinar + 1 free Pantry Makeover kit + 1 group coaching session.
  • $15,000 Contribution Goal - The funds raised will help cover the cost of proffessional video production and editing on 3rd and 4rth Seminars, and and the cost of design, publishing of community platform for members, and access to a whole lot more educational information with free downloads.
    • Each person will receive a digital download of a Food Journal, and a free invitation to attend 2 live group webinars for you and a friend + 2 free Pantry Makeover kits + 1 group coaching session.

The Impact

Combines proven nutrition principals backed with medical data to help achieve normal blood pressure and better health. Can you imagine what kind of difference this will make when people are able to help themselves take control of their own health with education? When you take control of your life with the foods you eat; the impact will make a tremendous difference in your life, and the lives of people you share this information with. It’s amazing how much better you feel when you are eating foods you love and that make you feel good! The people that have tested these principles, find that they feel better and don't want to go back to their eating old habits.

  • Coaching programs and podcasts will be available to more people.
  • For every paperback book purchased, a digital copy of the book will go to someone who has limited resources that is in need of this information.
  • For each one on one coaching session purchased,  a group webinar + a group coaching session will go to someone who has limited resources that is in need of this information.

Risks & Challenges

Most people don't like change and they don't like to change anything in their life. Especially if they know it's good for them. There is too much negative thinking from past diets that have been tried. The biggest challenge that we have, is some people think.. Oh No not another diet. What makes this different?

  • It starts with education. This is a custom tailored plan that you can design yourself according to your individual health needs.
  • You don't deprive yourself of food. You get to eat foods you love. 
  • You eat things that will help you eliminate the cravings that are bad for you.

Other Ways You Can Help

We need to get the word out to more people. The heart logo we use is to represent self love. Change begins with loving yourself first enough that you want to make a positive change. Some people can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • How many people do you know with food allergies?
  • How many people do you know with digestive issues?
  • How many people do you know with health or inflammation issues?
  • How many people do you know with high blood pressure?
  • Share this campaign with friends and family that this could help, by email or social media sites, Facebook messenger, Instagram or Twitter.  

  •  Indiegogo makes it easy to share on social media sites using their tools. Use #FeelGOODandGETough when sharing.

 

Thank you so much for your support!

Other Ways You Can Help
We need to get the word out to more people. The heart logo we use is to represent self love. Change begins with loving yourself first enough that you want to make a positive change. Some people can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

How many people do you know with food allergies?
How many people do you know with digestive issues?
How many people do you know with health or inflammation issues?
How many people do you know with high blood pressure?

 Indiegogo makes it easy to share on social media sites using their tools. Use #FeelGOODandGETough when sharing.

 
Thank you so much for your support!

story:
When the Kids Become the Parents: Have You Felt This Way Too?

You can feel your anxiety increasing as you try to get in touch with your aging parents who live across the country with no luck.

You're on your way to work and your Mom calls, “Can you take me to the hospital, I think I'm having a heart attack.”

So many doctors' visits to coordinate. Ever-changing medication lists. Medical records. Calendars. Powers of Attorney. Living Wills.

You question if the endless medical tests are necessary? Wonder if Dad would do better at an Assisted Living facility? Try to figure out the difference between an acute care and a skilled nursing facility.

YOU ARE NOT ALONE!  More than 48 million Americans look after someone 65 years or older, mostly parents. 

 

 

All of us are dealing with the same questions and struggles along the way. Julia and I have done it, and it's overwhelming, difficult and challenging - whether you are coordinating with siblings across the country or are doing it alone.

 

DON'T BE ALONE IN THIS JOURNEY

You have a community that cares. AltereCares brings together COMMUNITY and provides RESOURCES for families taking care of aging parents.

Don’t get lost in the blind alleys and endless results of online searches when so many others have done this work for you already.

AltereCares collects all of the best information on your parent’s condition, treatment and therapies in one convenient place and gives you the resources you need, when you need them.

Tired of not knowing what you don’t know? And feeling like you are always finding out things just a little too late?

By responding to a few simple questions about your parent’s condition, AltereCares provides timely information based on what you are likely dealing with now and, more importantly, alerts you to issues that you may face in the near future 

called Words of Wisdom or WOWs (catchy huh!?)

 

                                

 

GET ORGANIZED

How do you keep family and friends informed about your parents’ care and well being?

And how do you keep their needs organized and accessible and make communicating with doctors, therapists and caregivers easy?

The AltereCares360 Portal provides a secure, virtual location online that allows you to better manage your parents' care. Centrally locate all of the documents - the medical records, medication lists, powers of attorney, living wills and calendar – so it’s always available to you and your family, near and far.

                                                       

 

MANAGE HOME HEALTH AIDES AND THERAPISTS

Need help keeping track of individuals who care for your parent at home? 

Want an easier way to inform them of your parent’s specific needs and preferences?

The Home Care Coordination Module in the AltereCares360 Portal allows you to provide a video orientation and care notes that aides and therapists can access prior to their visit with your parent. 

They can also upload an Activity Summary of the time spent with your parent so you can stay informed of their progress.

And all of this can be accessed by a few short clicks.

 

KEEP PEOPLE INFORMED IN AN EMERGENCY

Have an urgent situation and need to let everyone know what’s happening?

Push a button and let everyone know what’s happening! The Alert Circle in the AltereCares360 Portal allows you to designate key people that you can notify with the push of a button in urgent situations so you don’t have to make multiple calls or send group texts.

 

                                                           

 

HELP US DEVELOP THE SITE AND GO LIVE, EARLY 2021

We've found an amazing developer with a diverse team and we are already getting started on developing the website and portal, but we need your help to get us to launch in early 2021!

The website and portal will cost $35,000 to develop, and that's assuming everything goes perfectly (hiccups happen but we are working through them!)

We'll launch a cool, hip, social media campaign right around Thanksgiving to start getting the word out right when people start visiting their parents for the holidays and realize how much older their parents are getting.

But who are we kidding, we are middle age, not cool, not hip, not social (although we are big fans of Tik Tok!) 

So we are also raising an additional $15,000 to engage a social media influencer to do her influencer thing and get the word out about AltereCares.

We have every intention of reaching our goal, but if we don't, the funds will still go to the website development and social media campaign to offset the costs. This idea is just too important and too timely to not pursue. 

 

 

Other Core Principles

Diversity and Inclusion - For Reals.

Have we mentioned that diversity and inclusion are core principles for us in all we do? We have both spent years working in and around the healthcare space - me with pharma, diagnostics and device companies, Julia with the medical and payer community and we are tired, TIRED, of business as usual.

First question we asked our developer (ok, first question AFTER we asked if he could build what we wanted) was "tell us about the diversity on your team." His team are men and women of all different backgrounds and nationalities.  

This issue is near and dear to our hearts and Julia and I will not - NOT - build the same old business model where we blah blah blah about diversity and inclusion and have none. Julia is an African American, Cuban woman and I am a white Jewish woman. Our intern team, mostly from Cornell, is white and brown and blue and black (ok, no one is really blue but you take my meaning) and they are Asian, Indian, Caucasian and Israeli. 

We live in a colorful world, our place of business should reflect that beauty. 

AltereCares does and always will.  

 

Giving Back: The Helping Hand Campaign

We are the lucky ones.

Born in the right place, in the right country, to the right families, with all the resources we might need. Even with whatever challenges we faced from gender and ethnicity. We know from the "get go" we had advantages - well before our drive or determination kicked in. We know that others have not been so fortunate. But here's the kicker, fortunate or not, they also have aging parents that need care. And that leaves them just as stressed out, just as overwhelmed and feeling just as alone. If not more so.

 

                   A small helping hand from one family to another. 

 

We pledge that once we go live in early 2021, there will be an option for people to provide matching funds through The Helping Hand Campaign to pay for subscriptions to the AltereCares360 portal for people who can't manage that on their own.

 

What's The Impact?

At AltereCares, our mission is simple: we help you care for those you care about. 

We bring families closer together by organizing and streamlining processes that were previously burdens. At the fingertips of families across the country, our product will empower people to provide the best possible care for their parents without the guesswork, uncertainty, back-and-forth, redundancy - and headaches! 

So you can spend more quality time with them to share the moments that matter.

Our impact is far-reaching through the dynamic community on the AltereCares platform. The more users we have, the more the collective wisdom, research, and resources compound to make AltereCares the ultimate platform for providing elder care. It’s our hope that the network effect of people pooling resources, sharing advice, and warning against mistakes will result in stronger, happier, and healthier families. We firmly believe that our concept will improve the lives of families (and the quality of care for seniors!) 

It is our job to convince the world to join us, one family at a time - starting with yours!

 

Are There Risks & Challenges? 

You have heard it said that nothing worth doing is easy (if only!) Such an ambitious endeavor will not be without its risks and challenges, and we understand that we are not immune. There are mountains to climb, valleys to cross, croc infested waters along the way. Here are some of our anticipated challenges:

     * Generating enough buzz to establish a sustainable subscriber base

     * Establishing relationships with institutional partners in the crowded digital health space

     * Raising sufficient funding to continue operations and building products

     *Obtaining approval from Users to analyze the community conversations with the goal of improving the lives of families looking after seniors and increasing the quality and personalized care for those seniors.

We are confident in the product that we’re offering and its potential to improve lives. As an agile startup with a diverse team bringing together a range of experience, we know that we can find the answers to the challenges in our path and see them as opportunities. 

The only missing piece is YOUR support to help us get there!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

This year has been, shall we say, a challenge. For a lot of us. So we get it if you want to participate but just aren't comfortable spending money on "extras" right now. We get it, we got you and we still want you to be involved.

Only thing better than someone who can donate, is someone with a huge social circle and the time and ability to spread the word! Post about AltereCares on YOUR social media sites, like and comment on our social media posts (we'll let you know when they're up), tell your friends, neighbors, co-workers and colleagues. 

                   and the lady at the corner store. 

                               and that guy on the barstool to your left (6' apart of course.) 

                                                             and your mail carrier. 

and anyone and everyone you can think of!

We'd really appreciate it if you did. 

Stay in touch on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn and Twitter
story_txt: When the Kids Become the Parents: Have You Felt This Way Too?You can feel your anxiety increasing as you try to get in touch with your aging parents who live across the country with no luck.You're on your way to work and your Mom calls, “Can you take me to the hospital, I think I'm having a heart attack.”So many doctors' visits to coordinate. Ever-changing medication lists. Medical records. Calendars. Powers of Attorney. Living Wills.You question if the endless medical tests are necessary? Wonder if Dad would do better at an Assisted Living facility? Try to figure out the difference between an acute care and a skilled nursing facility.YOU ARE NOT ALONE!  More than 48 million Americans look after someone 65 years or older, mostly parents.   All of us are dealing with the same questions and struggles along the way. Julia and I have done it, and it's overwhelming, difficult and challenging - whether you are coordinating with siblings across the country or are doing it alone. DON'T BE ALONE IN THIS JOURNEYYou have a community that cares. AltereCares brings together COMMUNITY and provides RESOURCES for families taking care of aging parents.Don’t get lost in the blind alleys and endless results of online searches when so many others have done this work for you already.AltereCares collects all of the best information on your parent’s condition, treatment and therapies in one convenient place and gives you the resources you need, when you need them.Tired of not knowing what you don’t know? And feeling like you are always finding out things just a little too late?By responding to a few simple questions about your parent’s condition, AltereCares provides timely information based on what you are likely dealing with now and, more importantly, alerts you to issues that you may face in the near future called Words of Wisdom or WOWs (catchy huh!?)                                  GET ORGANIZEDHow do you keep family and friends informed about your parents’ care and well being?And how do you keep their needs organized and accessible and make communicating with doctors, therapists and caregivers easy?The AltereCares360 Portal provides a secure, virtual location online that allows you to better manage your parents' care. Centrally locate all of the documents - the medical records, medication lists, powers of attorney, living wills and calendar – so it’s always available to you and your family, near and far.                                                        MANAGE HOME HEALTH AIDES AND THERAPISTSNeed help keeping track of individuals who care for your parent at home? Want an easier way to inform them of your parent’s specific needs and preferences?The Home Care Coordination Module in the AltereCares360 Portal allows you to provide a video orientation and care notes that aides and therapists can access prior to their visit with your parent. They can also upload an Activity Summary of the time spent with your parent so you can stay informed of their progress.And all of this can be accessed by a few short clicks. KEEP PEOPLE INFORMED IN AN EMERGENCYHave an urgent situation and need to let everyone know what’s happening?Push a button and let everyone know what’s happening! story:
Triad Training Systems LLC FKA at R3bar LLC was started to help everyone in the fitness and athletic arena change the way they train. At Triad Training Systems, we like to say " R3think Training with R3BAR"!  We started that very R3thinking process with the R3BAR Alpha Pro in 2014. As a result, many athletes have begun to change the process in which they train. In the last few years we have had more requests for a R3BAR that is smaller, more compact, and overall easier for people in the general fitness market to use. After months of research and development, our team came up with a different version of the same product called the R3BAR Omega Pro.

 

The purpose of this indiegogo campaign is to raise money to begin to manufacture the Omega Pro and allow Triad Training Systems to meet the ever growing demand for this new version of R3BAR.

 

Our goal is to raise $50,000, and we have some great perks for anyone willing to contribute! Obviously participants will receive the Omega Pro at a discounted price, but we also have several other perks to show our appreciation:

 

R3BAR Omega Pro with R3BAR Swag!

 

R3BAR Video On Demand Access

 

R3BANDs (2nd component of the Triad Training System)

 

Special Training Sessions with the Founders!

 

Michael Knight- Skillsetsandbandreps

Tim Manson- Creator of the R3BAR-Customize Training Session

Doug Christie-Co-Founder- Former 14 Year NBA Vet-Training Session Zoom Meet and Greet

story:
If you wear eyeglasses or sunglasses, you know the problem of they getting smudgy from time to time.

 

 

If you carry a smart phone, you know the phone surface is full of germs and bacteria.
 

                         

 

 

WHY UNSMUDGE?

You wear eyeglasses. What does it mean? It means you recognized the ability to see clearly is an essential and critical part of your life. You got your eyes examined. You consulted an Optometrist and got the lenses with the right power. Now you should be able to see clearly. Technically, yes.

 

Technically, the problem is solved. But is it completely true? You should be able to see the world clearly wherever you go. Correct? But what about those dry microfiber cloths in your pocket, in your eyeglass pouch, in your car dashboard? Yeah that's right. We know that they get smudgy ALL THE TIME. Why? Let's look closer.

                           

 

                           

 

Your eyeglasses are made of Polycarbonates and CR-39 Resins. And that is GOOD and BAD. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Because they have weak surface structure, surface static, and scratch prone. Which means when you step out of the house, you are inviting the dust and debris to come settle on your eyeglasses .

 

But how to keep your eyeglasses clean?

 

      ✔️ Anyone who wears eyeglasses knows the problem of eyeglasses getting smudgy. It could be anything that causes the problem: Air, dust, sweat, moisture, rain, oil from skin, eyelashes, etc. Whatever may be the cause, smudgy glasses are an annoying and recurring problem for many of us.

     ✔️ Current Solution: For most people, the go-to solution is to use their T-shirt. Some concerned ones carry a microfiber cloth in their pocket.

     ✔️ Using T-Shirt/clothes to clean eyeglasses does not solve the problem. They might leave invisible scratches on the glasses.

     ✔️ Using microfiber cloth might sound like a good idea, but it is incomplete. A microfiber cloth in a pocket or in a purse will in itself attract small particles. And cleaning smudges without a cleaning liquid does not clean the smudges completely.

     ✔️ When we are home, we can always use some cleaning liquid and clean the glasses.

     ✔️ What about the times we need to clean smudges when we are outside/ away from the kitchen?

 

We intuitively know what is the best way to clean our glasses.

  • We wash our clothes using washing detergent and water. 
  • We clean our dishes using cleaning detergent and water. 
  • We clean our bodies using soap and water.  
  • We clean our glass windows using a cleaning solution and water. 
  • Heck, we clean our eyeglasses with cleaning liquid and water and wipe them with nice microfiber -- when we are home. 

 

We know that. We know intuitively this is the best way to get oil, debris, and micro-particles out of our glasses so that we can see clearly again. 

 

                            

 

But.. what stops us?

What stops us from cleaning our eyeglasses with cleaning liquid and microfiber when we are away from our home? The answer is, we don't have an easy way to carry cleaning liquid and microfiber with us wherever we go. 

 

What is the solution? 

  • We need a portable and complete eyeglass cleaner that carries Lens cleaning liquid and a nice pair of microfiber pads, that we can carry around effortlessly.
  • Introducing 'UnSmudge'. A complete eyeglass cleaner that fits in your palm. It comes with a cleaning spray, a fork with 2 spongy microfiber pads. You can carry it in your pocket, purse and clean your eyeglasses anywhere. 

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

UnSmudge comes with everything that you need to clean your glasses. Be it eyeglasses or sunglasses. The fork holds two microfiber pads. They are protected in a shell so they never get in contact with any foreign particles. They just clean your eyeglasses and go back into the shell. Just like a turtle's neck. In a good way.

                         

 

And we did not stop there. We know your phone is very important to you. But we also know that hygiene is also very important to you. Just like your eyeglasses, your phones travel with you everywhere. I mean - everywhere.
 

Bed/thumbs/Phone

Restroom/thumbs/Phone

Kitchen-floor/thumbs/Phone

Shoe-Rack/thumbs/Phone

Car-seat/thumbs/Phone

Office-desk/thumbs/Phone

Office-Restroom/thumbs/Phone

 

We don't know if you noticed, but there are a few red flags in there. And Phone surface glasses are not the best at keeping germs away. Why would they? Their function is not to keep themselves clean. It's up to us to keep them clean.  Because we tend to use out hands to send food to our mouth. And you know where these hands were when you were in the restroom. We'll leave it to your imagination/reality. 

Yep. It fits in an eyeglass box. Right next to your eyeglasses. Whether you carry an eyeglass box or not, you know someone who carries one. So UnSmudge is a perfect fit for you or them. 

 

 

 Why phone surfaces get so dirty so quickly? The problem is again the phone 'glass' and all the protective covers are made of Aluminosilicate. This has a soft surface. Which means it has weak surface structure with slight static. This plays a vital role in attracting particles, germs, bacteria and viruses.  

These germs, bacteria and viruses are no joke. No, this is not a cheap attempt to scare-sell you anything. We know you are smarter than that. We know we should be better than that. But, as a human society, we all are witnessing something very unfortunate events across the world right now. If someone told us the whole comes to a halt because of a virus, we would have laughed it off. The point is, these invisible enemies are ruthless. And if we knowingly make a mistake of not being careful enough, the fault will be at our hands.

 

                                                                   

 We need an easy way to keep our phones clean. And we need to do it the right way. We want to clean the surface with germ killing liquid and a clean microfiber cloth to clean the surface. So we combined both into a neat package. You can carry UnSmudge anywhere with almost zero hassle.

 

 

Think of your loved ones. Spouse, kids, parents, grand-parents. Everyone either wears eyeglasses, or carries a phone. Or both. Think of giving them a meaningful gift this summer. The one that helps them stay clean and handy to clean smudgy eyeglasses. They will thank you for you being so considerate. Or get a few for your office mates. 

Be that cool cat at your work.

 

 

You are busy with your life. Smudges are just an annoyance and a distraction.  You are not eagerly waiting to get your eyeglasses smudgy so you can see your world blurry. You are not willingly putting some oil and debris on your eyeglasses before going to watch a movie or a concert. This Sh*t just happens. And You need a solution. And quick. It should be as easy as buying a banana from a banana cart. 

UnSmudge just does that. Take it out. Spray. Clean with microfiber pads. Snap it back in. And you are done.

 

 

And what else did we  focus on? The finer the microfiber thread, better the clean. We are using 260GSM microfiber cloth. This is recommended by optometrists. Note that all the microfiber cloths you find online/stores are not 260GSM. 

 

And one set of microfiber pads will last months. And they are replaceable when needed. So this keeps those DRY microfiber pads where they belong. In those drawers.  

 

 

UnSmudge is so easy to carry. It is so handy, it fits in your pocket. So you can carry it everywhere without any inconvenience. You can have one in your car, one at your work. So you never run into smudgy eyeglasses problem. Ever.

                            

 

 
 
Who protects the protector? You can clean your phone with the microfiber layered on the shell. But how to protect it? We cover it with an acrylic shell. That way, everything is protected wherever you carry. And however you carry it. 
 

 

                         

How easy to carry it? As easy as you can imagine. A pocket. A purse. A bag. A backpack. You name it. You got it.  

 

How fast can you clean your eyeglasses?  

It's not like we had a competition or anything but our testing team had some fun with our prototypes the other day. Finding out how fast can they 'UnSmudge' their eyeglasses. Names have been called, curses were yelled, microfiber pads flew across the room during the event. At the end, pizza boxes and beer bottles were emptied. We don't remember the fastest 'unsmudging' time. But we all agreed that it can be done in less than 30 seconds.

 

Now that you have UnSmudge, you don't have to worry about keeping track of all those DRY microfiber cloths. They never were the right choice to clean your eyeglasses in the first place. 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

While the product prototypes are looking real good, mold making and production may bring in some challenges. We are prepared for any surprises. We will keep you posted how we are making progress each week.

We have thoroughly tested the samples beforehand, to make sure that we are production ready as soon as the kickstarter campaign ends. Production is estimated to take 8-10 weeks and transport will take an additional 2-3 weeks.

After that we are ready to ship the towels to you.

As with any mass production there can be unforeseen challenges that are out of our control, which could delay the process. We assure you, that we will keep all our backers up-to-date on all the latest news and/or changes and will operate as transparently as possible, so you can follow every step until you have the product in hand.

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

We intuitively know what is the best way to clean our glasses.

We wash our clothes using washing detergent and water. 

We clean our dishes using cleaning detergent and water. 

We clean our bodies using soap and water.  

We clean our glass windows using a cleaning solution and water. 
Heck, we clean our eyeglasses with cleaning liquid and water and wipe them with nice microfiber -- when we are home. 

 
We know that. We know intuitively this is the best way to get oil, debris, and micro-particles out of our glasses so that we can see clearly again. 
 
                            
 
But.. what stops us?
What stops us from cleaning our eyeglasses with cleaning liquid and microfiber when we are away from our home? The answer is, we don't have an easy way to carry cleaning liquid and microfiber with us wherever we go. 
 
What is the solution? 

We need a portable and complete eyeglass cleaner that carries Lens cleaning liquid and a nice pair of microfiber pads, that we can carry around effortlessly.
Introducing 'UnSmudge'. A complete eyeglass cleaner that fits in your palm. It comes with a cleaning spray, a fork with 2 spongy microfiber pads. You can carry it in your pocket, purse and clean your eyeglasses anywhere. 

   
 

 
 

 
 
 

UnSmudge comes with everything that you need to clean your glasses. Be it eyeglasses or sunglasses. The fork holds two microfiber pads. They are protected in a shell so they never get in contact with any foreign particles. They just clean your eyeglasses and go back into the shell. Just like a turtle's neck. In a good way.
                         

 


And we did not stop there. We know your phone is very important to you. But we also know that hygiene is also very important to you. Just like your eyeglasses, your phones travel with you everywhere. I mean - everywhere.
 
Bed/thumbs/Phone
Restroom/thumbs/Phone
Kitchen-floor/thumbs/Phone
Shoe-Rack/thumbs/Phone
Car-seat/thumbs/Phone
Office-desk/thumbs/Phone
Office-Restroom/thumbs/Phone
 
We don't know if you noticed, but there are a few red flags in there. And Phone surface glasses are not the best at keeping germs away. Why would they? Their function is not to keep themselves clean. It's up to us to keep them clean.  Because we tend to use out hands to send food to our mouth. And you know where these hands were when you were in the restroom. We'll leave it to your imagination/reality. 
Yep. It fits in an eyeglass box. Right next to your eyeglasses. Whether you carry an eyeglass box or not, you know someone who carries one. So UnSmudge is a perfect fit for you or them. 

 
 

 Why phone surfaces get so dirty so quickly? The problem is again the phone 'glass' and all the protective covers are made of Aluminosilicate. This has a soft surface. Which means it has weak surface structure with slight static. This plays a vital role in attracting particles, germs, bacteria and viruses.  

These germs, bacteria and viruses are no joke. No, this is not a cheap attempt to scare-sell you anything. We know you are smarter than that. We know we should be better than that. But, as a human society, we all are witnessing something very unfortunate events across the world right now. If someone told us the whole comes to a halt because of a virus, we would have laughed it off. The point is, these invisible enemies are ruthless. And if we knowingly make a mistake of not being careful enough, the fault will be at our hands.
 
                                                                   
 We need an easy way to keep our phones clean. And we need to do it the right way. We want to clean the surface with germ killing liquid and a clean microfiber cloth to clean the surface. So we combined both into a neat package. You can carry UnSmudge anywhere with almost zero hassle.
 
 


Think of your loved ones. Spouse, kids, parents, grand-parents. Everyone either wears eyeglasses, or carries a phone. Or both. Think of giving them a meaningful gift this summer. The one that helps them stay clean and handy to clean smudgy eyeglasses. They will thank you for you being so considerate. Or get a few for your office mates. 
Be that cool cat at your work.
 


 

You are busy with your life. Smudges are just an annoyance and a distraction.  You are not eagerly waiting to get your eyeglasses smudgy so you can see your world blurry. You are not willingly putting some oil and debris on your eyeglasses before going to watch a movie or a concert. This Sh*t just happens. And You need a solution. And quick. It should be as easy as buying a banana from a banana cart. 
UnSmudge just does that. Take it out. Spray. Clean with microfiber pads. Snap it back in. And you are done.
  
And what else did we  focus on? The finer the microfiber thread, better the clean. We are using 260GSM microfiber cloth. This is recommended by optometrists. Note that all the microfiber cloths you find online/stores are not 260GSM. 
 
And one set of microfiber pads will last months. And they are replaceable when needed. So this keeps those DRY microfiber pads where they belong. In those drawers.  
 
 

UnSmudge is so easy to carry. It is so handy, it fits in your pocket. So you can carry it everywhere without any inconvenience. You can have one in your car, one at your work. So you never run into smudgy eyeglasses problem. Ever.
                            
 


 
 
Who protects the protector? You can clean your phone with the microfiber layered on the shell. But how to protect it? We cover it with an acrylic shell. That way, everything is protected wherever you carry. And however you carry it. 
 
 

                         
How easy to carry it? As easy as you can imagine. A pocket. A purse. A bag. A backpack. You name it. You got it.  
 
How fast can you clean your eyeglasses?  
It's not like we had a competition or anything but our testing team had some fun with our prototypes the other day. Finding out how fast can they 'UnSmudge' their eyeglasses. Names have been called, curses were yelled, microfiber pads flew across the room during the event. At the end, pizza boxes and beer bottles were emptied. We don't remember the fastest 'unsmudging' time. But we all agreed that it can be done in less than 30 seconds.
 
Now that you have UnSmudge, you don't have to worry about keeping track of all those DRY microfiber cloths. They never were the right choice to clean your eyeglasses in the first place. 
 

Risks & Challenges
 

While the product prototypes are looking real good, mold making and production may bring in some challenges. We are prepared for any surprises. We will keep you posted how we are making progress each week.
We have thoroughly tested the samples beforehand, to make sure that we are production ready as soon as the kickstarter campaign ends. Production is estimated to take 8-10 weeks and transport will take an additional 2-3 weeks.
After that we are ready to ship the towels to you.
As with any mass production there can be unforeseen challenges that are out of our control, which could delay the process. We assure you, that we will keep all our backers up-to-date on all the latest news and/or changes and will operate as transparently as possible, so you can follow every step until you have the product in hand.
 

Other Ways You Can Help:
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
EMS(electrical muscle stimulation) has been a popular trend sport that comes from physiotherapy for the past few years. This high-intensity whole body workout will boost your exercise performance triple times by stimulating the specific muscle group compared with the traditional training method.

      

      

 

 

EMS training suits as the most critical tool in the training session should be effective, reliable, and user-friendly. YDSTRONG Wireless EMS training suit features the cutting-edge Body-Q-Key technology to send the low/medium pulse current to the major muscle groups through 20 electrodes to helps you achieve different exercising goals anytime anywhere. Made of High-elastic and compressed fabrics, get rid of the sticky wear experience with excellent breathability and moisture-penetrability of YDSTRONG Wireless EMS training suit. Customize your personal training plan through the APP, Smart EMS Pro which records your exercising data, and offers the most suitable training plan for you.

 

EMS training is a whole-body workout, the Body-Q-Key technology (Sweat Gland Introduction Technology) send the electrical impulses that are transmitted to the body through the 20 electrodes on YDSTRONG Wireless EMS training suit, causing it to contractions. Smart EMS training suit could significantly uplift the training efficiency. Training with the Smart EMS for 20 minutes will achieve the same outcome as training with normal gear for 1 to 2 hours.

Regardless of your age, gender, and level of experience in training, you will find the YDSTRONG Wireless Smart EMS Training Suit the perfect choice for you. No matter how busy you are at work or wherever you are, in the gym, outdoors or at home, you can always easily put on the suit and begin your workout!

 

         

 

No need to spray water beforehand, the YDSTRONG Wireless EMS suit is extremely comfortable and easy to wear, high-elastic, and compressed fabrics with excellent breathability and moisture-penetrability. Consists of 4 layers of premium materials and equipped with 20 Electrode Pads that cover 90% of the body’s muscles. Functional and breathable, it is an excellent exercising companion with you all year round.    

     

       

 

Seamlessly integration of the YDSTRONG Wireless EMS training suit, the SmartWatch, and the Smart Box, the three-in-one function monitors and analyzes your physical condition and ultimately gathers the data into the APP to design your personal fitness plan.

 

Through tracking, monitoring, and analyzing more than 25 human physiological data such as Body Fat, BMI, Basal Metabolism Rate, the YDSTRONG Wireless EMS Training Suit tailors and personalizes your training plan, improving your training performance by more than three times.

You could achieve various exercising goals base on your need, such as weight loss, boost endurance, and muscle building. A wide variety of professional training sessions is within your palm.

With YDSTRONG Wireless EMS Training Suit, there is no limitation to the exercising places. You could take out the suit and start the high-intensity EMS training time you like. No rush to the gym and no restrictions on the exercise equipment anymore. Exercise anytime anywhere you want.

 

Specification

YDSTRONG specializes in R & D, production and sales of fabric electrode clothing and flexible sensor electrodes. Our products are sold in 69 countries and regions globally across China, Hong Kong, and Southeast Asia, Australia, Middle East, Africa, Europe, South America, and North America. The EMS muscle stimulation technology developed by us provides a completely new way of training. This innovation is unprecedented in the training sector and we are continuously iterating and moving forward. We believe this is the way to the future.

story:
Short Summary

Help us to change the lives of migraineurs for good by supporting our build-up of full range online healthcare service for people suffering from migraine.

Based on our real life experience, We do believe that video based self-care guides combined with live online therapy consultation services can change the lives of one billion migraineurs around the world.

Our self-care system developer has been working with the migraine and muscle skeletal pain relief since 1995. He has treated thousands of people annually but we want to do much bigger things as migraine is a tremendously global health problem.  We want to build full range live online healthtech company to provide top notch healthcare service for people suffering from migraine no matter where they are located.

We also plan to train therapists so they could use our methods in their practices and clinics.

Our service currently includes:

All the self-care servies are based on self-developed and proven methodologies:

  • Manual self-care techniques video guide
  • Cold treatment video guide
  • Eye relaxation technique video guide for pain management


Our Story

Jyrki Mäkelä, chief health officer of Migraineadviser has graduated as a licensed massage therapist in 1995. Jyrki has been suffering from migraine for over 20 years. Since 1995 he has done over 7 000 practical tests regarding migraine behaviour and impact on human body. Based on these research and experience, he has developed a self-help program first serving his own needs. Later this self-help method has proved to be effective for his migraine patients too and now it is available for all the other sufferers through our Migraine Adviser online service.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support for developing more self-care techniques and producing more self-help video guides as well as for communicating about our painrelief methods to broad audience of migraineurs. Funds are needeed for:
  • Development and testing of new self-care techniques
  • Video guide production
  • Communications
  • Starting to build a training program for other therapist and doctors

The Impact

We know we can bring painrelief to large number of migraineurs world wide and now you have a chance to participate in helping them or yourself.

    Risks & Challenges

    Since only the self-help guides may not work for everybody, we want to create the global network of live online self-care combined local therapists network. Building this network will take time.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Tell about us to all your migraineur friends.

story:
Short Summary

In 2013 two Australian mental health practitioners got together to develop a tool that would help other psychologists, social workers, counsellors, psychotherapists and the like to:

  • Automate their intake process to accomodate health technology advances in health technology using cloud capturing data.
  • Create an easy to use platform for both clients and practitioners to undertake psychometric profiling tools commonly used in private practice.
  • But most importantly to create a compulsory process for practitioners to assess the risk of each patient at each session for the risk of suicidal tendencies.

This tool not only makes the process of analysis psychometric tools faster, it also removes the risk for human error and misinterpretation of data.

What We Need & What You Get

We have developed the tool to a point where it is ready to get better.  We need to:

  • Expand the platform from an app based program to an online web service option so that we can broaden the way practitioners help clients.
  • Translate the tool from English to a number of other languages where the program can be used.
  • As well as tweak and fix minor technology issues created with the introduction of more assessment tools.

The Impact

This tool has already proven to save lives and by taking it further we will only empower more professionals working with individuals in various ways to help them:

  • Identify the risk of acts of self harm and acting out risk - meaning violent acts towards others.
  • Through our community of support and training for licensed practitioners we also will grow the capabilities of professional helpers to work with people in times of great distress and crisis.
  • We also like that this tool helps to develop individual practitioners by giving clients and patients a platform to feedback to the practitioner how well they are doing.

Risks & Challenges

When we first looked into this possible tool we identified some key risks.  First of all we did not want to re-invent the wheel as such we recognise that there are a number of great profiling tools to assess patient risk and moods.  Secondly we where concerned about empowering practitioners to identify risk but then not know what to do.  So we decided to...

  • Firstly work with researched and evidence based profiling tools that have already gained the respect of the mental health community and combined these tools into our platform.  These measures are used under  international licence agreements from the original authors of the tests.
  • Secondly to ensure a practitioner is best able to help an at-risk client we have done two things (i) included in the tool specific questions and instructions for the mental health practitioner on what to do when a risk is flagged.  And (ii) we have established training partnerships with professional registered training providers and this training is compulsory for any practitioner prior to being provided with a licence to use our tool within their clinic.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, however that doesn't mean you can not help:

  • Please help to create some noise about our campaign and spread the word about our NeuroAssess tool.
  • Or drop us a note and have a chat letting us know how you might be able to help.

Cheers, thanks a lot!!!

story:
Dear Online-Community,

We are raising funds on behalf of the people of a Nepali family living in Khadka Bhanjyang 3 Kuwapani. Their town is almost completely destroyed, almost all of the houses have been reduced to rubble. Reported are 126 deaths and a unknown number of injured people [1].

Not only the homes of the people but also the stored food is destroyed and the people cannot support themselves. They need food, medicine and temporary shelter - Please help us to complete this first round of fundraising as soon as possible!

The whole media attention and the main relief efforts go to Kathmandu but not to the small villages which are effected even worse than the capital! 

The help from the government is progressing at a very slow pace. The hard fact is that the district is close to Kathmandu, still no international help has arrived in the town since the earthquake. We have been approached by the people who are from this village. The ask is simple and humble, they need support for the survival of their family. 

As soon as we reach the first goal of 5000 US$ we will give the money to Amar Tamang who will forward the money to the people in his town.

You can help here in the most direct way possible, every cent of your donation will reach the affected people!

As soon as the circumstances allow me travel to Nepal again I will examine the situation in Nuwakot and report to you. 

See the attached links to understand why we can’t go to Nepal right now and raise the funds instead (which we feel is the best thing we can and should do right now).

Please also support other campaigns! Read more about how to help effectively as a volunteer or with donations:

https://www.facebook.com/mikktamme/posts/10153119378621998?fref=nf&pnref=story

http://www.usnepalonline.com/english/giving-effectively-to-the-nepals-earthquake-disaster-open-your-heart-wallet-but-mind-too.html

http://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2015/apr/27/earthquake-nepal-dont-rush-help-volunteers-aid?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter

[1]  Nuwakot District: 126 deaths, most houses destroyed, lack shelter 

Sources: Pictures from relatives and information from HumanityRoad (http://humanityroad.org/apr25nepalquake/)

More about me: www.nomadic-spirit.com/about
