Best results coming from engaged routines and focused attention from the individual. The path to such physical attention need not be done alone. It is often best done with care and advise from those more experienced.Children on the spectrum are diverse and complex, yet their are some activities that span this complexity and offer a way for them to focus, interact, develop and improve their self-perception.The three skill based activities mentioned, offer the kids a way to move and improve their bodies using repeatable and relatable skills they can apply to the rest of their lives.The MiSFIT pilot program would initially target high functioning ASD children with the support and encouragement of the parent and carer. This pilot program will allow us to gauge the significance of the separate modalities (Mobility, Martial Arts, Strength training) for the Higher functioning participants and allow us to refine the sessions and expectations for the future.During the pilot process efforts will focus on the three main aspects of: Mobility, Strength, and Martial Arts.Mobility:Using the Original Strength system offers a fantastic way to learn how the body moves and at the same time increase reflexive strength and coordination, using fundamental body movements including: rocking, rolling, crawling, marching, skipping and running.Strength:Strength training will allow the exploration and building of the body to improve underlying strength. It will be based on functional strength training systems using results based methods with skills covering bodyweight, kettlebell and barbell.Martial arts:Martial Arts is a pattern based skill which like the skills above is easily teachable and repeatable. Offering a distinct path to follow, combining reflexive strength and mobility, with measurable outcomes that will improve many areas for each participant.Facility(Concept of proposed facility, with separate areas for each modality)The goal is to provide a very specific style of facility to coach and support the kids. A facility to give them the best advantage possible to learn and participate in various modes of physical activity. The larger premises as shown in the above concept image would be the upper end of our goal. An area where the spaces are combined would also offer a similar experience with specific times set aside for specific training.There are many factors we would like to control in a facility such as this. The ability to control lighting and noise would allow trainees with high sensory needs to be able to train and utilise the areas. The same way each individual ASD child is unlike any other, we would like to be able to assist them in learning how to train, by providing a facility that can cater for all.As a carer reading this, I'm sure you would like to train at the same time as your child, learning with the same vigour and share in the benefits.  You could do your own training while they are working with a coach or have somewhere to leave your child knowing that they will be looked after and instructed in a safe manner.The concept plan shows specific areas for martial arts training, strength training, and movement training. They are all separate and can operate independently at the same time, without interfering with the other areas. We also feel that it is important to have a transition area for relaxing before and after.Obviously a facility like this is specifically designed and built, as such this campaign is designed to fit out an existing location with the necessary equipment and areas.The ProgramThe pilot program is a 9 week term in 4 parts. The weeks from 1 to 6 cover the individual modalities to focus on the correct patterning and the remaining 3 weeks progress and integrate all aspects together. Ideally there will be 2 sessions per week separated by a few rest days. The rest days allow the students to think about the sessions and do their own practice. Each session has time for skills reinforcement and new skill acquisition. In the final 3 weeks all skills will be applied in each session and this is where the students gain the confidence that will carry on in their every day lives. At the end of the term a progress report will be available for the parents/carers to take for future reference, giving them a comparison and a commentary of the student's progress from start to finish. SessionsIn addition to the formal 9 week program there will be a variety of training options ranging from one on one training to workshop. These will vary depending on the individual need of the student. To ensure that a student and the parent understand the processes for a workshop,  individual training or the 9 week program an introduction session will be organised for all new and prospective students.The facility will have trainers onsite at all times, taking sessions/classes or assisting with training. Meaning that outside of the specified class/session/workshop times there will always be someone nearby to offer help and advice.Introduction / InductionPrior to any training a prospective student and their carer/carers will be required to attend an induction session that will last approximately one hour and cover the facility and everything on offer. During the induction we will cover all areas of the ASD that are of concern, with the understanding that the coach is there to ensure safety for the student, the parents and others in the facility.  During the introduction session the coach will provide an initial mobility and coordination assessment that will be used in assistance with the ongoing coaching. One on OneScheduled sessions for a particular style, Mobility, Strength, Martial Arts, etc. for an individual covering their style of choice. These are conducted by appointment only.Small GroupScheduled classes for a particular style, Mobility, Strength, Martial Arts etc. These will be scheduled on a daily or weekly basis depending on specific popularity.ClassesScheduled classes for a particular style, Mobility, Strength, Martial Arts, etc. These will be scheduled on a daily or weekly basis depending on specific popularity.WorkshopsOpen sessions available to members, students and prospective new members. These workshops will cover a range of specific training modalities and will be scheduled at different times throughout the year.Open TrainingOpen training will be available during times when specific sessions are not in progress. Giving the member an opportunity to practice technique or train on their individualised allocated program.MembershipsEvery new student will be required to complete a membership form. Available memberships include: Casual: Mobility, Strength, Martial Arts, Multiple Class' Unlimited. Parent / CarerAs a parent or carer its often difficult to get to a gym for a workout because of the difficulty involved in taking your child along. As the parent or carer of a child who is a gym member, by default they will receive a discounted membership to attend classes and sessions either with their child or in a separate area. This gives parents and carers peace of mind and an opportunity to work on their fitness or connect with other parents and carers.ConclusionThe MiSFit ASD Gym is a collection of training programs. The facility is a place for ASD teens and carers to do fitness work in a supported environment. An assessment phase has been built into the early part of the project. This will determine the viability of further building the pilot program to include pre-adolescent ASD children.The funding goalFor this campaign we are seeking $15,000 for provision of leasing and fit out of a facility in readiness for our first program within three months of the campaign completion.The main focus of this campaign is to start the first nine week program with between five and ten teenage ASD children.  It is our desire to be able to fund sufficiently to find and convert a suitable location with the relevant areas and equipment. The project has a future vision to grow the gym for use by pre-adolescent children

story:
Dear Hopeful Sponsor:
We are kicking off our 1st season of the “Inland Empire Hoopers Basketball Organization,” a 501(c)(3) non profit organization to benefit youth through the sport of basketball, with an emphasis on mentoring and promoting educational success. We request your help for this year’s campaign. We are happy to offer you the opportunity to become a valuable sponsor of our Inland Empire Hoopers Basketball Organization. We are a group of elite basketball coaches in the Inland Empire area promoting the game of basketball, and encouraging the youth to participate in local and national tournaments.
Running a sports organization costs a large amount of money every year during the participation in numerous competitions and maintaining the membership in the Amateur Athletic Union Basketball Association. The sponsors are asked to provide their financial contribution or donation of goods to the organization. In return for this help, all the members of our club will wear t-shirts that have sponsor’s logo and title on its back. These t-shirts will be worn during all of our tournaments and events where our players will participate. For higher levels of participation, we will create professional signs with your logo and name to display during our home court tournaments or fulfill whatever your request may be.
Our organization has been working to provide new opportunities to the young basketball players in our area. We will travel throughout the states and work hard to build not only champions on the court, but instill values in our players to build champions for life. We will organize local and national level tournaments and try to include more young athletes in this game. We train our athletes to be disciplined, dedicated and committed to achieving the goals of the team. During our practices and competitions our players are trained to become stronger both physically and in character. Our training benefits the players for the rest of their lives. Inland Empire Hoopers Basketball has a simple philosophy of building up the next generation of kids to become adults that positively impact the world around them.
Your kind cooperation with our efforts will help us to achieve our goals to make a difference in our area. I believe that you will be proud of being a valuable sponsor of the Inland Empire Hoopers Basketball Organization.
Thanks to you for your consideration in sponsoring the Inland Empire Hoopers Basketball Organization.

story:
SuperBetter is an app and website that increases mental resilience by helping you live gamefully in your real life. Nearly 500,000 people have used SuperBetter so far to achieve their biggest goals and tackle challenges like anxiety, depression, chronic health issues and post traumatic stress.

 

1 in 4 Americans face mental health challenges each year and 77% regularly experiencing physical symptoms from stress. The scale of the problem is clear to see. Help us achieve our goal and we will create SuperBetter 2.0 to help more people beat mental health challenges. 

SuperBetter is a gameful way of living which makes you Stronger For Life.  Living gamefully means channeling the same psychological strengths you naturally display when you play games – optimism, creativity, courage, and determination – into real life.

Playing SuperBetter increases resilience.  It gives you the tools to get through any tough situation—and more likely to achieve the goals that matter most to you. Results have been proven in just 10 minutes use per day.



At SuperBetter, we are dedicated to empowering individuals and communities to live epic lives that are full of joy and challenge; powered by strong social relationships, positive emotions and purpose.  

We are now working to lead an amazing transformation to unlock the full potential of SuperBetter.  Will you join us and help make SuperBetter 2.0 and SuperBetter PRO better for everyone?


HOW THE FUNDS WILL BE USED


 

SUPERBETTER 2.0: FREE VS PRO

Our free version will always be a FULLY FUNCTIONAL version of SuperBetter that can be used to achieve your Epic Win! 

We are launching a Pro version to provide support for additional features our users have been asking for.  Here's a quick comparison of what to expect from Free vs. Pro.






The SuperBetter website and apps are your everyday coach for gameful living. SuperBetter will guide you to identify your Epic Win, create your Secret Identity, recruit Allies, and choose pre-loaded experiences PowerPacks or create your own adventures.  Each day, your coach reminds you complete your Quests, activate Power-Ups, and battle Bad Guys to increase your resilience scores – mental, emotional, social & physical.

At the core of SuperBetter is a powerful community united by the belief that each of us has the ability to unleash our heroic potential and that together we can make the world better.  SuperBetter has a lively and supportive Forum, and the community connects on social media with the hashtag #SuperBetter.

We share news & updates via our blog, newsletters, Facebook and Twitter.



For those who want to go deeper, SuperBetter is a book.

The SuperBetter book is already a NY Times best seller (Yay!).

Jane McGonigal tells her story about creating SuperBetter in a TED Talk that has been viewed more than 5 million times.  Sharing it is a great way to introduce others to SuperBetter.

SuperBetter is featured in the latest Psychology Today magazine (Oct. '15) with an 8-page cover story called "It's Time to Think Like a Gamer." 



BACKED BY TWO SCIENTIFIC STUDIES AND POWERED BY THE SCIENCE OF GAMES, SUPERBETTER IS AN APP AND WEBSITE THAT HAS HELPED NEARLY 500,000 PEOPLE TACKLE REAL-LIFE PROBLEMS AND INCREASE MENTAL RESILIENCE. 

WE ARE NOT DONE WITH OUR PRODUCT, SCIENCE AND RESEARCH. TO IMPROVE EVEN MORE LIVES WE NEED YOUR HELP TO BUILD SUPERBETTER 2.0!


SuperBetter is validated in two scientific studies.


A randomized controlled study conducted by the University of Pennsylvania found that playing SuperBetter for 30 days significantly reduced symptoms of depression and anxiety, and increased optimism, social support and player’s belief in their own ability to succeed and achieve their goals.  It also found that SuperBetter users were significantly happier and more satisfied with their lives. 


A clinical trial funded by the National Institutes of Health and conducted at Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center and Cincinnati Children’s Hospital found that using SuperBetter improved mood, decreased anxiety and suffering, and strengthened family relationships during rehabilitation and recovery. 






SuperBetter, LLC is a digital health company headquartered in Chicago, IL.  As a team, we are so passionate about its potential to positively and profoundly impact the world that we acquired SuperBetter in 2015.  Keith Wakeman is our CEO, Jane McGonigal is our Chief Science Officer and Mike Hostetler is our Chief Technology Officer. 

Keith Wakeman is the CEO of SuperBetter. Keith is a social entrepreneur and innovator that has launched over $1 billion of new products. He was a brand builder for 20 years in the CPG industry and an entrepreneur for the last 10 years in developing new ventures in the health community.  For more information on Keith please visit his LinkedIn.

Jane McGonigal is the Chief Science Officer and world renowned designer of games to improve real lives and solve real problems.  Jane has a Ph.D. in Performance Sciences from the University of California at Berkley.  She is also the NY Times Best Selling Author of Reality is Broken, Why Games Make Us Better and How They Can Change the World…and of course her new book – SuperBetter, A Revolutionary Approach to Getting Stronger, Happier, Braver, and More Resilent.  For more information please visit Jane's website.

Mike Hostetler is our CTO and is a proven technology entrepreneur.  Mike formerly founded appendTo, a boutique consultancy born out of his work on the jQuery project, which he exited in 2015.  For more information on Mike visit his Blog or LinkedIn.

Violet Ricker is the Community Manager for SuperBetter.  Violet has a background in community development and is an active advocate for reducing the stigma surrounding mental health.  She has a bachelor’s degree in non-profit management from North Park University and is and currently working towards a Masters in Divinity Studies. 



UNDERSTANDING SUPERBETTER

WHAT IS SUPERBETTER?

SuperBetter is a gameful way of living that increases resilience: the ability to stay strong, motivated, and optimistic even in the face of difficult challenges. Resilience has a powerful effect on health—by boosting physical and emotional well-being. Resilience also helps you achieve your life goals—by strengthening your social support and increasing your stamina, willpower, and focus. Every aspect of the game is designed to harness the power of positive emotions and social connection to help you improve your life. 

WHO IS SUPERBETTER FOR?

SuperBetter is for people who want more out of life—who want to feel happier, healthier, and more able to reach their goals. SuperBetter was designed with universal psychological research—meaning anyone can benefit from playing, regardless of age, gender, or location! Anyone over the age of 13 can create an account at SuperBetter.

WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS OF PLAYING SUPERBETTER?

SuperBetter makes you stronger. It helps you build social, mental, physical and emotional resilience in the face of any illness, injury, or health goal. Building resilience—the ability to stay optimistic, curious, motivated, and connected to others even in the face of an extreme challenge—has been scientifically proven to improve health outcomes of all kinds. Playing SuperBetter makes you more capable of getting through any tough situation—and more likely to achieve the goals that matter most to you.

HOW CAN I LEARN ABOUT THE SCIENCE OF SUPERBETTER?

As you play SuperBetter, you'll find science icons hidden throughout your missions. Clicking these icons gives you access to the science of SuperBetter—including links to the research articles that everything's based on.

You can see an overview of the science behind SuperBetter at ShowMeTheScience.com.

IS THE GAME AVAILABLE IN OTHER LANGUAGES?

We’re not quite ready to support translation into multiple languages, but rest assured it’s on our list of things to offer in the future.

IS THE APP AVAILABLE FOR MY MOBILE DEVICE?

Yes, the SuperBetter app is available for iPhone & iPads, and Android devices. You can also play it on any web browser by visiting SuperBetter.com. 

ARE THE FEATURES THE SAME ON THE MOBILE APP AS THEY ARE ON THE WEBSITE?

The mobile apps are a companion to the website, not a full version of it. Some features (like your Secret Lab and your Ally dashboard) are only available on the website version for now. We plan to continually add new features to the mobile apps, so be on the lookout for updates! If you've only played on your phone, you can log in to your account at SuperBetter.com to discover even more ways to get SuperBetter!

PLAYING THE GAME

WHAT DOES IT MEAN TO “PLAY” SUPERBETTER?

SuperBetter is a gameful way of living your real life—we just help you keep track of it. You can sign up and tell us what challenge you’re trying to tackle, and we’ll recommend Power-ups to help you feel better, Bad Guys to watch out for, and Quests you can do to get closer to your goals. Each time you complete a Quest, activate a Power-up, or battle a Bad Guy, just log into SuperBetter and push the “I DID THIS!” button to record your action. This will increase your personal resilience in real life and also move you forward in your SuperBetter adventure.

WHAT'S THE MINIMUM I SHOULD DO EACH DAY TO GET SUPERBETTER?

To get the most out of SuperBetter, we recommend a "Daily Dose":

Activate 3 Power-ups

Battle 1 Bad Guy

Complete 3 Quests 

Your To Do list will automatically keep track of everything you do, so you'll know when your Daily Dose is complete. If you have more time, check in with an Ally, do more Quests, or update the Trackers in your Secret Lab!

HOW DO I WIN SUPERBETTER?

You win SuperBetter by achieving your Epic Win, a real-life goal you set for yourself at the start of the game. When you achieve your Epic Win, you can choose a new goal and start a new game!

SuperBetter is like life. It's a process, not an outcome. We think that you win every day you show up, face your challenges, and keep aiming for your goals.

HOW CAN I KEEP A POSITIVE ATTITUDE AND STICK WITH IT?

If you're struggling to keep a "never give up" attitude, here are some tips that might help you along:

Focus less on outcomes and goals and more on tiny steps that feel good in the moment.

Enlist plenty of positive social support. This is hands-down the best thing any of us can do to improve our health and attitude towards our health.

Accept that some days will be easy and others will be hard. It's normal and okay. Having a down day (or week even) doesn't mean you're doing anything "wrong." Just keep taking your Daily Dose!

Know that sometimes it takes hard work, grit, and determination to transform our challenges. Other times all we can do is witness our situation with neutral attention. Experiment with what works best for you.

Be sure that when you do choose a goal, you're choosing something that is a stretch but still realistic and attainable. Start small!

And most importantly—be good to yourself. Celebrate even tiny successes.

story:
In my early 20s I found myself 80 pounds over weight and sicker than my 92 year old grandparents. I had high cholesterol, high blood pressure, chronic pain and was a borderline diabetic-then I got pregnant.

I knew something had to change if my husband and I were going to welcome a healthy baby into the world. I knew this was a turning point . It had to be. For once my weight was not about my looks, it was about my life. 

Two years later I had dropped 10 dress sizes . My blood work showed improved cholesterol and my blood pressure was normal and I've had no symptoms related to diabities since.

Its now 7 years later and I've made fitness and nutrition education a part of my daily life. For the past 5 years, I've e worked in the fitness industry trying to help others achieve the same level of success.  The most common reason that people have for giving up their fitness training is that they can't afford the gym fees. 

So I decided to go into business myself. I am opening a studio called Dream Works Fitness.This way I could charge as little as I like. My motto is , if you can afford a fast food meal, you can afford to get started with us. Unfortunately good intentions do not pay rent or utilities or even insurance. Please help fund me so I can start local and work my way global on my war against obesity!
story_txt: In my early 20s I found myself 80 pounds over weight and sicker than my 92 year old grandparents. I had high cholesterol, high blood pressure, chronic pain and was a borderline diabetic-then I got pregnant.I knew something had to change if my husband and I were going to welcome a healthy baby into the world. I knew this was a turning point . It had to be. For once my weight was not about my looks, it was about my life. Two years later I had dropped 10 dress sizes . My blood work showed improved cholesterol and my blood pressure was normal and I've had no symptoms related to diabities since.Its now 7 years later and I've made fitness and nutrition education a part of my daily life. For the past 5 years, I've e worked in the fitness industry trying to help others achieve the same level of success.  The most common reason that people have for giving up their fitness training is that they can't afford the gym fees. So I decided to go into business myself. I am opening a studio called Dream Works Fitness.This way I could charge as little as I like. My motto is , if you can afford a fast food meal, you can afford to get started with us. Unfortunately good intentions do not pay rent or utilities or even insurance. Please help fund me so I can start local and work my way global on my war against obesity!

story:
As the only major country without universal healthcare,  the

increasingly controversial US medical system has inadvertently 

provided a dynamic alternative for its more astute citizens in 

the burgeoning new sector of Medical Tourism. 

In only a few years,  more and more Americans have taken advantage 

of the substantial savings available in destinations around the world

for such procedures as orthopedics,  bariatrics,  cardiology,  organ 

transplants,  dental,  optical and cosmetics  in hospitals meeting or 

exceeding the critical worldwide governing standards of JCI

(Joint Commission International).  

GLOBAL HEALTHCARE CONCIERGE LTD  has identified a timely and

comprehensive marketing opportunity addressing every detail from 

the patients’ initial inquiry to follow-up care upon the return home.

SCOPE OF GLOBAL HEALTHCARE CONCIERGE SERVICES 

• Monitor liaison between patient, patient’s PCP and destination hospital specialist   by internet ‘teleconference’

• Oversee patient’s completion of admittance documentation and submit

• Oversee and secure patient’s passport/visa documentation

• Make patient’s hotel reservations in host city

• Make patient’s & companion’s flight reservations

• Arrange ‘town car’ for patient’s transportation to airport

• Arrange ‘Welcome’ by Concierge in airline Exec. Lounge

• Provide ‘iPhone’ (or similar) for convenient local contact with Concierge and effortless international calls home

• Arrange hotel courtesy pick-up upon arrival in host city

• Arrange all courtesy transportation between hotel and hospital

• Schedule initial hospital admittance; monitor all activities relating to procedure, recuperation and discharge

• Arrange hotel visits of nursing and therapeutic staff for post-operative care, prior to final in-hospital review and discharge

• Arrange at least one cultural activity in host city

• Arrange optional ‘stop-over’ mini-vacation on return flight

• Arrange patient’s return home from airport by town car

• Arrange brief ‘Welcome Home’ at airport to foster new friendships and facilititate gratuities for Concierge

• Monitor continued post-operative care at home between patient, PCP and destination hospital specialist

• Maintain periodic contact with patient as a member of the ‘GHC Family’

THE CONCIERGE

Global Healthcare Concierge is unique among Medical Tourism facilitators in providing a congenial Concierge who meets the patients at the departing airport lounge and accompanies them from start to finish of their overseas journey.

Since all of the patients’ schedules have been pre-arranged, the Concierge’s principal duty is to discreetly oversee the smooth execution of each step.

Concierges are recruited from the hospitality and travel sectors where impeccable personal service is paramount, and where much of the Medical Tourism experience is centered.

Each patient is provided with an ‘iPhone’ (or similar) for direct contact with the Concierge,  as well as for secure calls home.

While being concurrently responsible for approximately 15 patients and their companions, the Concierge is carefully protective of the privacy of each.

The congenial interaction of the Concierge among the patients  serves to promote the concept of the “Global Healthcare Concierge family”, enriching the present experience and building goodwill for future trips and - most importantly - referrals.

Since Concierges are not full-time staff, they are paid a per diem,  with gratuities encouraged,  thereby providing incentive for impeccable service.

Continuum of Care

1. PCP submits patient’s medical records to GHC

2. GHC’s Consulting Physicians Network reviews records

3. GHC forwards records to destination hospital for review

4. By video-conference,  patient and PCP discuss proposed procedure with destination surgeon  

(A GHC Consulting Physician may also participate)

5. Following a day of acclimatizing rest at destination hotel, patient has pre-op meeting with entire surgical team at destination hospital

6. Upon completion of procedure,  patient remains in constant care of nursing team through initial recovery

7. At surgeon’s discretion,  patient may transfer to resort hotel for continued recovery,  receiving daily nursing visits and constant (non-professional) observation by GHC Concierge

8. Following a pre-discharge examination and at the surgeon’s discretion,  patient may undertake non-exhaustive local tourist activity 

9. Upon arrival at the US airport, patient is welcomed by a GHC representative prior to the onward journey home by town car

10. Within the first week of return, a GHC Consulting Physician will call patient to discuss recovery regimen,  and periodically during the first month

11. In the event of a complication,  a GHC Consulting Physician will undertake appropriate steps,  following consultation with the destination surgeon.   In such a case, professional fees are covered by the Complication Insurance Policy provided all patients by GHC

12. Following the complete recovery of patient,  it is GHC company policy to remain in regular contact by innovative social media initiatives as a means of generating referral business

Timeline

· Costa Rica  -  immediate

Patients are currently being recruited for treatment at the two JCI-approved hospitals in San Jose in such procedures as orthopedics,  bariatrics,  dental and cosmetics

. India  -  November,  2015

The inaugural trip to Aditya Birla Memorial Hospital in Pune,  India,

departs JFK Airport, New York Novenber 2nd, 2015

. Additional destinations

Within the next several months,  GHC Management will visit and establish contractual relationships with major East Asian hospitals in Singapore,  including a highly exclusive Liver Transplant Clinic,  in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia,  and Bangkok Hospital in the tropical resort of Phuket,  and in the Middle East in Amman,  Jordan,  including the King Hussein Cancer Center,  one of the foremost cancer specialists in the world,  and in United Arab Emirates with branches of two of the world's oldest and most prestigious hospitals.

· FIVE – YEAR  PLAN

GHC will add three destinations per year in Europe,  Asia and South America  and target one trip per week to each.

· MARKETING STRATEGY  -  CORPORATE

The Corporate Marketing Director devotes full time to Medical Insurers and US companies with self-funded healthcare coverage.

•  MARKETING STRATEGY  -  CONSUMER

GHC will utilize precise internet targeting techniques to reach directly to patients’ individual needs. along with conventional advertising direct to consumers through local and specialised media.

•  ‘SELL ON’  OPPORTUNITY

Since almost all patients will travel with a spouse or friend, GHC will take advantage of the opportunity to offer the partner a ‘lesser’ procedure,  such as dental or cosmetic or,  in the case of  Bangkok,  a holistic “wellness” technique from Thai culture.

· INNOVATIVE MARKET POSITIONING

While cost remains the principal appeal of  Medical Tourism,  as volume increases GHC will seek to position the experience as an educational benefit encouraging a deeper understanding of the diversity of cultures throughout the world,  and thereby nurturing furtive steps in the quest for world peace.

· NEWSLETTER/BLOG

The monthly Newsletter and Blog keeps all Contributors and a wide ranging e-mail list up to date on all GHC activities

· EXPENSE  PROJECTION

Estimated Revenue  11/01/2015  -  12/31/2015  $  45,000.00

Estimated Revenue  1/01/2016 –  12/31/2016  $ 675,000.00

story:
BirdGlider

The BirdGlider plans are available FOR FREE. Consider it my gift to the aviation world. Go see the video!!

It is designed for YOU. It can help YOU to become a pilot. It is easy enough for YOU. And will be at low budget so YOU can afford it.

But to build the prototype i need YOU.

I did all to go as far as i could. But i lack the funds to finish the prototype. Without prototype, no test flights. Without test flights, no knowledge about flight behaviour. No knowledge about flight behaviour, no trust in BirdGlider. No trust, no BirdGlider. And ...there are not  a lot of other options that can be as easy to make, easy to use, safe to use as the BirdGlider.


So ...the BirdGlider airplane stands and falls with YOU. It could be my gift to the aviation world or ...it might become shelved. And that last would be a loss. Not for me. But for YOU.

Who am i?

I have been around for more than a decade on the internet. My Nest of Dragons website became the home of the weird airplanes. I tried to explain why some non-conventional designs were made and what were their advantages and disadvantages. I always tried to talk in easy words as i mostly have the men of the street in my mind. Weird and low budget became the main features on my website.
After that decade of just talking about airplanes, i started to construct things. Not always airplane related, but i made some nice stuff in the past. A electric recumbent scooter called the Funbike. Gullwing doors for the Secma F16. A new fairing for the Bi-Swift of our gliding club. A nearly finished project called DragonWing to revive the intellect of the Horten HXc. My findings during my DragonWing tests are being used by NASA with their Prandtl project. 

New fairing for Bi-Swift

I am not a engineer. But i have friends who are. The team of Predrag Devic did wonderful work. Thanks, guys. My creativity and their knowledge about strength, materials and aerodynamics did lead to a few nice designs. The BirdGlider, the DragonCub (a Flying Flea with metal-alu construction. FAR103) and a third (which i like to keep a secret now)


DragonCub, my attempt to revive the Flying Flea concept of Henri Mignet.

What will i gain?

Nothing except the fact that a design of me and my team will not become shelved. It will life on. I am sure i will get wet eyes if i ever will see a person getting airborne with my BirdGlider.

What will YOU gain?

Depends on your situation.

  • If you are looking for fun flying, relaxed flying, you may stop your search. This is it. BirdGlider might be the end of YOUr search.
  • If you are using a wheelchair (old hangglider pilot for instance)...it opens possibilities. It might be the perfect, affordable tool to get YOU in the air (again). You might realise (continue) your dream of flight.
  • If you were just afraid of those foot landings with your hangglider, you may stop being afraid. The BirdGlider lands on a wheel. It saves YOUr feet.

In other words ...YOU gain possibilities ...after the prototype proofed its stability and safe use.

The Impact

For a long time i have been following the low budget airplanes. Sadly ...i saw many disappear and not a lot of them being developed. BirdGlider is meant to fill that gap. The gap between YOU standing on the ground and YOU being AIRBORNE.

Risks & Challenges

The risks for me are pretty severe.

  • I apply as test pilot of the BirdGlider. I am just a beginner pilot. But i take the risk. I lost a daughter already. Not going to loose a friend because i made a mistake in the design. I realise if all goes wrong ...i risk my neck. There was talk about some professional test pilot willing to take the test flights. He is the only person i allow to do the test flights if he still want to do it.
  • If some not-so-noble person finds a gap in my rules, he might make me loose my house in a lawsuit. He will not gain a lot of money, but ...i will loose my future.
  • If i need to put more personal money in this project, i loose the change to finish my third project. And that one will be also a good airplane for low budget flying. But this one will make it possible for YOU to travel with your airplane. And i really would hate to loose that adventure.

The risk of the builder of the prototype in USA. 

  • I gave my connection parts of my half finished prototype to a guy in the USA in a attempt to have the prototype ready for Airventure 2015 in Oshkosh, Wisconsin, USA. He sadly had some heart problems, so he cannot build it himself anymore. But he wants now to start building the prototype with students of a technical school. And i am pretty sure he is able to get it done. BirdGlider is really easy to build. It was my first alu bolt and rivet work and i made half of the airplane in 25 hours! The challenge of the young builders will be enormous. They will build a airplane! They don't have a drivers license, but ...they build a airplane. Imagine that!

What you get in return?

Sorry. But i will not promise any T-shirts or buttons or whatever as a gift after your donation. I don't want you to loose more money than you would like to donate. Doesn't seem fair to me towards you.

All i can say is that YOU win ...the possibility to create YOUr own way to become airborne. The plans are for free. The materials are not that expensive. The build up is not so hard. And ...with the test results of the test flights you will gain the certainty that you are working on a good airplane. A airplane for ...the men of the street.

If i raise more money?

The extra money will be spend on the installation of engines on the prototype and to test that configuration of new, reinforced connection parts (to replace the old ones) and the engines. If still some money left over, it will be used for my other low-budget design prototypes. So ...it will all go into aviation development. All with as goal group the men of the street and disabled persons.

story:
Product demo







So why reinvent the hair dryer?

Well, the answer is simple really…
The standard hair dryer causes hair chaos and frizz. 

I have a background in Information Technology and I am accustomed to looking at a problem, assessing the issue, breaking down the requirements, engaging the correct team of resources, creating the solution, and driving to success.

With my background and need to win the war on frizz, I have developed and patented a new hair dryer that will remove or substantially reduce frizz from your morning routine. Now everyday can be a great hair day!

Let me state that I love hair products,  all hair products. Flat irons, curling irons, hair goop, all of it. However, I have fine, baby-like hair that I keep "encouraging" to naturally change color to the blonde that I believe I truly am.  



Benefits of this new hair dryer:

1. Eliminate or substantially reduce hair chaos (frizz)! Really, who doesn't want that? 

2. Faster drying time by using hot air in both directions. 

3. Less damage to the hair follicle by reducing time with other damaging hair tools (ex: flat iron). If you want that poker straight hair you may still have to use a flat iron.

4. Smooth hair, not flat hair - when you use the flat iron (to get rid of frizz) you sometimes end up with flat hair. The Smoothing Hair dryer will not flatten your hair. It will allow body and fullness but still eliminate the hair chaos (frizz).

5. Get the polished look by using the smoothing feature without the heat.  This option is great to refresh your hair without the time commitment of redoing it. 


Where did we start?

Step 1: Define the idea



Step 2: Build a simple proof of concept out of household components




Step 3: File for provisional patent

Step 4: Design prototype that can use a standard hair dryer and a vacuum to establish proof of concept. 



Step 5: Build 3D model prototype to work with existing hair dryer (white attachment on front of hair dryer)



Step 6: Hire an industrial designer 


Step 7: Create a 3D drawing 


Step 8: Create a design for the final product



Step 9 (Where we are now): Funding - We need your help!

Challenges - The Next Phases

Now that we have established the proof of concept and secured the necessary legal documents, we enter the engineering stage of the process. The next couple of phases are critical to ensure that the product can withstand everyday use and achieve the desired results. 

This is where we need your help.


 As you can see in the chart below I have outlined a project plan with a time line of expected dates and estimated costs. As anyone knows, a time line and budget are estimates, and must remain flexible to accommodate unforeseen challenges.  


This product has a 18 month development period but the good new is you will only have 18 months more of hair chaos then you will have the tools to fight this war on hair chaos.


Miscellaneous information:

How long will the hair dryer last: A normal hair dryer will last 1000 hours so the length of days depending on how long you use your hair dryer on a daily bases. 

How often will I have to change the smoothing material: that will depend on whether you use a product in your hair.

Will my hair ever enter the hair dryer at any point: No, the smoothing material will engage with the hair to smooth the hair follicles. The hair will never enter the hair dryer or go through the smoothing material. 

Can I wash the smoothing material in the washer: yes it is machine washable.

Will the front end of the hair dryer rotate in a 360 degree - yes, it will swivel complete around to allow the user complete control of the air flow.

Will the hair dryer work as a normal hair dryer: yes, it will have all the same attributes as a regular hair dryer. 

The smoothing material, will there be other smoothing material: yes, we are working to develop multiply types for many different types of hair. 





Joan Hada - CEO & Inventor

Step 2: Build a simple proof of concept out of household components






Step 3: File for provisional patent
Step 4: Design prototype that can use a standard hair dryer and a vacuum to establish proof of concept. 



Step 5: Build 3D model prototype to work with existing hair dryer (white attachment on front of hair dryer)





Step 6: Hire an industrial designer 


Step 7: Create a 3D drawing 


Step 8: Create a design for the final product






Step 9 (Where we are now): Funding - We need your help!


Challenges - The Next Phases
Now that we have established the proof of concept and secured the necessary legal documents, we enter the engineering stage of the process. The next couple of phases are critical to ensure that the product can withstand everyday use and achieve the desired results. 
This is where we need your help.


 As you can see in the chart below I have outlined a project plan with a time line of expected dates and estimated costs. As anyone knows, a time line and budget are estimates, and must remain flexible to accommodate unforeseen challenges.  





This product has a 18 month development period but the good new is you will only have 18 months more of hair chaos then you will have the tools to fight this war on hair chaos.

Miscellaneous information:
How long will the hair dryer last: A normal hair dryer will last 1000 hours so the length of days depending on how long you use your hair dryer on a daily bases. 
How often will I have to change the smoothing material: that will depend on whether you use a product in your hair.
Will my hair ever enter the hair dryer at any point: No, the smoothing material will engage with the hair to smooth the hair follicles. The hair will never enter the hair dryer or go through the smoothing material. 
Can I wash the smoothing material in the washer: yes it is machine washable.
Will the front end of the hair dryer rotate in a 360 degree - yes, it will swivel complete around to allow the user complete control of the air flow.
Will the hair dryer work as a normal hair dryer: yes, it will have all the same attributes as a regular hair dryer. 
The smoothing material, will there be other smoothing material: yes, we are working to develop multiply types for many different types of hair. 










Joan Hada - CEO & Inventor

story:
Save the Sight of Someone in Need for only $40 - Fund a Trachoma surgery in Ethiopia

Trachoma is the leading infectious cause of blindness worldwide, affecting 41 million people, most of them in the world's poorest countries. Children are the most frequently infected by trachoma which, if untreated, causes a painful and irreversible blindness by age 30-40. 

Ethiopia is particularly severely affected, making up 30% of trachoma cases in all of Africa. In fact, trachoma is the second leading cause of blindness in the country.

Trachoma is a completely preventable and treatable cause of blindness. Blindness and severe pain can be prevented through a safe, affordable surgical procedure that costs only $40 per patient. Unfortunately, most patients cannot afford the necessary treatments and as a result, many of the 1.2 million people who need surgery will go irreversibly blind from this disease. 

Our mission is to make high quality eye care more accessible to the world's poorest communities and help prevent blindness caused not only by trachoma but by many diseases that affect the eye. You can help us get started by funding the first surgeries performed by our new, state-of-the art eye hospital in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. 


What We Need

Sight for Souls is a Christian non-profit company dedicated to bringing world class eye care to countries in need. Our first project is an eye hospital in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, the Discovery Specialized Eye Hospital, which will treat this city of 6 million people, many of whom suffer from acute or chronic Trachoma and need surgery to save their sight. 

  • Trachoma surgery is only $40 per person. Our goal is to raise funds to perform 1,000 trachoma surgeries through the Discovery Specialized Eye Hospital.
  • Your funds will go directly to helping us open the hospital and perform surgeries on affected patients.
  • Additional funds beyond our goal will fund new equipment to help us perform further trachoma surgeries, pilot our affordable cataract surgery program, and train Ethiopia's new generation of ophthalmologists and eye care professionals.

The Impact

Trachoma is a leading cause of blindness, particularly in the developing world. Infection spreads from person to person, especially among families and in communities with shortages of water, numerous flies, or over-crowded living conditions (often the poorest communities in the world).

Infection often begins during infancy or childhood and can become chronic. If left untreated, the infection eventually causes the eyelid to turn inwards, which in turn causes the eyelashes to rub on the eyeball, resulting in intense pain and scarring of the front of the eye. This frequently leads to irreversible blindness, typically between 30 and 40 years of age.

Our campaign has the potential to save the vision of 1,000 people in Ethiopia. Our hospital has the potential to save the vision of hundreds of thousands more. 

Who We Are

Sight for Souls is a Christian nonprofit organization transforming lives and communities in the Developing World through the gift of sight for the body and soul. Motivated by the love and example of our faith, we seek to alleviate blindness through sustainable programs in areas with the greatest need. Our inaugural project is the establishment of the Discovery Eye Institute (DEI) in Addis Ababa Ethiopia. The DEI is a joint initiative of Ethiopian and American ophthalmologists to provide world class clinical care and serve as a leader in advanced training for doctors and eye care personnel in Africa. Learn more about our main goals and meet our team.

Leadership

Demissie Tadesse, MD is a leading Ethiopian ophthalmologist with 18 years of clinical experience. An exceptional anterior segment surgeon, Dr. Demissie is an honorary Assistant Professor of Ophthalmology at Addis Ababa University. He is an established leader of blindness alleviation programs in Eastern Africa, having provided transformational leadership as Director of Sabatia Eye Hospital in Kenya for six years. During his tenure, Sabatia became self-sustaining and one of the three highest volume ophthalmic surgical centers in Kenya. He is former President of the Ophthalmological Society of Ethiopia and Chair of the National Committee for Blindness Prevention. Dr. Demissie presently serves as Eastern Africa Regional Blindness Consultant for Christian Blind Mission International, in part overseeing trachoma services.

John Kempen, MD, MPH, MHS, PhD is an internationally renowned academic ophthalmologist and researcher specializing in inflammatory disorders of the eye (a specialty completely unrepresented in sub-Saharan Africa including South Africa). His research has resulted in over 100 peer-reviewed scientific publications, and he continues to lead multiple large-scale US and international research projects. He formerly directed the Public Health Ophthalmology Program at Johns Hopkins, one of the two leading international ophthalmology programs in the world. He serves as Associate Editor-in-Chief of Ophthalmic Epidemiology and on three additional editorial boards, including as Executive Editor emeritus for the ocular inflammation section of the American Journal of Ophthalmology. He is a Professor of Ophthalmology and Epidemiology at the University of Pennsylvania where he serves as Division Director for Ocular Inflammation and for Ophthalmic Epidemiology and International Ophthalmology. He is currently involved in clinical research about trachoma in Ethiopia.

Scott Lawrence, MD, MDiv, ThM is an academic ophthalmologist specializing in glaucoma, the second leading cause of blindness in the world. With extensive international experience, he currently serves as Assistant Professor of Ophthalmology and Division Director for Glaucoma at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, USA. He is a nationally recognized expert and lecturer on cataract surgery and the management of glaucoma, with numerous peer-reviewed articles in his specialty. Dr. Lawrence is an experienced educator and is heavily engaged in clinical and surgical ophthalmology resident education. He supervises an AUPO-certified glaucoma fellowship program and has mentored numerous visiting international fellows. Dr. Lawrence also coordinates a state-of-the-art surgical training lab for cataract surgery and glaucoma instruction. His research interests include treatment adherence, glaucoma surgical outcomes, gene-based therapy for glaucoma and trachoma work.

Our Goals

Innovation: Sight for Souls is dedicated to providing state-of-the-art clinical and surgical eye care to alleviate the burden of avoidable blindness in sub-Saharan Africa. Our commitment to excellence in providing world-class service requires that our work be innovative, sustainable and scalable. Our cutting edge technology and expertise in cataract and refractive surgery will provide service to all, while providing revenue to subsidize trachoma care for the poor.

Training: Sight for Souls is focused on training African ophthalmologists eye health professionals to lead and provide world-class eye care to currently underserved sub-Saharan Africa. To achieve this goal, we are developing an international caliber residency and comprehensive subspecialty care training. We also value investment in job creation and staff development at all levels of the organization.

Public Health: Sight for Souls has developed a strategy for reaching the rural communities of Ethiopia, which bear the heaviest burden of poverty-related eye disease. Through short-term clinical and surgical projects, community education and screening programs, and public health initiatives, we aim to enable people and their communities to reach their full potential and overcome barriers from blindness from trachoma, cataracts, and other problems.

Research: Sight for Souls will mobilize the extensive research experience of its leaders to improve ophthalmic services, residency training and community health efforts. We are determined to identify and implement best practices in alleviating blindness in underserved areas and to openly share our findings to benefit the global community.

For all of the thousands of years that man has marveled at the beauty of sea shells no one has ever mastered the art of closing off the upper chamber to create a natural oil reservoir.
* Lifetime lamps can be refilled forever*


  1. See Perks>  http://www.ConchKing.com/Wish-Lamps-IndieGoGo.htm

    Unique never seen before Glorious Natural Art Form and Design Genius!

 

            For the Indigenous Indians of old, Seashells had very special powers
                          I think they would have loved these Natural lamps ! 
  • Glorious Unique natural gifts in our new age of everything Electric 

The future is proven to be very promising

The very best news is that I now have a great many commercial stores that are begging to buy these lamps from me. Unfortunately I do not have enough time to meet the demand without any trained help. I now need to train about 3 persons to help create these lovely lamps for sale to other merchants. And I need a larger commercial location to work from. These new talented  hands will cost money and time to train but they will make all of the difference.

After many years of work I have finally mastered the complete collection of 10 lamps.
Now I am appealing to the true patrons of the arts for support. I am not a starving young artist I am a starving old artist at 68. I have worked throughout the world mostly as a ships captain with many years aboard fishing and sailing vessels and airplanes. Thus my connection to beautiful seashells.

This will be the most perfect edition ever made !

story:
Meet Thumby

In a nutshell, Thumby protects your secret data from prying eyes and thieves. With the combination of the integrated hardware encryption chip, your iPhone’s Touch ID sensor and Bluetooth Smart interface, Thumby ensures ultimate security and reliability for your private files. Thumby will make your busy life more efficient and productive.


 

Thumby For Everyone

We believe in privacy. More or less, everyone keep their critical information in digital environments, therefore, protecting that information is essential. Identity information, bank accounts, credit cards, passwords of all kinds, private messages, corporate data, important project files, financial records, know-how information, chat logs, secret photos, private videos, sound records, etc. You can extend this list easily.

For a brief moment, think of losing your laptop or your hard drive which holds all kinds of valuable sensitive data. You would be at the mercy of anyone who stumbles through it. Thanks to Thumby, there’s no need to worry anymore. Your data remains to be secure even if your drive falls into the wrong hands.

 



Easy to Set Up and Use

Thumby is designed to replace your standard unsecure external hard drive enclosure. It’s not just compact and stylish it’s also extremely easy to set up and use, in just a few steps.

Each Thumby pack comes with a USB 3.0 cable, a mini screwdriver, an instruction manual and a printed unique master key to activate your Thumby.

You simply install your 2.5” SSD or mechanical hard drive into Thumby and connect it to your computer through the USB port. Finally, the companion iOS app needs to be installed on your iPhone in order to control your Thumby. That’s all there is to it! Now you’re ready to safely store your valuable data.  

 


Thumby is designed to give you a wide feature set you turn on and off to suit your needs. Thumby basically has two operation modes that are explained in details below.

Automatic Locking/Unlocking

With this mode enabled, the moment you enter inside the predefined distange range, Thumby will automatically unlock your drive. You can directly access your data when you stay inside this area. When you’re out, Thumby will automatically lock your drive.




 

Unlocking With Your Fingerprint

When you’re demanding extra security, Touch ID mode comes handy. With this mode is enabled, Thumby will automatically lock your drive when you’re out of the predefined distange range. This is much like the previously explained automatic locking/unlocking mode except, when you enter inside the predefined range, your drive needs to be unlocked with Touch ID authentication. This mode adds an extra layer or protection, preventing intruders accessing your drive even if they took your iPhone without your permission.



  

Elegant Design

After designing a fair amount of different prototypes, we finally made Thumby that is beautifully and minimally designed. It is stylish and lightweight. Thumby will be available in five different vibrant colors you can choose from; black, silver, blue, pink and gold.



Technical Specifications

Thumby uses Bluetooth Smart (Bluetooth Low Energy) technology in order to communicate with your iPhone. This protocol is eco-friendly and consumes very small amount of battery power when it’s active. Thumby encrypts your data on-the-fly, using a unique master key together with your Touch ID. Thumby uses an unparalleled encyption algorithm, which is executed by the integrated cryptoprocessor. For that reason, encryption/decryption process does not slow down your data transfer. Under the hood, Thumby uses a specially designed asymmetric encryption algorithm for the bluetooth communication which is carried out between your Iphone and Thumby. This aforementioned bluetooth signal encryption algorithm prevents man-in-the-middle and sniffing attacks. Thumby serves maximum data transfer capability when paired with a USB 3.0 drive. 

  





Compatibility


 

Supported Devices

Unfortunately, there won’t be any support for iPhone 4 and older versions, because those iPhone models don’t have bluetooth smart capability.



Perks for Our Contributors

Here’s the complete list of our Indiegogo perks. In early bird period, shipment is FREE and the single unit price is $50 OFF. Thumby costs only for $129 at the moment. Thumby is affordable for everyone. Do not miss out this great opportunity and order your Thumby with the color of your choice now.

 



Color Options


 

Stretch Goals


If can we get enough support, we will be able to develop Thumby for the other platforms like iPad, Apple Watch, and perhaps for Android Phones and Android Wear devices.

 

iPad



 Apple Watch


Android Devices



Thumby Project Timeline


Shipment Details


* We will ship Thumby all around the world without any exceptions.
* If you order Thumby in early bird period, shipment is free. After this, you will be charged.
* International Registered Air Mail will be used for deliveries.
* You will be able to track your package with the provided tracking number.
* Delivery takes 8 to 20 working days depending on your destination.

 



Risks & Challenges 

We know what it takes to deliver on schedule. We know that every project has it’s challenges. We’re confident that our experience in design, engineering and manufacturing helps us know what to expect and how to handle the unexpected.

A lot of time and effort is spent on developing Thumby. We’ve come a long way and now we need your help to finalize our development and go into mass production. Your support is absolutely necessary to cut down production costs and refine the user experience for our mobile app.

We understand that given the opportunity to be here on Indiegogo and to get support within the community is also an obligation. We will update you frequently as well as we always will appreciate any input on our project.

 

Our Team 

We’re an independent team passionate about creating innovative technologies through collaboration. We are passionate about utilizing technology to make lives simpler. Our team has designed, manufactured many devices before.

 

Awards and Thank You 

We are going to send a heartwarming thank-you message to all of our supporters. As a token of our appreciation, "Best Supporter of the Thumby Project" trophy will be rewarded to our top three supporters in case we fulfill our goal.




Spread the Word

Even if you can’t contribute, we kindly ask for your help to spread the word around. We’re grateful to you for sharing Thumby project on social media with the Indiegogo sharing tools or e-mailing the page link to someone you think could benefit from the convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that we provide. Thanks in advance.

Website       :  www.thumbydrive.com
Twitter         : www.twitter.com/ThumbyDrive
 Facebook    : www.facebook.com/ThumbyDrive
Vimeo          : http://www.vimeo.com/ThumbyDrive
Youtube      : www.youtube.com/ThumbyDrive

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Do I need to buy a new hard drive for Thumby?

A: Not necessarily if you have a spare one.

Q: I don’t have a storage drive. What would you recommend?

A: We recommend that you buy a decent Sata3 SSD to get the best performance out of Thumby.

Q: If I remove the hard drive from Thumby, can I access the data elsewhere?

A: No, you can’t. That’s the whole point of having Thumby.

Q: If I lose my iPhone, will I be able to recover my data?

A: Yes. You can connect to your Thumby with unique master key and your new iPhone.

Q: Thumby specifications can change before delivery?

A: Yes. As in any crowdfunding campaign, changes are possible. We reserve the right to make changes.

Q: Can I use multiple Thumby devices with my iPhone?

A: Yes. Multiple devices are supported through our iPhone app.

needs to be installed on your iPhone in order to control your Thumby. 
That’s all there is to it! Now you’re ready to safely store your valuable data.  


 








Thumby is designed to give you a wide feature set you turn on and off to suit your needs. Thumby basically has two operation modes that are explained in details below.



Automatic Locking/Unlocking


With this mode enabled, the moment you enter inside the predefined distange range, Thumby will 
automatically unlock your drive. You can directly access your data when you stay 
inside this area. When you’re out, Thumby will 
automatically lock your drive.











 



Unlocking With Your Fingerprint


When you’re demanding extra security, Touch ID mode comes handy. With this mode 
is enabled, Thumby will 
automatically lock your drive when you’re out of the predefined distange range. 
This is much like the previously explained automatic locking/unlocking mode 
except, when you enter inside the predefined range, your drive needs to be 
unlocked with Touch ID authentication. This mode adds an extra layer or 
protection, preventing intruders accessing your drive even if they took your 
iPhone without your permission.













  



Elegant Design


After designing a fair amount of different prototypes, we finally made Thumby that 
is beautifully and minimally designed. It is stylish and lightweight. Thumby will 
be available in five different vibrant colors you can choose from; black, 
silver, blue, pink and gold.


















Technical Specifications



Thumby uses 
Bluetooth Smart (Bluetooth Low Energy) technology in order to communicate with 
your iPhone. This protocol is eco-friendly and consumes very small amount of 
battery power when it’s active. Thumby encrypts 
your data on-the-fly, using a unique master key together with your Touch ID. Thumby uses 
an unparalleled encyption algorithm, 
which is executed by the integrated cryptoprocessor. 
For that reason, encryption/decryption process does not slow down your data 
transfer. Under the hood, Thumby uses 
a specially designed asymmetric encryption algorithm for the bluetooth communication 
which is carried out between your Iphone and Thumby. 
This aforementioned bluetooth signal 
encryption algorithm prevents man-in-the-middle and sniffing attacks. Thumby serves 
maximum data transfer capability when paired with a USB 3.0 drive. 


  



















Compatibility










 



Supported Devices









Unfortunately, there won’t be any support for iPhone 4 and older versions, because those iPhone models don’t have bluetooth smart capability.







Perks for Our Contributors


Here’s the complete list of our Indiegogo perks. 
In early bird period, shipment is FREE and 
the single unit price is $50 
OFF. Thumby costs 
only for $129 at 
the moment. Thumby is 
affordable for everyone. Do not miss out this great opportunity and order your Thumby with 
the color of your choice now.


 












Color Options

















 



Stretch Goals









If can we get enough support, we will be able to develop Thumby for 
the other platforms like iPad, Apple Watch, and perhaps for Android Phones and 
Android Wear devices.


 




iPad







Apple Watch







Android Devices








Thumby Project 
Timeline












Shipment Details


* We will ship Thumby all around the world without any exceptions.
* If you order Thumby in early bird period, shipment is free. After this, you will be charged.
* International Registered Air Mail will be used for deliveries.
* You will be able to track your package with the provided tracking number.
* Delivery takes 8 to 20 working days depending on your destination.


 












Risks & Challenges 


We know what it takes to deliver on schedule. We know that every project has it’s challenges. 
We’re confident that our experience in design, engineering and manufacturing 
helps us know what to expect and how to handle the unexpected.


A lot of time and effort is spent on developing Thumby. 
We’ve come a long way and now we need your help to finalize our development and 
go into mass production. Your support is absolutely necessary to cut down 
production costs and refine the user experience for our mobile app.


We understand that given the opportunity to be here on Indiegogo and 
to get support within the community is also an obligation. We will update you 
frequently as well as we always will appreciate any input on our project.


 



Our Team 


We’re an independent team passionate about creating innovative technologies 
through collaboration. We are passionate about utilizing technology to make 
lives simpler. Our team has designed, manufactured many devices before.


 



Awards and Thank You 


We are going to send a heartwarming thank-you message to all of our supporters. 
As a token of our appreciation, "Best Supporter of the Thumby Project" 
trophy will be rewarded to our top three supporters in case we fulfill our goal.














Spread the Word


Even if you can’t contribute, we kindly ask for your help to spread the word 
around. We’re grateful to you for sharing Thumby project 
on social media with the Indiegogo sharing 
tools or e-mailing the page link to someone you think could benefit from the 
convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that we provide. Thanks in 
advance.


Website       :  www.thumbydrive.com
Twitter         : www.twitter.com/ThumbyDrive


Facebook    : www.facebook.com/ThumbyDrive
Vimeo          : http://www.vimeo.com/ThumbyDrive
Youtube      
: www.youtube.com/ThumbyDrive


 


 



Frequently Asked Questions



Q: Do I need to buy a new hard drive for Thumby?


A: Not necessarily if you have a spare one.



Q: I don’t have a storage drive. What would you recommend?


A: We recommend that you buy a decent Sata3 SSD to get the best performance out 
of Thumby.



Q: If I remove the hard drive from Thumby, 
can I access the data elsewhere?


A: No, you can’t. That’s the whole point of having Thumby.



Q: If I lose my iPhone, will I be able to recover my data?


A: Yes. You can connect to your Thumby with 
unique master key and your new iPhone.



Q: Thumby specifications 
can change before delivery?


A: Yes. As in any crowdfunding campaign, 
changes are possible. We reserve the right to make changes.



Q: Can I use multiple Thumby devices 
with my iPhone?


A: Yes. Multiple devices are supported through our iPhone app.

story:
Introducing, The World's First Compact Device to Increase Sexual Experience for Men, Without Taking Dangerous Drugs.

We thought that the risks connected to drugs act to improve the sexual experience for a man were too high and dangerous, so we create a device that can do the same thing, even better, without any side effect! 

OloRing is a simple compact device that can maximize your performance in bed, activating those muscles situated in the pubo-coccygeous part of the body. 

the press love us, too...

     

        



And much more!

   

                                           


                                           


                                      

It uses electronic waves to gently stimulate those muscles that can influence male sexual activity


                                       

Oloring is super easy to waer and comfortable, check the real size on the video Below! so you can visualize it perfectly!





                                         

Indiegogo special price for this pack is: LIMITED 99$, normal 128$.

Retail price will be 199$.

Get OloRing at the best price ever, and for ever!

                                                         


                             

                         

In few words, if you bring us 5 OloRing's Future Users, we will give yours FOR FREE!

HOW? Follow these simple steps:

Details:

1 - Log In on Indiegogo.com (it's easy and it takes just 2 minutes) and get your OloRing Pack from our perks.

2 - Share this campaign using ALL button links on top of the page, under the video.

3 - DONE! Every 5 OloRings delivered thanks to your referral links, we will refound one OloRing TOTALLY FREE! Ones the campaign is ended, email us to get your OloRing as you prefer. 

If you want read this explained more in details with images clic here


                               

            Indiegogo

OloRing Precious Metal Limited Edition!

Just here on indiegogo, you can have the most extraordinary OloRings ever produced! Get Oloring made 100% pure SILVER metal and OloRing made 100% pure GOLD 24K.
Be UNIQUE and get OloRing Metal Edition, to be always the best, even in bed! Girls will be fascinated!

You'll receive them in a special box, like a King receive his Crown!


         

 

                                             

 

*IMPORTANT* Your Backing Will Be Totally Anonymous & Discreet!

If you do not wish for your name to show up on the campaign page, simply click this box when you are making your contribution:

Your package will be shipped 100% DISCREET. There is no way to know what it is inside of the box!

Where your money goes:

We have made lot's of prototypes and done many tests. Now, thanks to your contribution, we will be able to start producing OloRing. We're also testing OloRing in hospitals, with patients that have been operated of deep prostatectomy. The hope is to be able to give them the possibility to have erections again and not lose the penis functionality. Select Perk "OloRing for hospitals" to donate some OloRing to patients. Thank you!

Risks & Challenges:

We are trying to make everyman a sort of god of sex, without having to take some medicine or a kind of. Our challenge can make some difference! it's hard to believe but, it's not that impossible as you may think. If you speak with your Urologist, he will tell you that if you move and train your pubococcygeus muscle you really can enhance your sexual ability. Well, is not that easy as it sounds, and so we have made something that can do it for you! 

The challenge of this campaign is to reach the goal so to permit us start the massive production of this product.

How you can help?

Even if you do not contribute withe money to this campaign, you can share this page and the campaign video in your social networks! thanks to you we will get more and more exposure and more and more closer to the goal! don't hesitate, for you it will just take a minute, for us it will mean infinite gratitude and a step more closer to success! thank you!

How much is shipping?

Shipping is free for the first 200 packs. Other orders will require an additional contribution for shipping on top of the amount paid for the Perk (please see the details listed in each Perk).

All other international customers:  Please add the required additional contribution for shipping only.  Note that the buyer is responsible for all duties, taxes, or other fees which may be added on import/delivery.

* If you forgot to add the additional contribution to your order, please place a separate order with the required amount and we will link it to your original order.

Return policy:

If you receive your OloRing broken or damaged, you have 30 days starting from the day we ship, to send us back the OloRing in the original pack as you  opened it. We will replace it FOR FREE with a new one! 

How do I define my size?

Take a flexible string.

Starting from the base-top of your penis, do a circle remaining close to your body, including the base of your testicles and end it at the point of start.

Then measure the length of the string and verify which size fits better for you:

N: 18 – 20 cm

L: 20 – 22 cm

E: 22 – 24 cm

How often should I replace my adhesives?

You should replace the adhesive with a new one every 10/15 times you put the OloRing on.

How much will the replacement adhesives cost?

You've already 5 adhesives in the pack. Five more adhesives will cost you 15$.

Is the battery rechargeable or does it need to be replaced?

The OloRing comes with two ion battery that gives you 10 hours of usage each. If we reach our stretch goal we will able to make OloRing wireless rechargeable, so you will receive one rechargeable battery and one wireless charger, to never stop using it.

Is the OloRing FDA approved?

No.  The OloRing is intended for consumer use only and is not a medical device. We are in process of medical device approval.

Who should I contact with questions about my order?

Please contact our Support team at orders@olodevice.com with any questions related to your order.
