The composting takes place efficiently and fast.
Our composting toilets run water-free. That's a great advantage in countries where there's water shortage and the sewage systems are undeveloped like Ghana.
Commonly used pit latrines with poor underground structures cause leakage of the waste into water tables and the heavy rains and floods during the raining season spread severe diseases from the open sewers. Such problems have been taken into consideration with our products.

The underground structures of the composting toilets are waterproof and there's a flood proof solution of one-half meter in most of our models.
When the facility is used and maintained all the waste breaks down into natural compost manure. This is a very affordable and Eco-friendly waste treatment solution. The compost manure collection from our facilities is easy and there's no need for trucks to zigzag on the bad, narrow roads of overpopulated urban areas.
In the capital of Ghana, Accra, 120 trucks of untreated waste is dumped into the Atlantic Ocean every day because of insufficient waste treatment plants for the highly populated city. Instead of creating waste, our toilets provide compost manure as an end product. It is an affordable natural fertilizer to be used by farmers. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the Toilet Dreams to your family, friends and work place or other potential businesses to join this project!
Also use the Indiegogo share tools to share Toilet Dreams on your social media channels. Make an impact with us. Thank you.

story:
ABOUT GREEK OLIVE OIL

Olive oil is an essential ingredient of the Greek diet and of the Mediterranean countries’ diet. It has high rates of monounsaturated fatty acids (MUFA), especially oleic acid, and lower rates of saturated fatty acids (SFA). Studies have shown that the monounsaturated fatty acids have better antiatherosclerotic effects than the saturated fatty acids and reduce the cardiovascular risk factors and also reduces the cholesterol. It can be used in a plethora of foods and it is the best oil to use while cooking. Best chefs propose Greek olive oil for dressing or cooking due to its superior quality!!

Greek olive oil is the best olive in the world, 75% of the Greek olive oil is extra virgin olive oil, which is the best category of olive oil. Spain and Italy import our olive oil mixed it with their olive oil and sell it as theirs, scandals like these have came in publicity. 

My olive oil is extra virgin olive oil, the most premium quality with all the necessary certifications to prove it. It is pure and natural olive oil, not pesticides or synthetic fertilizers used, it has it natural taste and flavor.


ABOUT MY DREAM

I am calling the health-conscious community, and not only, to help me build my start up in order to make my dream real and also to let more people try a delicious product. I have already a delicious product but I miss the finance to start a company and to create a logo and a package for the product. Since I get the goal and get the finance I will be able to settle my company and ship my product in stores worldwide in order to find it easily. All procedures will begin when the campaign ends and will be very quick because of the desire to start this company.

 

ABOUT ME

I am a 26 years old, current unemployed, young guy with a lot of desire and willingness to start a company in my field of interest where I am really good. I have a university First Class degree in International Business with Food and Agribusiness Management and my background is from an agriculture family. So, I have the best combination, education with practical experience. I want to make more people get in touch with the liquid gold called Greek olive oil. I am already cultivating olive trees so I have my production and my olive oil but I need this money to create a logo, a package and to start my company. Unfortunately, for the time being it is just a good idea due to the lack of funding :(  . 

TIMELINE

End of campaign: Late November 2015

Create logo, package, and bureaucracy: Late January-February 2016

Start producing: February-March 2016

Shipping: February-March 2016

YOUR CONTRIBUTION

Unfortunately for the time being it is just a good idea but with your help it can become real!! So I kindly ask for your help!! You will not only help to the beginning of the company but also to the environment because as the demand increases I will plant more olive trees with environmental friendly techniques!! Also, if you like this idea please share it with your friends so they can help!!

                  

                                 THANK YOU!!!

story:
Better Sleep!

I like to think that I'm your average American with a wife and kids. My primary goal with Cradling Sleeper(TM) is simply to bring better sleep to the world. Too many people in America and the world can't afford a high-end mattress (or a mattress at all), and I'd love to help these people out.

Contributions will help me increase production and inventory, and get the good word out of our work to bring better sleep to the world.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm asking for $20,000 and would certainly accept more to propel Cradling Sleeper(TM) into stores across America and internationally. My product is made by Carpenter Company here in the USA, so sales also help our economy.

With your $39.95+ contribution, I'll send you a Cradling Sleeper(TM) to try out yourself! Any extra is certainly appreciated and will accelerate better sleep for the masses! I can't thank you enough for your trust in me to bring my idea to life.

Risks & Challenges

As with any start-up, there is significant risk of my product not catching on. I've recently been slotted to sell on Home Shopping Network (HSN), and looking forward to closing that deal in the coming weeks. I am also working to finish the patent for the Back Cradling Sleeper, bringing us to 90+% coverage of all sleepers! Sorry tummy-sleepers, I haven't figured anything out for you (yet). I have invested $15,000 of my own money into this venture, and with 4 kids in college soon, I'm hesitant to extend myself too much more, so I'm asking for help. I'm hopeful that this campaign along with HSN will give us the capitol to increase production enough to begin sales in the big box stores. Thanks again!

If you can't help financially, please visit and "like" our Facebook page at: https://www.facebook.com/cradlingsleeper/

story:
Let us introduce you to the Next Generation of Pain Relief.....

We have created a new, next generation pain relieving cream that helps reduce pain and promote repair unlike anything else we’ve ever seen.  It’s quite extraordinary!

Our company name, Sano Ti Amo, means Healing with Love.  We started Sano Ti Amo, for the purpose of helping people heal.

Paul, one of the owners, is a licensed massage therapist and has had a lot of experience with helping people reduce their pain.  He wanted to create something that would continue the benefits of a great therapeutic massage - to help with pain relief once they left his treatment room.  

So, his inspiration was to come up with a formula for a better topical pain relief cream.  One that was very different to those already in the market place.  One that didn't just numb or mask the problem but one that would actually help relieve the pain so the body could naturally repair.  Our cream is called..... 

Relief & Repair (R & R) Pain Relief Cream, Take a vacation from your aches & pain!

His formula was specifically designed to help those suffering from chronic or very painful conditions like Fibromyalgia, injuries or deep muscle aches and pains.  Conditions he would frequently see in his practice.  After many customer testimonial and our own experience, we have found that the formula he created works for many different painful conditions.

Think about this for a minute....

There are millions of people suffering every day from pain.  Our goal is the help relieve pain for as many of these individuals that want to feel better, and we need your help.  

 

By contributing to our campaign, you'll be helping us produce our first major production run.  We are working to become an OTC (over-the-counter) topical analgesic and are currently in the final stages with the FDA.  Passing all three months of accelerated stability testing will provide us with a 2 year shelf life and ensures our ingredients and tube work cohesively.  

Sano Ti Amo is creating products that are transforming how people view chronic pain management and overall wellness. We hope to be the first line of defense in the search for treating all types of chronic pain and wellness issues.  

Many customers have told us that they consider our product a wonder cream or a miracle cream. We have testimonials from customers who suffer from many different ailments and each time, R & R has had a positive impact on their pain associated with such things as;

 

Every batch is scientifically quality and purity tested. We have extensive quality assurance check points along the production process to ensure each batch is of the highest quality. Our formula is also doctor reviewed, recommended and approved.  It is made at an FDA Registered facility.  All our ingredients are sources from FDA registered sources.

How does it work?   R & R penetrates the affected area and quickly goes to work reducing pain and inflammation.   

The reason it works so well is we blend multiple – very different herbal healing systems together.  It combines remedies from Chinese medicine, Ayurvedic, Native American and other ancient healing traditions into a modern therapy that brings incredible relief. 

R & R addresses the root of the problem by working on multiple levels and in a multi-layered approach.  It works at each level, skin, cellular, muscles and nerves.  All ingredients work together in concert but each one works at different time intervals. 

 

Besides having powerful pain relief and anti-inflammatory properties, our therapeutic grade botanicals also help support the body’s own repair mechanisms to strengthen the internal metabolic waste removal processes.  When metabolic wastes are eliminated, the body can start the repair process along with promoting normal functioning of the nerves.  

What are the benefits?  In addition to pain relief, the formula’s ingredients are known for their unique properties that help promote several additional benefits such as; anti-inflammatory action, increasing blood circulation, improving lymph movement, calming nerves, and reducing stress. Most of our clients even report better sleep.

Attributes of the Extra Strength (number of ingredients that support each attribute)

  •    5 - Pain Relievers  
  •    5 - Anti-Inflammatories
  •    4 - Lymph Movers (Nodes and Channels are both stimulated & affected.)
  •    3 - Immune System stimulators
  •    3 - Blood Circulation enhancers
  •    3 - Detoxifiers
  •    3 - Calms nervous tissue
  •    3 - Stimulates repair & rebuilds tissues
  •    2 - Reduce stress, promote & regulate sleep to help repair.
  •     1 - Increases HGH naturally to also facilitate repair.

What's the composition? Active Ingredients- Menthol 1.5%  Camphor .3%                           Inactive Ingredients - Water, Isopropyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Steryl Alcohol, Glycerine, Hetoxal C, Cetyl Alcohol, “Relevium™” (proprietary herbal blend), Menthol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Euxal PE, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Peppermint Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter),  Hemp Seed Oil, Vitamin B6,  Hemp Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil.

How is it different from all the others?

  • R & R focuses more dramatically on the REPAIR
  • The formulation creates a multi-level and multi-layered approach for relieving pain and lymph movement.
  • R & R is a unique formulation of therapeutic grade ingredients that are effective & potent.
  • Utilizes over nine restorative key botanicals.
  • It works subtly.
  • R & R is being manufactured in an FDA approved facility, with FDA sourced ingredients and a FDA registration pending.

Each of our ingredients has a well thought out, focused intent that all work in synergistic combination.  In balance and harmony to create deep long lasting repair.  

It has a vanishing scent & non-greasy. It's formulated without parabens, petroleum, propylene glycol, fragrances, or harsh chemicals.  It has never been sourced from or tested on animals. It is made in the USA.

We didn't add a long list of ingredients just to make an impressive label, each of our ingredients has a specific function that contributes to R & R's spectacular results.   Other products try the kitchen sink method, where they put in every known ingredient that may relieve pain... Ours focuses on the root cause, not just masking the symptoms for a short time.

Our formula is extremely complicated, it utilizes more exotic ingredients and costs more than any other product we've found.  That’s why we need your support to fund our first larger production run, so we can bring this relief to millions of people that suffer from pain.

STORY

We have created a one-of-a-kind product designed to provide an effective, alternative route for people looking for a different way to treat pain. Our goal is to develop innovative products using our unique topical delivery platform to meet significant unmet needs and improve quality of life. R & R's key ingredients stimulate improved circulation in the micro-capillary system to nerves, muscles, ligaments and tendons, where most pain is felt. Pain relief is the result of prompting the body's self-healing mechanisms – healing from the inside out. 

We put love into each batch as if we were making it for ourselves or for our family.  It’s about making every day even better and improving peoples’ everyday lives.  We want them to focus on the fun they will be having from the relief vs. their pain. 

TEAM

Co-Owners Paul Amoroso & Karen DeLuca (picture of Paul & Karen)

Paul Amoroso has a 25-year history in business ownership and management and is a Licensed Massotherapist in the state of Ohio and has practiced for 23 years. His deep study of alternative medicine started in 1992 and included studies in Eastern medicine, Native medicine, Ayurvedic Medicine along with herbs and essential oils.  Currently he owns and manages an Equine education based facility and has been in that business for the last 10 years.  Most recently has started a wellness company Sano Ti Amo and developed a line of topical pain-relieving creams, helping people heal from the inside out and to help address the growing national crisis of pain and the national interest in natural medicines.

Karen DeLuca has over 15 years of experience in National Sales and Marketing that was acquired while working for several Fortune 500 companies (Kellogg’s, M&M Mars, Warner-Lambert, Pfizer, Cadbury, Avery Dennison).  She also has experience with successful product launches, start-up companies and has participated in the start-up of three small businesses.    Karen’s experience is cross functional in the areas of sales, marketing, purchasing, management, vendor & customer relationships. She has a Bachelor’s in Business Administration from Kent State University in Ohio and a MBA in Business from the University of Phoenix. Karen is also currently an entrepreneur in her Gluten Free Bakery business and is in partnership with Paul at Sano Ti Amo.   

Dr. T. Carmen, MD, MA - Medical Consultant 

Dr. D. Everett, DC-  Chiropractic Consultant

Team Support -

Rene McCann - Art Director

Jake & Damian - Videography

 

The Impact

Our Project is truly about helping others.  Our products literally help reduce the pain and suffering in this world. Helping us get started directly helps other people. If you ever wanted to be part of something that helped reduce pain and suffering to millions. This is the project for you.

There are 15 million people with fibromyalgia alone, plus millions more that suffer from chronic pain. Our unique formulation helps reduce the pain and suffering on many conditions.  Helping people get back to enjoying & living life. 

Most projects are limited in who they help or people that would want their products. We suspect that at one time or another everyone has experienced some type of pain and inflammation and are looking for something different to help them relieve their pain and increase their repair time- to just feel better.  Helping them feel better and get back to doing the things they love to do. Our cream does both of these things.

We are proud and humbled by each and every story & each and every person for whom our product offers comfort and relief.

This formula comes from the highest source of relief, Nature in combination with the most natural preservatives we could use and still receive an FDA approval so everyone that uses it knows they are dealing with the most effective and safest product possible.

We would appreciate your support...

We’ve already done 99% of the hard work to ensure R & R can be completed with exceptional quality and on-time. Your support in this campaign is the last bit we need to get Relief & Repair to market. 

What we need is your funding support in order to start large scale production and launch our cream to those in need of relief.  If you, someone you love or anyone you know has pain issues, please consider supporting us.

Help us help others.

Please share our campaign with anyone and everyone.... with friends, colleagues, family, acquaintances, other business owners, anyone you know who is in pain.  Spread the word with your e-mail lists & over your social networks.  

Consider donating to help us bring our next generation pain relief cream to the market.  We are just starting our journey and we would appreciate any help you can give us to bring relief to millions that suffer.  Thanks for your support!

story:
“Your Coffee Sucks! The 5 Ingredients Your Regular Coffee is Missing”

 

Do you start your day with a coffee? Then, you are like most people out there; you enjoy a warm beverage before you go to work. It’s commonplace, but depending on what you drink it could be causing you more issues than you realize.

I want to talk about 5 ingredients that will help you achieve your weight loss goals, get rid of fatigue, and improve your mood all at once!

But first, let’s talk about how your regular coffee is ineffective, unhealthy, and damaging to your body. That might sound scary, but let me explain.

Let’s face it, you get coffee 1 of 3 ways:

You run into the gas station to get that $1.50 cup of joe,

Or you visit a big-name store like Starbucks to get a cup of coffee that ranges from 5,7, sometimes 10 dollars,

Or you buy your coffee at your local Walmart.

Here’s the problem… most of it is junk coffee. Even the top range stuff can be a lot worse for you than you think thanks to add the added extras in there that makes it calorific.

Unless you’re buying the organic kind, which is okay, but we will get to that soon…since most of us do nothing of the sort, let’s look at what ‘normal’ coffee is doing to us.

You’d be surprised to learn that most coffee contains an abundant amount of chemicals that affect your health and performance. Worse yet, most commercial coffee originates from multiple sources, increasing the risk and exposure to mold toxins, like ochratoxin A or OTA.

It is well documented that OTA and other mold toxins are present in coffee at alarming percentages—ranging from 52-58%. In fact, depending on the country, percentages can be even higher than that. Brazil for example, can be as high as 91.7%!

Terrifying, right?

This even occurs in roasted coffee because the roasting process, while killing the mold, doesn’t destroy OTA. As much as 52% of OTA can survive the roasting process. Now, why is OTA terrible for your health and performance?

As  far as studies show, OTA is associated with:

Some forms of cancer

Brain damage

Hypertension

Kidney disease

Immuno-supression

Most of the coffee you are consuming is junk, rancid, and moldy. In essence, it is literally doing more harm than good. That buzz in the morning doesn't quite sound so worth it now, huh?

And the expensive cup of coffee we talked about… yeah, loaded with tons of sugar and empty calories wreaking havoc on your body’s insulin levels. While it might not be full of the same junk as the above, it’s loaded with extra damaging properties.

That isn’t good. You’ll cause yourself to:

Overstress your immune system.

Send your insulin levels on a rollercoaster ride.

Consume tons of sugar and empty calories.

Put in ZERO nutritional value into your body.

Now what about organic coffee? Well you are doing better with that. Single origin coffee greatly reduces the chances of consuming high amounts of mold toxins, giving you an advantage.

Why?

Single origin coffee derives from a single coffee farmer or group of coffee farmers from the same location. They hand-pick and care for your coffee with microscopic detail; affecting taste and coffee integrity. But it’s only offering you one thing… caffeine.

Caffeine is pretty amazing in and of itself. Studies show caffeine to:

Increase serotonin levels to better regulate your mood, happiness, and anxiety.

Improve physical strength and endurance.

Reduce the risk of Alzheimer’s.

Cause alertness and help you stay awake beyond your normal point of tiredness.

Increase metabolism.

I know what you’re thinking - “whoa! That’s awesome!” - but imagine the effectiveness and power of your cup of coffee if it had these 5 ingredients, along with caffeine, from a single origin coffee roast. These are some of the most powerful, nutritious and downright delightful add-ons you can put in any coffee.

Trust us, it’s better than some weird sweetener or cream!

Green Coffee Bean Extract

GCB extract is a concentrated source of Chlorogenic Acid.

Chlorogenic acid is shown to reduce insulin and glucose spikes following a meal, leading to reducing carbohydrate uptake in the long term.

Therefore, this reduces the risk of diabetes and improves glucose tolerance.

Not only that, it increases muscular glucose, which means more energy stored for your muscles and not stored as body fat.

Also, it acts as an antioxidant in neurons, suppressing neuroinflammation, protecting cognitive function against diseases like Parkinson’s.

This induces body fat loss and increase the amount of body heat produced.

Finally, it reduces blood pressure and improves blood circulation.

Garcinia Cambogia

A small fruit that contains HCA (Hydroxycitric Acid).

HCA is an appetite suppressant, reducing food intake and acting as a weight loss aid.

Associated with reduced brain oxidation and neurodegeneration.

An absolute must for those who are looking to slim down a size

Raspberry Ketones

Studies from 2005, 2010, and June 2017 show RK to interrupt adipogenesis. This is a process that leads to the growth of new fat tissue.

Therefore, it’s very important for general improvement in your quality of life.

African Mango

A fruit from the Irvingia Gabonensis plant traditionally used for pain relief.

Associated with reducing LDL and increasing HDL cholesterol.

Aids in the restriction of fat cell reproduction and triglyceride uptake in a major way.

Helps decrease fat mass and waist circumference by reducing food intake and improving the span and strength of our feeling of fullness.

Ganoderma Lucidum (Reishi Mushroom) Extract

GL is used in Chinese Medicine.

A powerful immune system regulator; GL reduces immune system activity when your immunity is overstimulated, and supports it when your immune system is weakened.

GL is known for its anti-cancer effects; activating natural killer cells to help the body fight tumors and prevent metastasis!

Being researched in cancer-related therapies to see its true effect in time.

Improves and aids sleep by act as a tranquilizing agent against restlessness and insomnia.

Decreases symptoms of chronic Fatigue syndrome.

As you see, single origin sourced caffeine plus these 5 amazing natural ingredients do incredible wonders on the human body. Imagine getting these benefits, every morning, in less than 5 minutes, by not changing any habit and doing what you already do, drinking coffee!

How easy would that be? A lot easier than you might think (or fret).

Let me introduce you to CaffeLean; the nutritionally enriched coffee that’s beating regular coffee in all it can offer. Free of the cons and full of the pros, this is a proper best-of-both-worlds coffee blend.

1 serving of CaffeLean not only gives you the benefits of caffeine through delicious single origin Colombian coffee, but also the life-changing benefits of:

Green Coffee Bean Extract

Garcinia Cambogia

Raspberry Ketones

African Mango &

Ganoderma Lucidum (Reishi Mushroom) Extract

→ All in 1 cup of CaffeLean, nutritionally enriched single origin coffee ←

 

If you have trouble with your weight → Drink Caffelean

If you have trouble with energy → Drink CaffeLean

If you are constantly getting sick and stressed → Drink CaffeLean

 

Get CaffeLean NOW to optimize your life!

So go ahead, trash your old coffee and change what kind of coffee you are drinking. With one simple change, at fair cost, that transformation can be complete in minutes!

story:
After years of research we are proud to bring PITCHPERFECT to the field. The first multiple-sensor solution made affordable for ever baseball pitcher. We are serious about taking your game to the next level. Control your own destiny with PITCHPERFECT and always have direct feedback and control over your own training data on your mobile devices. 

 

We believe that reliable and valuable biomechanical data should be available for everyone. Our system is developed with the player in mind, as our main goals was to maximize the comfort and to make it easy-to-use. Therefore, we designed sensors that can be worn into bodyfit clothing. You click the sensor into the clothing item, sync it with your mobile device, and start your training.

Click. Sync. Play. It’s as easy as that.

With PITCHPERFECT direct feedback is available on all mobile devices. Your digital coach can always be on your side during a bullpen session, long toss, or any throwing exercise. You receive readily applicable feedback, along with the option to get auditory feedback, after every pitch you throw.

 

With the PITCHPERFECT app you can create your personalized bullpen session. While training, the sensors keep track of your pitches, furthermore, the app offers you the tools to track your pitch location and pitch types. After the training, all the collected data is combined to give you a detailed overview to evaluate your training. Customize or randomize your bullpen and train towards your own personalized goal!

 

The baseball world has been shifting towards a more data-driven training approach. With PITCHPERFECT we bring data innovation to any player that is serious about improving their game. After all the research and development that has been performed over the last years, now we are focused on making data accessible and understandable for everybody. Our app provides direct feedback during training and 24/7 access to your personal training data. We have made it possible to digitally track all your pitches without any interruption to your training.

 

We set an ambitious funding goal of 172.500 euro which equals 500 pre-orders of PitchPerfect sets. Out of 65 million baseball players worldwide, this is just a small start to our bigger plans. With a group of 500 user we create more and more insight into real-life data to increasingly grow the value of data for any baseball pitcher that want to take his game to the next level. 

Based on the pre-orders, production will start in Febuari 2021 and we aim to deliver worldwide by the end of 2nd quarter of 2020 latest. Given the current travel restrictions due to corona, delivery times may greatly vary between continents.

story:
Health Conscious

Have you ever wiped your bottom with such abandon that you are no longer able to sit in a chair? Gone are all of your painful problems by swapping out abrasive toilet paper with a soothing stream of water. You can adjust the pressure for those more heavy duty jobs or lighten it if you just need a refresh. Water is also healthier for your sensitive parts as it contains no harsh chemicals or dyes that can be found in paper. Gross. Let me ask you this…if you fell into a mud puddle, would you clean your face with a dry towel? Probably not. Don’t suffer, Cheeky is the cleaner, friendlier option that will make you and your butt much happier

 

 

Eco-Friendly

On average, a tree produces about 200 rolls of toilet paper. That’s 83 million rolls produced each day or 27,000 trees! Bidets drastically cut down on the amount of toilet paper you need to get clean and guess what? It doesn’t clog up your plumbing with huge chunks of paper or wet wipes. Have you seen what wet wipes can do to delicate plumbing? Well you really don’t want to. 

Treat your toilet better and avoid those embarrassing phone-calls to the plumber.

 

 

Cost Effective

Cheeky not only saves forests, but also saves you money. The average household uses 240 rolls of toilet paper a year, close to $15,000 over a lifetime.  Spend your money on something else for goodness sake.  We’re all now aware that we can’t depend on TP always being available. Don’t get caught with your pants down. No plumbing also means you can simply fill Cheeky with water directly from your tap or from a water bottle. Easy peasy. Cheeky really is there for you in your times of need. Isn’t that what friends are for

 

 

Space Saving

Aesthetics matter, people! You want your bathroom to be an oasis where you can take a load off after a long day. Don’t soil your solitude with an ugly set of pipes.  Traditional bidets require you to make adjustments to your plumbing and run tubing around your bathroom. Cheeky only takes up (dimensions or cubic feet) leaving more room for comfort around your porcelain palace. It also has a convenient and durable handle built into the BPA free silicone bag. Cheeky travels with you to fit your lifestyle. As they say: mi Casa Cheeky Casa.

 

 

Fill The Bag

Cheeky can be refilled at any water source.

 

Detachable Hose

Attach the hose to the base and squirt.

 

Pressure Control

Turn the nozzle on the front of the base to set the water pressure to your desired level of comfort.

 

Rechargeable

Use the power adapter to recharge Cheeky so it's ready for you whenever you need it.

 

Grab and Go

The flexible mobility handle means Cheeky is ready to go wherever (and whenever) you go.

 

 

Story and Team

Cheeky's Founder, Alfred, had a vision for a healthy and environmentally friendly way to clean up on-the-go. Unsatisfied with the average hotel (or worse public) bathroom, he had the sense that there were others like him who saw room for improvement. The result was the first prototype for Cheeky.  Using a pump from a half-gallon yard sprayer with a detachable hose, an idea was born. Realizing a pump was a challenge, a battery powered pump was introduced. Several prototypes later, seeing the need and demand for a real, working product, Namalabs and Cheeky were created.

We've teamed up with Maverick PDM in California to bring a thoughtfully designed, reliable, safe, and healthy product to your bathroom. Their expertise in industrial design and manufacturing has guided us through the prototype and development process.

"When we started working on Cheeky we looked at a number of existing products and were consistently disappointed with the lack of pressure and flow rate.  We knew with Cheeky that we wanted to provide pressure and flow rate comparable to what you can normally get from a regular bidet connected to a house's water supply.  We tried numerous pumps and design to get the most power in the smallest housing until we found the ideal motor and power combination.

Once we had the internal mechanics figured out, we focused on finding the ideal design that would be both portable and practical.  We ended up selecting a silicone bag to hold the water while still being able to pack up efficiently for travel.  For the base, we wanted a stable platform and the ability to adjust the water pressure to best fit the user's needs.  We ended up with a design that blends a highly portable functionality without any sacrifices in capabilities."

              - Robert Culpi - Maverick PDM

 

 

 

How long can I use this thing?

Cheeky is re-chargeable! On average we've found you can get around 3 hours of battery life depending on use and pressure setting.  Cheeky recharges in minutes so plug it at the end of each use and you should never run out of juice.

 

Can I adjust the temperature?

Absolutely! Cheeky is intended to be used at your comfort.  Just adjust the heat at whatever water source you're using to fill the silicone bag and spray away.  This is based on your comfort level, so check the heat (or cool) of the water to make sure it is right for you before using.

 

Where can Cheeky go?

Pretty much anywhere.  Cheeky is intended to be used on-the-go.  Just use the complimentary dry-bag to keep you and your belongings from getting wet and Cheeky becomes your favorite new travel companion.

 

How often does Cheeky need to be cleaned?

With regular use and clean storage, Cheeky should only need to be cleaned once per month.  If stored for long periods of time between travel or use we advise rinsing with warm water and cycling the system before use.

 

Do I really use less toilet paper?

That's up to you, but we've found that when you let Cheeky do the heavy-lifting, you'll find yourself doing a whole lot less pat-pat-patting.

story:
I want to thank you for looking at my idea and how you can help.  My name is Richie and I had a heart attack a year ago, after I was sent home from the hospital I was given all kinds of new medicines one in which I have to carry on me all of the time (Nitro).  When I would go out I was always forgetting to take my Nitro and then I would go into a sort of panic worry about "what if".  So I came up with this bracelet and its currently patent pending.  It gives me piece of mind when I'm out anywhere because I know the medicine is where it should be and the accessibility and convenience cant be beat.  My goal it help others get the same piece of mind I get from it. The chances are very good that everyone reading this knows someone that cold benefit from this. 

   What we're looking for is money to get the molding process started.  When that's finished R&D needs to be done to work out any little changes that need to be made so we can get the new and final mold made to start the mass production.  Along with that, package design, shipping, storage, advertising, and the other costs that come with getting this out there to be wear pharmaceuticals are sold and into the hospitals.  If there are extra funds all of it will be put directly into getting more made and newer upgrades to the product if needed.  We want to have different bands to attach them to so people can feel comfortable as possible. 

Like I mentioned previously everyone reading this probably knows a person that could benefit from this.  There are so many different medicines that could be put in this.  To know you don't have to struggle to find your medicines in an emergency is quite a nice feeling to have.  The last thing in an emergency you want to do is waste time especially if it's over looking for a medicine that can be quickly accessed.

The only thing that worries us is the production numbers but with your help we can get this going and going strong to have enough funding to keep production orders filled. If we run into a delay with production I have spoken to a few manufacturers than can meet our needs if we need multiple production companies.

 

We'd really appreciate any funds you could back us with and share this to help spread the word.  It will be a good feeling for everyone involved knowing that you're part of starting something that will help save lives and give millions of people piece of mind. 

Thank you for your time and again and any amount you back us with will be extremely appreciated.

I want to thank you for looking at my idea and how you can help.  My name is Richie and I had a heart attack a year ago, after I was sent home from the hospital I was given all kinds of new medicines one in which I have to carry on me all of the time (Nitro).  When I would go out I was always forgetting to take my Nitro and then I would go into a sort of panic worry about "what if".  So I came up with this bracelet and its currently patent pending.  It gives me piece of mind when I'm out anywhere because I know the medicine is where it should be and the accessibility and convenience cant be beat.  My goal it help others get the same piece of mind I get from it. The chances are very good that everyone reading this knows someone that cold benefit from this. 
   What we're looking for is money to get the molding process started.  When that's finished R&D needs to be done to work out any little changes that need to be made so we can get the new and final mold made to start the mass production.  Along with that, package design, shipping, storage, advertising, and the other costs that come with getting this out there to be wear pharmaceuticals are sold and into the hospitals.  If there are extra funds all of it will be put directly into getting more made and newer upgrades to the product if needed.  We want to have different bands to attach them to so people can feel comfortable as possible. 
Like I mentioned previously everyone reading this probably knows a person that could benefit from this.  There are so many different medicines that could be put in this.  To know you don't have to struggle to find your medicines in an emergency is quite a nice feeling to have.  The last thing in an emergency you want to do is waste time especially if it's over looking for a medicine that can be quickly accessed.
The only thing that worries us is the production numbers but with your help we can get this going and going strong to have enough funding to keep production orders filled. If we run into a delay with production I have spoken to a few manufacturers than can meet our needs if we need multiple production companies.
 
We'd really appreciate any funds you could back us with and share this to help spread the word.  It will be a good feeling for everyone involved knowing that you're part of starting something that will help save lives and give millions of people piece of mind. 
Thank you for your time and again and any amount you back us with will be extremely appreciated.

story:
The WAIOLA SMART FLASK was born from a simple vision. Take water purification on the GO!

The WAIOLA SMART FLASK is a Insulated Self-Cleaning water bottle with built in UVC-LIGHT Technology in it's cap. The light is effective towards eliminating odor causing bacteria from your water and the bottle. Say HELLO to WAIOLA

 The WAIOLA SMART FLASK is equipped with 3 primary features.

1. Touch Screen Activation- Tap the screen 3 times for 60 second cleaning process

2. LED- Drink Water Reminder - Get reminded hourly to drink water

3. Self Clean Automation- Intelligently activates every 4 hours 6 times Daily

 The WAIOLA SMART FLASK comes with USB - rechargeable battery that can last up to 1 MONTH on a single charge. 

WAIOLA TECHNOLOGY

THE SPECS

SLEEK LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN

 SIMPLE 1, 2, 3 PROCESS

1. SIMPLY POUR IN THE TAP

2. SCREW ON THE CAP  

 3. PURIFY

 The WAIOLA SMART FLASK has a 60 second sterilization Process. 

THE REWARDS

COMPARISON  

THE SCIENCE BEHIND UV-C TREATMENT

Studies show that (CLOSE) UV-C Light has been scientifically proven to be effective towards eliminating bacteria from surfaces and is more commonly used Internationally for water sterilization. 

WHY WAIOLA?

THE TIMELINE

" In Hawaiian Language the word  WAI' OLA means (Living water). Our islands are surrounded by WAI  (Water) from the mountain to the sea. WAI separates our Ahupua'a (Division of Land) and is what keeps our islands green and lush.  WAI is and always will be our peoples single greatest resource"

- Pomai Ka'i Aiu (CEO/ Co Founder)

story:
Who Am I?

Hi! I'm Neil Chapman! For years, I worked in the fitness industry in which I tried countless protein bars that lacked in sugar content, taste, and texture. So, I sought out to fix those problems. And, I created bars that are low in sugar, mouth feeling texture, and taste! 

Why the campaign? Customers love the bars yet limited access to these bars. This campaign will help raise funds to re-brand our NEW Vegan-Keto line, and volume buy our ingredients to start our retail end!

Your contribution and support will allow us to give you quicker access to these bars through the farmers markets, online website, and retail!

 

How You Help/What You Get

I need your help to raise $5,000! Your contribution will re-brand our Vegan-Keto line to be more effective at the farmers markets, make a new website for our Vegan-Keto bars, and buy our ingredients in bulk so we can start our retail end.

What Do You Get? Protein bars which includes NEW Vegan bars also t-shirts or tank tops too. And, personal trainer session or health food store gift cards! The more you contribute, the bigger the reward! 

PERK!! Contribute $125! You get 24 bars of your choice, t-shirt or tank top, and a gift card! STAY TUNED FOR THE UPDATES! Pop-up referral perks and contests that gets you more prizes! Spoiler's Alert - Win the Contest(s) and get 2 NOT 1 Gift Cards!

If we don't reach our goal, we'll use your contributions to volume buy our ingredients. So, that they can be available to YOU at retail stores! 

 

How Your Gift Makes a Difference

Your gift is valuable to us! Because it helps us grow our business faster! Quicker the business moves, the faster you can enjoy these products on the go!

 

Hmmm.. What Are Our Obstacle(s)?

The future brings...the challenge to produce the quantity of bars that will be sold through retail, online, and farmers' markets. Overcome that...hire employees to produce these bars!

 

How Else Can You Help?

You can't contribute? BUT You Can In Other Ways! Raise your voice and make a lot of noise!   

Ways that your love, energy, and support can be expressed:

  • Share the word when you are out in the community, and while talking with your family and friends
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools for this fundraiser
  • Spread the word on social media and there will 1-2 prizes that you can win!​
    • Whey Fresco on Facebook
    • wheyfrescobars on Instagram
    • Whey Fresco Protein Bars on Twitter

 

Have A Question for Us?

Where can I get my question answered? These are the following ways to reach out to us:

  • provide a comment or question connected to this video
  • email us: wheyfresco@gmail.com
  • visit us: www.wheyfresco.com AND leave us a message in on our "Contact Us" page
  • private message me through the social media sites
    • Facebook - Sophie Chapman or Neil Chapman (personal pages), Whey Fresco (business page)
    • Twitter - Whey Fresco Protein Bars
    • Instagram - sophiechapman37 or wheyfrescobars 
  • message through Indiegogo account

 

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you so much for your support and your contribution. To express our continuous gratitude, we'll regularly post updates, images and videos throughout our campaign. And, we'll continue to do so when the campaign has ended.

story:
You can now Add Weight to ANY Assistive Device!

As therapists, we saw first hand the NEED for an alternative option to add weight to assistive devices in the rehabilitation setting. Introducing, the WEIGHTED WALKING ATTACHMENTS!

The Weighted Walking Attachments were designed and developed by Nicole Fellows, Doctor of Physical Therapy and Sarah Ali, Occupational Therapist. The attachments provide increased feedback to our nervous system for people living with disorders such as strokes, dementia, cerebral palsy, ataxia, multiple sclerosis, spina bifida and may other in order to;

-Decrease fall risk

-Improve balance with ambulation and mobility

-Decrease length of stay in hospitals and rehab facilities

-Decrease level of hands on caregiver assistance

-Prolong aging in place 

Weighted Walking Attachments are used by individuals of all ages, from pediatrics to geriatrics and can be placed on walkers, rollators and canes.

With YOUR HELP we will be able to expand the Weighted Walking Attachment's use to a world wide platform.

The more people who have access, the more lives we can change!

 

OUR GOAL

Our funding goal is $50,000 and will be used to;

-Support international training to rehabilitation facilities, therapists and distributors

-Maintain high volume inventory, manufactured in the USA             

-Attend conferences and trade shows 

-Develop and implement a continuing education course to educate therapists world wide

-Assist with remaining patent expenses both in USA and internationally 

-Enhance the level and scope of marketing our product

-Finalize insurance coverage in the USA and Canada 

 

HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTION CAN CHANGE LIVES

Support an older adult who wants to stay in their home longer or allow a child to actively play with their peers! Every dollar you contribute directly improves the quality of life of someone in need.

Weighted Walking Attachment sales have a 100% success rate following an inservice to rehab facilities and hospitals. 

The Weighted Walking Attachments are being used in 6 states in the USA and growing. 

CHANGE THE PRACTICE OF USING ANKLE WEIGHTS!

The current practice in therapy is to use bulky, bold and unstable ankle weights on assistive devices to provide feedback and stability to a person who needs it. This is simply NOT SAFE for the patient to carryover in the real world and makes them stand out amongst peers.

 

Therapists KNOW the benefit of weights on assistive devices for rehab, but don't all yet know about out product.  This is why we need YOUR HELP to educate EVERY rehab facility and hospital world wide. 

Our product is EASILY ATTACHED to assistive devices and is CUSTOMIZABLE to a person's individual need with the weights ranging from ONE to THREE POUNDS and blends in to allow a person not to stand out amongst peers and in the community.

STOP! Lightweight walkers are NOT Ideal for people who truly need stability!

Companies are pushing for walkers and assistive devices to be lightweight, however the lighter the device, the less stability and support. 

Our Weighted Attachments can go on all different devices and be placed anywhere the person needs increased feedback. That is why our product is different from just a "heavy walker".

We are proud to say this product is designed by therapists who are trained to know what a person REALLY needs to stay safe!

Testimonials:

"Once they applied the Weighted Walking Attachment to her walker there was an instant and noticeable improvement in her alignment when using her walker."

"We as a family were so excited and totally amazed with how the Weighted Walking Attachments made a BIG and SIGNIFICANT improvement with Mom’s balance as she walked with the them on her walker."

"It gave my mother a huge boost of confidence to walk without falling. The Weighted Walking Attachment is such a genius invention that will help so many patients undergoing physical rehabilitation. Thank you for making a difference!"

"Nicole introduced us to her invention, a set of weights that could be added to the legs of a walker for stability.  What a difference they made! My husband uses the weighted walker confidently and is making good progress, free of the fear of falling. I would recommend the Weighted Walker to anyone who is seeking a confident recovery."

"I was AMAZED with how well she was walking with me!"

"This is the best she has walked in months!"

THANK YOU FOR ALLOWING US TO IMPROVE THE INDEPENDENCE OF THOSE IN NEED

 

Please share our campaign with your family, friends, colleagues and investors!

Visit our website at http://www.falirehab.com 

LIKE US on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/falirehab

FALI REHAB EQUIPMENT, LLC. 
"Your Independence A-Weights"

story:
The Problem

Newborn babies can’t breathe through their mouth.

Yes, you read that correctly! When they have a cold, they struggle to breathe, eat, and sleep. And it’s no fun for you, either! While there are plenty of nasal aspirators on the market, most are gross, ineffective, and challenging to use. 

I'm a parent of three kids and a pediatric ENT. I teamed up with doctoral students, researchers, designers, and families to create the NozeBot, a hospital-quality solution for clearing nasal passages that is easy for parents to use at home and on the go.

As you may already know, upper respiratory infections occur frequently in babies, typically 6-10 times per year and can lead to hospitalization. I know firsthand this is a terrifying experience for parents. Nasal aspirators are meant to help, but those currently on the market are prone to biofilm formation, occupy both hands, and exert poor suction force. And what’s worse, they can potentially cause re-infection AND infect the parent. I created the NozeBot to make life a little easier on children and their parents and to reduce the number of hospitalizations due to infections.

Here's what you need to know about this product:

  • The NozeBot is vacuum-powered, safe, hygienic, and hospital-grade. The NozeBot is BPA-free to ensure the safety of your child and comes with a reusable filter.
  • The one-of-a-kind, patented nosepiece gives you more use of your hands, so you can comfort and stabilize your child. If you've ever used any kind of nasal aspirator on your infant or toddler before, you've likely wished you had eight hands. We do crazy things to get our children to cooperate.
  • The product comes with a micro-USB charging cable, so you can power up your NozeBot and take it on the go.
  • It really sucks (in a good way).

 

 

What We Need

We're seeking $10,000 to help fund our transfer from a fully developed, functional prototype to full-scale manufacturing! 

 

Rewards

  • Pledge $25 and we'll give you a shout out on social media!
  • Pledge $69 and be an early adopter! You'll receive the NozeBot in Q1 of 2020—at $50 off the list price of $119!
  • Pledge $99 and receive a gift package (great for baby showers!) that includes a NozeBot, a branded onesie, a plush NozeBot robot pillow, and a NozeBot sticker.
  • Pledge $500 — Thank You! You and a guest will be invited to our Atlanta launch party in early 2020.

 

Follow and Share!

  • www.drnozebest.com
  • Instagram.com/drnozebest
  • Facebook.com/drnozebest
